(Do not confuse <t3>DEL</t3> with the <t4>Delete</t4> key; we will discuss <t5>Delete</t5> momentarily.) On some text terminals, Emacs may not recognize the <t6>DEL</t6> key properly.

(For example, when completing command names, ‘<s0>em-l-m</s0>’ completes to ‘<s1>emacs-lisp-mode</s1>’.)
(例如，在补全命令名称时，“<s0>em-l-m</s0>”将补全为“<s1>emacs-lisp-mode</s1>”。)

(However, note that when Emacs was built with a GUI toolkit, the menus are drawn and controlled by the toolkit, and the key sequences to cancel menu navigation might be different from the above description.)
(但是，请注意，当Emacs使用GUI工具包构建时，菜单由该工具包绘制和控制，用于取消菜单导航的键序列可能与上面的描述不同。)
(More commands may be defined in your Emacs session.
(可以在Emacs会话中定义更多命令。
(See <a0>Key Bindings</a0>, for how to set up key bindings.)
(有关如何设置键绑定，请参阅<a0>按键绑定</a0>。)
(See <a2>Filling</a2>, for more information on <k3>M-q</k3>.) For these commands, it is enough to specify the argument with a single <k4>C-u</k4>.
(有关<k3>M-q</k3>的详细信息，请参阅<a2>填充</a2>。)对于这些命令，使用单个<k4>C-u</k4>指定参数就足够了。
(有关<k8>C-k</k8>的详细信息，请参阅<a7>剪切</a7>。)

(That name appears as the default while you enter the argument.) For example, if point is located following the text ‘<s3>(make-vector (car x)</s3>’, the innermost list containing point is the one that starts with ‘<s4>(make-vector</s4>’, so <k5>C-h f <s6>RET</s6></k5> describes the function <c7>make-vector</c7>.
(当您输入参数时，该名称显示为默认值。)例如，如果游标位于文本‘<s3>(make-vector (car x)</s3>’之后，则包含游标的最内层列表是以‘<s4>(make-vector</s4>’开始的那个，因此<k5>C-h f</s6></k5>描述了<c7>make-vector</c7>函数。

(The <t2>RET</t2> key may be labeled <t3>Return</t3>, or <t4>Enter</t4>, or with a funny-looking left-pointing arrow on your keyboard, but we refer to it as <t5>RET</t5> in this manual.) This command inserts a newline character into the buffer, then indents (see <a6>Indentation</a6>) according to the major mode.
(<t2>RET</t2>键可能标记为<t3>Return</t3>、<t4>Enter</t4>，或者键盘上有一个外观滑稽的向左箭头，但我们在本手册中将其称为<t5>RET</t5>。)该命令将换行符插入缓冲区，然后根据主模式缩进(请参阅<a6>缩进</a6>)。
(The first key might be unavailable on text-mode displays.)
(第一个键可能在文本模式显示器上不可用。)
(The prompt, however, is <e0>read-only</e0>, and cannot be changed.)
(The ‘<s0>G</s0>’ in <a1>GNU</a1> (GNU’s Not Unix) is not silent.)
(There are a few prefix keys for which not all of these keys work—those that provide their own bindings for that key.
(有几个前缀键并不是所有这些键都有效-那些为该键提供自己的绑定的前缀键。
(These include, for example, links in <s1>*Help*</s1> buffers.) See <a2>Help Echo</a2>.
(例如，这些链接包括<s1>*Help*</s1>缓冲区中的链接。)请参阅<a2>帮助回显</a2>。
(To disable this dimming, turn off File Name Shadow mode with the command <k2><s3>M-x</s3> <s4>file-name-shadow-mode</s4></k2>
(要禁用此调暗，请使用命令<k2><s3>M-x</s3><s4>file-name-shadow-mode</s4></k2>关闭文件名阴影模式

(We have not explained buffers yet; see <a1>Buffers</a1>, for more information about them.) If you miss a message that appeared briefly on the screen, you can switch to the <s2>*Messages*</s2> buffer to see it again.
(我们尚未解释缓冲区；有关它们的详细信息，请参阅<a1>缓冲区</a1>。)如果您错过了屏幕上短暂显示的消息，可以切换到<s2>*Messages*</s2>缓冲区再次查看。

(We have not explained variables either; see <a5>Variables</a5>, for more information about them.) Beyond this limit, one line is deleted from the beginning whenever a new message line is added at the end.
(我们也没有解释变量；有关它们的更多信息，请参阅<a5>变量</a5>。)超过此限制后，每当在末尾添加新消息行时，将从开头删除一行。
(What if you do want to insert five copies of ‘<s0>0</s0>’?
(如果您确实要插入“<s0>0</s0>”的五个副本，该怎么办？
(You can also type <k4>M-`</k4>, which always invokes <c5>tmm-menubar</c5>.) <c6>tmm-menubar</c6> lets you select a menu item with the keyboard.
(您还可以键入<k4>M-`</k4>，它始终调用<c5>tmm-menubar</c5>。)<c6>tmm-menubar</c6>允许您使用键盘选择菜单项。
(You can also use <k2>?</k2> in this context.
(您还可以在此上下文中使用<k2>?</k2>。
(You can display the current column number too, by turning on Column Number mode.
(通过打开列号模式，也可以显示当前列号。
(You can still leave the minibuffer by typing <k3>C-g</k3> to cancel the command.)
(您仍然可以通过键入<k3>C-g</k3>取消该命令来离开迷你缓冲区。)

(a) The FSF’s Back-Cover Text is: “You have the freedom to copy and modify this GNU manual.” #+END_QUOTE * Getting Started EBDB is a contact management package: it records information about people and organizations, and integrates with other Emacs software packages, mostly those concerned with sending and reading mail.

;;; 最少的配置加载最新的'org-mode'
<b0>Important:</b0> You need to do this in a session where no ‘<s1>.org</s1>’ file has been visited, i.e., where no Org built-in function have been loaded.
<b0>重要提示:</b0>你需要在未访问' <s1> .org </s1>'文件的会话（即未加载Org内置函数的会话）中执行此操作。

<b0>This terminal feature is turned off while you are in Emacs.</b0> The meanings of <k1>C-z</k1> and <k2>C-x C-c</k2> as keys in Emacs were inspired by the use of <k3>C-z</k3> and <k4>C-c</k4> on several operating systems as the characters for stopping or killing a program, but that is their only relationship with the operating system.
<b0>此终端功能在您处于Emacs中时关闭。</b0>在Emacs中，<k1>C-z</k1>和<k2>C-x C-c</k2>作为快捷键键的含义源于在几个操作系统上使用<k3>C-z</k3>和<k4>C-c</k4>作为停止或终止程序的字符，但这是它们与操作系统唯一的关系。
<c0>gtd.org</c0>: where I put all my projects;
<c0>someday.org</c0>: All inactive tasks that I might do at some point in the future, but don’t want to see all the time;
<c0>someday.org</c0>：所有我可能在将来某个时候完成但不想一直看到的非当前活动任务；
<c0>tickler.org</c0>: I put entries in this file with a <a1>timestamp</a1> to get reminded at the right moment.
<c0>tickler.org</c0>：我在此文件中放置了带有<a1>时间戳</a1>的条目，以便在正确的时间得到提醒。
<e0>Cautious completion</e0> is like strict completion, except <t1>RET</t1> exits only if the text is already an exact match.
<e0>谨慎补全</e0>类似于严格补全，不同之处在于<t1>RET</t1>只有在文本已经完全匹配时才会退出。
<e0>Customizable</e0> means that you can easily alter the behavior of Emacs commands in simple ways.
<e0>可自定义</e0>意味着您可以通过简单的方式轻松地更改Emacs命令的行为。
<e0>Extensible</e0> means that you can go beyond simple customization and create entirely new commands.
<e0>可扩展</e0>意味着您可以超越简单的自定义，创建全新的命令。
<e0>Global cycling</e0>: Rotate the entire buffer among the states
<e0>全局循环</e0>：整个缓冲区在多个状态之间循环
<e0>Killing</e0> Emacs means terminating the Emacs program.

<e0>Permissive completion with confirmation</e0> is like permissive completion, with an exception: if you typed <t1>TAB</t1> and this completed the text up to some intermediate state (i.e., one that is not yet an exact completion match), typing <t2>RET</t2> right afterward does not submit the argument.
<e0>带有确认的宽松补全</e0>类似于宽松补全，但有一个例外：如果您键入<t1>TAB</t1>，并且这样补全了文本直到某种中间状态(即，尚未完全匹配补全的状态)，则紧接着键入<t2>RET</t2>不会提交参数。
<e0>Permissive completion</e0> allows any input; the completion candidates are just suggestions.
<e0>宽松补全</e0>允许任何输入；补全候选项只是建议。

<e0>Self-documenting</e0> means that at any time you can use special commands, known as <e1>help commands</e1>, to find out what your options are, or to find out what any command does, or to find all the commands that pertain to a given topic.
<e0>自文档</e0>意味着您可以随时使用称为<e1>帮助命令</e1>的特殊命令来找出您的选项是什么，或者找出任何命令的作用，或者查找与给定主题相关的所有命令。
<e0>Strict completion</e0> accepts only exact completion matches.
<e0>严格补全</e0>只接受完全匹配的补全。
<e0>Subtree cycling</e0>: Rotate current subtree among the states
<e0>子树循环</e0>:让子树在多个状态直接循环
<e0>Tags</e0> make use of the hierarchical structure of outline trees.
<e0>标签</e0>利用大纲树的层次结构。
<e0>custom views</e0> that are special searches and combinations of different views.
<e0>custom views</e0>可以自定义搜索,并结合多种不同的视图。

<e6>Control characters</e6>, such as <t7>RET</t7>, <t8>TAB</t8>, <t9>DEL</t9>, <t10>ESC</t10>, <t11>F1</t11>, <t12>Home</t12>, and <t13>LEFT</t13>, are also entered this way, as are certain characters found on non-English keyboards (see <a14>International</a14>).
<e6>控制字符</e6>(如<t7>RET</t7>、<t8>TAB</t8>、<t9>DEL</t9>、<t10>ESC</t10>、<t11>F1</t11>、<t12>Home</t12>和<t13>LEFT</t13>)也是通过这种方式输入的，非英语键盘上的某些字符也是如此(请参见<a14>国际化</a14>)
<k0><s1>SPC</s1></k0>, <k2><s3>TAB</s3></k2>, and <k4><s5>RET</s5></k4> can be used from the agenda buffer to jump to the diary file in order to edit existing diary entries.
<k0><s1>SPC</s1></k0>, <k2><s3>TAB</s3></k2>和 <k4><s5>RET</s5></k4>可以从议程缓冲区跳转到日记文件，以便编辑现有的日记条目。
<k0>C-d</k0> (<c1>delete-char</c1>) deletes the character after point, similar to <t2>Delete</t2>, but regardless of whether the region is active.
<k0>C-d</k0>(<c1>delete-char</c1>)删除游标之后的字符，与<t2>Delete</t2>类似，但与选区是否处于活动状态无关。
<k0>C-h K <v1>key</v1></k0> displays the section of the Emacs manual that describes the command corresponding to <v2>key</v2>.
<k0>C-h K<v1>key</v1></k0>显示Emacs手册中描述与<v2>key</v2>对应的命令的部分。

<k0>C-h P</k0> (<c1>describe-package</c1>) prompts for the name of a package (see <a2>Packages</a2>), and displays a help buffer describing the attributes of the package and the features that it implements.
<k0>C-h P</k0>(<c1>describe-package</c1>)提示输入包的名称(请参阅<a2>包</a2>)，并显示描述包的属性及其实现的功能的帮助缓冲区。
<k0>C-h b</k0> (<c1>describe-bindings</c1>) and <k2>C-h s</k2> (<c3>describe-syntax</c3>) show other information about the current environment within Emacs.
<k0>C-h b</k0>(<c1>describe-bindings</c1>)和<k2>C-h s</k2>(<c3>describe-syntax</c3>)显示有关Emacs中当前环境的其他信息。
<k0>C-h c <v1>key</v1></k0> displays in the echo area the name of the command that <v2>key</v2> is bound to.
<k0>C-h c<v1>key</v1></k0>在回显区显示<v2>key</v2>绑定到的命令的名称。
<k0>C-h c</k0>, <k1>C-h k</k1> and <k2>C-h K</k2> work for any sort of key sequences, including function keys, menus, and mouse events (except that <k3>C-h c</k3> ignores mouse movement events).
<k0>C-h c</k0>, <k1>C-h k</k1> 和 <k2>C-h K</k2> 适用于任何类型的键序列，包括功能键、菜单和鼠标事件(但<k3>C-h c</k3>忽略鼠标移动事件除外)。
<k0>C-h f <v1>function</v1> <s2>RET</s2></k0> (<c3>describe-function</c3>) displays the documentation of Lisp function <v4>function</v4>, in a window.
<k0>C-h f<v1>函数<s2>RET</s2></k0>(<c3>describe-function</c3>)在窗口中显示Lisp函数<v4>函数</v4>的文档。
<k0>C-h f</k0> is also useful for Lisp functions that you use in a Lisp program.
<k0>C-h f</k0>对于您在Lisp程序中使用的Lisp函数也很有用。
<k0>C-h f</k0> is also useful just to verify that you spelled a function name correctly.
<k0>C-h f</k0>也可用于验证函数名是否拼写正确。
<k0>C-h i</k0> (<c1>info</c1>) runs the Info program, which browses structured documentation files.
<k0>C-h i</k0>(<c1>info</c1>)运行Info程序，该程序浏览结构化文档文件。
<k0>C-h k <v1>key</v1></k0> is similar but gives more information: it displays a help buffer containing the command’s <e2>documentation string</e2>, which describes exactly what the command does.
<k0>C-h k<v1>key</v1></k0>类似，但提供了更多信息：它显示包含命令的<e2>文档字符串</e2>的帮助缓冲区，该字符串准确描述了命令的功能。
<k0>C-h m</k0> (<c1>describe-mode</c1>) displays documentation on the current major mode, which normally describes the commands and features that are changed in this mode, and also its key bindings.
<k0>C-h m</k0>(<c1>describe-mode</c1>)显示有关当前主模式的文档，该文档通常描述在此模式中更改的命令和功能，以及它的键绑定。
<k0>C-h o</k0> (<c1>describe-symbol</c1>) is like <k2>C-h f</k2> and <k3>C-h v</k3>, but it describes any symbol, be it a function, a variable, or a face.
<k0>C-h o</k0>(<c1>describe-symbol</c1>)类似于<k2>C-h f</k2>和<k3>C-h v</k3>，但它描述任何符号，可以是函数、变量或字符样式。
<k0>C-h v</k0> (<c1>describe-variable</c1>) is like <k2>C-h f</k2> but describes Lisp variables instead of Lisp functions.
<k0>C-h v</k0>(<c1>describe-variable</c1>)类似于<k2>C-h f</k2>，但描述的是Lisp变量，而不是Lisp函数。
<k0>C-h w <v1>command</v1> <s2>RET</s2></k0> lists the keys that are bound to <v3>command</v3>.
<k0>C-h</k0> or <t1>F1</t1> mean “help” in various other contexts as well.
<k0>C-h</k0>或<t1>F1</t1>在各种其他上下文中也意味着“帮助”。
<k0>C-k</k0> (<c1>kill-line</c1>) erases (kills) a line at a time.
<k0>C-n</k0> normally stops at the end of the buffer when you use it on the last line in the buffer.
当您在缓冲区的最后一行使用它时，<k0>C-n</k0>通常会在缓冲区末尾停止。
<k0>C-q</k0> followed by a sequence of octal digits inserts the character with the specified octal character code.
<k0>C-q</k0>后跟一个八进制数字序列插入具有指定八进制字符代码的字符。
<k0>C-q</k0> followed by any non-graphic character (even <k1>C-g</k1>) inserts that character.
<k0>C-q</k0>后跟任何非图形字符(甚至<k1>C-g</k1>)都会插入该字符。
<k0>C-u</k0> alone has the special meaning of “four times”: it multiplies the argument for the next command by four.
<k0>C-u</k0>本身就有“四次”的特殊含义：它将下一个命令的参数乘以四。

<k0>C-x 8 <s1>RET</s1> left single quotation mark <s2>RET</s2></k0> <k3>C-x 8 <s4>RET</s4> left sin <s5>TAB</s5> <s6>RET</s6></k3> <k7>C-x 8 <s8>RET</s8> 2018 <s9>RET</s9></k7> <k10>C-x 8 [</k10> <k11>A-[</k11> <s12>(if the Alt key works)</s12> <k13>`</k13> <s14>(in Electric Quote mode)</s14>

<k0>C-x 8 <s1>RET</s1> left single quotation mark <s2>RET</s2></k0> <k3>C-x 8 <s4>RET</s4> left sin <s5>TAB</s5> <s6>RET</s6></k3> <k7>C-x 8 <s8>RET</s8> 2018 <s9>RET</s9></k7> <k10>C-x 8 [</k10> <k11>A-[</k11> <s12>(if the Alt key works)</s12> <k13>`</k13> <s14>(in Electric Quote mode)</s14>
<k0>C-x <s1>ESC</s1> <s2>ESC</s2></k0> re-executes a recent command that used the minibuffer.
<k0>C- x<s1>ESC</s1> <s2>ESC</s2></k0>重新执行使用迷你缓冲区的最近命令。
<k0>C-x <s1>ESC</s1> <s2>ESC</s2></k0> works by turning the previous command into a Lisp expression and then entering a minibuffer initialized with the text for that expression.
<k0>C- x <s1>ESC</s1> <s2>ESC</s2></k0>的工作方式是将前面的命令转换为Lisp表达式，然后输入用该表达式的文本初始化的迷你缓冲区。
<k0>C-x C-c</k0> behaves specially if you are using Emacs as a server.
<k0>C-x C-c</k0>在使用Emacs作为服务器时会有特殊行为。
<k0>M-=</k0> (<c1>count-words-region</c1>) displays a message reporting the number of lines, words, and characters in the region (see <a2>Mark</a2>, for an explanation of the region).
<k0>M-=</k0>(<c1>count-words-region</c1>)显示一条消息，报告选区中的行数、字数和字符数(有关选区的说明，请参阅<a2>标记</a2>)。
<k0>M-x what-line</k0> displays the current line number in the echo area.
<k0>M-x what-line</k0>在回显区中显示当前行号。
<k0>M-x</k0> uses the minibuffer to read the name of a command, so completion works by matching the minibuffer text against the names of existing Emacs commands.
<k0>M-x</k0>使用迷你缓冲区读取命令的名称，因此补全是通过将迷你缓冲区文本与现有Emacs命令的名称进行匹配来实现的。
<k0>M-x</k0> works by running the command <c1>execute-extended-command</c1>, which is responsible for reading the name of another command and invoking it.
<k0>M-x</k0>通过运行命令<c1>execute-extended-command</c1>工作，该命令负责读取另一个命令的名称并调用它。
<k10>c</k10> can be used to switch back and forth between calendar and agenda.
<k10>c</k10>可用于在日历和议程之间来回切换。
<k1>C-u</k1> deletes everything you have typed so far.
<k1>C-u</k1>删除您到目前为止键入的所有内容。
<k2>C-h 4 i</k2> (<c3>info-other-window</c3>) does the same, but shows the Info buffer in another window.
<k2>C-h 4 i</k2>(<c3>info-other-window</c3>)执行相同的操作，但在另一个窗口中显示信息缓冲区。
<k2>C-h l</k2> displays your last 300 input keystrokes and the commands they invoked.
<k2>C-h l</k2>显示您最近300次输入击键及其调用的命令。
<k2>C-n</k2> has this effect <e3>because</e3> it is bound to <c4>next-line</c4>.
<k2>M-x</k2> uses the minibuffer to read the command name.
<k2>M-x</k2>使用迷你缓冲区读取命令名。

<k4>C-h b</k4> displays a list of all the key bindings now in effect: first the local bindings of the current minor modes, then the local bindings defined by the current major mode, and finally the global bindings (see <a5>Key Bindings</a5>).
<k4>C-h b</k4>显示当前有效的所有键绑定的列表：首先是当前辅模式的局部绑定，然后是当前主模式定义的局部绑定，最后是全局绑定(请参阅<a5>键绑定</a5>)。
<k4>C-x</k4> combines with the next input event to make a two-event key sequence, which could itself be a prefix key (such as <k5>C-x 4</k5>), or a complete key (such as <k6>C-x C-f</k6>).
<k4>C-x</k4>与下一个输入事件组合形成两个事件的按键序列，该序列本身可以是前缀键(如<k5>C-x 4</k5>)，也可以是完整键(如<k6>C-x C-f</k6>)。
<k4>C-y</k4> inserts the current kill into the password (see <a5>Killing</a5>).
<k4>C-y</k4>将当前剪切字内容插入到密码中(请参阅<a5>剪切</a5>)。
<k6>C-h s</k6> displays the contents of the syntax table, with explanations of each character’s syntax (see <a7>Syntax Tables</a7> in <c8>The Emacs Lisp Reference Manual</c8>).
<k6>C-h s</k6>显示语法表的内容，并解释每个字符的语法(请参阅<c8>Emacs Lisp参考手册</c8>中的<a7>语法表</a7>)。
<t0>SPC</t0> (<c1>minibuffer-complete-word</c1>) completes like <t2>TAB</t2>, but only up to the next hyphen or space.
<t0>SPC</t0>(<c1>minibuffer-complete-word</c1>)像<t2>TAB</t2>一样补全，但只到下一个连字符或空格。
<t0>TAB</t0> (<c1>minibuffer-complete</c1>) is the most fundamental completion command.
<t5>RET</t5> exits the minibuffer and runs the command.
<t5>RET</t5>退出迷你缓冲区并运行该命令。
<v0>buf</v0> is the name of the buffer displayed in the window.
<v0>buf</v0>是窗口中显示的缓冲区的名称。
<v0>cs</v0> describes the character set of the text in the buffer (see <a1>Coding Systems</a1>).
<v0>cs</v0>描述缓冲区中文本的字符集(请参阅<a1>编码系统</a1>)。
<v0>fr</v0>提供选定的窗体名(请参阅<a1>窗体</a1>)。
<v0>line</v0> is the character ‘<s1>L</s1>’ followed by the line number at point.
<v0>major</v0> is the name of the <e1>major mode</e1> used in the buffer.
<v0>major</v0>是缓冲区中使用的<e1>主模式</e1>的名称。
<v0>minor</v0> is a list of some of the enabled <e1>minor modes</e1>, which are optional editing modes that provide additional features on top of the major mode.
<v0>minor</v0>是一些已启用的<e1>辅模式</e1>的列表，它们是在主模式之上提供附加功能的可选编辑模式。
<v0>pos</v0> tells you whether there is additional text above the top of the window, or below the bottom.
<v0>pos</v0>告诉您窗口顶部上方还是底部下方有其他文本。
A <e0>key sequence</e0>, or <e1>key</e1> for short, is a sequence of one or more input events that is meaningful as a unit.
<e0>键序列</e0>或简称<e1>快捷键</e1>是把有意义的一个或多个输入事件的序列作为一个单元。
A buffer that is not currently displayed remembers its value of point if you later display it again.
如果稍后再次显示当前未显示的缓冲区，则它会记住其游标。
A copy of the license is included in the section entitled “GNU Free Documentation License.”
该许可证的副本包含在标题为“GNU自由文档许可证”的部分中。
A copy of the license is included in the section entitled “GNU Free Documentation License.”
该许可证的副本包含在标题为“GNU自由文档许可证”的部分中。
A double slash causes Emacs to ignore everything before the second slash in the pair.
双斜杠会导致Emacs忽略对中第二个斜杠之前的所有内容。
A dynamic block for column view.
A few commands treat a plain <k0>C-u</k0> differently from an ordinary argument.
有几个命令将普通<k0>C-u</k0>与普通参数区别对待。
A few common Unicode characters can be inserted via a command starting with <k0>C-x 8</k0>.
可以通过以<k0>C-x 8</k0>开头的命令插入一些常见的Unicode字符。
A few others may treat an argument of just a minus sign differently from an argument of -1.
它们可能会将只有一个负号的参数与处理为-1的参数有所不同。
A few prefix keys don’t support <k3>C-h</k3> or <k4>?</k4> in this way, because they define other meanings for those inputs, but they all support <t5>F1</t5>.)
有几个前缀键不支持<k3>C-h</k3>或<k4>?</k4>，因为它们为这些输入定义了其他含义，但它们都支持<t5>F1</t5>。)
A few special commands are also provided:
还提供了一些特殊命令：
A floating-point number specifies a fraction of the frame’s height; an integer specifies the maximum number of lines; <c1>nil</c1> means do not resize the minibuffer window automatically.
浮点数表示占窗体的比例；整数表示指定最大行数；<c1>nil</c1>表示不自动调整迷你缓冲区窗口的大小。
A good way to force a normal yank is <k5>C-u C-y</k5>.
强制执行一个普通粘贴的一个好方法是<k5>C-u C-y</k5>。
A help buffer can also contain hyperlinks to Info manuals, source code definitions, and URLs (web pages).
帮助缓冲区还可以包含指向Info手册、源代码定义和URL(网页)的超链接。
A major mode is a principal editing mode for the buffer, such as Text mode, Lisp mode, C mode, and so forth.
主模式是缓冲区的主要编辑模式，诸如文本模式、Lisp模式、C模式等。
A matching completion alternative must contain the text in the minibuffer before point, and the text in the minibuffer after point, as substrings (in that same order).
匹配的补全选项必须将迷你缓冲区中的文本包含在游标之前，而将迷你缓冲区中的文本包含在游标之后，作为子字符串(顺序相同)。
A matching completion alternative must have the same beginning as the text in the minibuffer before point.
匹配的补全替换必须与迷你缓冲区中游标之前的文本具有相同的开头。
A minus sign without digits normally means -1.
不带数字的负号通常表示-1。
A negative argument counts lines up from the bottom (-1 means the bottom line).
负参数从底部向上计数行(-1表示底线)。
A numeric argument says which screen line to place point on, counting downward from the top of the window (zero means the top line).
一个数字参数表示从窗口顶部开始向下计数，将游标放在哪个屏幕行上(零表示顶行)。
A numeric argument specifies which command to repeat; 1 means the last one, 2 the previous, and so on.
数字参数指定要重复的命令；1表示最后一个命令，2表示上一个命令，依此类推。
A numeric argument to <k0>C-q</k0> or <k1>C-x 8 ...</k1> specifies how many copies of the character to insert (see <a2>Arguments</a2>).
<k0>C-q</k0>或<k1>C-x 8 ...</k1>的数字参数指定要插入多少个字符副本(请参阅<a2>参数</a2>)。
A numeric prefix argument <v6>n</v6> means to fetch the <v7>n</v7>th matching entry.
数字前缀参数<v6>n</v6>表示提取<v7>n</v7>条匹配。
A prefix argument can be used to specify the number of context lines for each match, default is
使用前缀参数可以定义每次查找匹配多少行,默认为1行。
A prefix key combines with the following input event to make a longer key sequence.
前缀键与随后的输入事件相结合以形成更长的按键序列。
A provisional choice appears in the echo area.
回显区中会出现一个临时选项。
A search string can use Boolean operators ‘<s0>&</s0>’ for AND and ‘<s1>|</s1>’ for OR.
搜索过程可以使用布尔运算符. `&`表示`与`,`|`表示`或`.
A simple example may help here.
这里有一个简单的例子可能会有所帮助。
A timestamp<a0><s1>71</s1></a0> is added under the deadline, to keep a record that you actually acted on the previous instance of this deadline.
截止日期下面会添加一条时间戳<a0><s1>71</s1></a0>，以记录您在此截止日期的上一个实例中实际操作的情况。
A tree works like your brain.
类似大脑工作原理的一棵树。
A two-character key sequence is used to make it harder to type by accident.
使用两个字符的按键序列是为了增加意外键入的难度。
A ‘<s1>...</s1>’ at the end of a menu item means that the command will prompt you for further input before it actually does anything.
菜单项末尾的“<s1>.</s1>”表示该命令将在实际执行任何操作之前提示您进一步输入。
A.5 任意语法中的表格
A.5.2 A LaTeX example of radio tables
A.5.2 无线电表格的LaTeX示例
在不安装更改的情况下中止。
Access to other Org mode features.
Add current file to the list of agenda files.
将当前文件加入变量org-agenda files。
Adding the non-predefined tag ‘<s11>sarah</s11>’ could be done with <k12>C-c C-c <s13>TAB</s13> s a r a h <s14>RET</s14></k12>.
可以使用<k12>C-c-c<s13>TAB</s13>s a r a h<s14>ret</s14></k12>添加非预定义标签<s11>arah</s11>’。
After <k5>C-o</k5>, type the text for the new line.
在<k5>C-o</k5>之后，键入新行的文本。
After a change to BBDB, or for the first agenda display during an Emacs session, the agenda display suffers a short delay as Org updates its hash with anniversaries.
在更改BBDB之后，或者对于Emacs会话期间的第一次议程显示，由于Org使用周年纪念更新其散列，因此议程显示会出现短暂延迟。
After a colon, <k0>M-<s1>TAB</s1></k0> offers completion on tags.
冒号之后，<k0>M-<s1>TAB</s1></k0>提供标签的补全。
After finding the desired previous command, you can edit its expression as usual and then execute it by typing <t4>RET</t4>.
找到所需的前一个命令后，您可以像往常一样编辑其表达式，然后通过键入<t4>RET</t4>来执行它。
After pressing <k0><s1>RET</s1></k0>, the tags are inserted and aligned to <c2>org-tags-column</c2>.
After pressing <k2>< <</k2>, you still need to press the character selecting the command.
按下<k2><<</k2>后，您仍需要再按下一个字符来选择要执行的命令。
After pressing <k2><</k2>, you still need to press the character selecting the command.
按下<k2><</k2>后，您仍需要再按下一个字符来选择要执行的命令。
在那之后，一切都会自动发生。
After ‘<s0>Char:</s0>’, this shows the character in the buffer at point.
在“<s0>Char:</s0>”之后，显示缓冲区中的游标所在的字符。
After ‘<s3>point=</s3>’ is the position of point as a character count (the first character in the buffer is position 1, the second character is position 2, and so on).
在‘<s3>point=</s3>’之后是游标位置的字符计数(缓冲区中的第一个字符是位置1，第二个字符是位置2，依此类推)。
After ‘<s4>column=</s4>’ is the horizontal position of point, in columns counting from the left edge of the window.
在‘<s4>column=</s4>’之后是游标的水平位置，以从窗口左边缘开始计数的列为单位。
All diary entries including holidays, anniversaries, etc., are included in the agenda buffer created by Org mode.
所有日记条目(包括节假日、周年纪念等)都包含在由Org mode创建的议程缓冲区中。
All of this is achieved with strictly plain text files, the most portable and future-proof file format.
所有这些都是通过严格的纯文本文件实现的，这是可移植且面向未来的文件格式。
All reference documents are put in a <c0>references</c0> folder next to my Orgmode files.
所有引用文件都放在我的Orgmode文件旁边的<c0>references</c0>文件夹中。
All the rest which did not fit elsewhere.
所有其他地方放不下的剩余部分。
All the stuff you need in a single buffer.
你需要的所有东西都放在一个缓冲区里。
所有未完成的行动项目。
All you need to do is to add the following to one of your agenda files:
您只需将以下内容添加到您的一个议程文件中：
Allowed values for this property are ‘<s2>folded</s2>’, ‘<s3>children</s3>’, ‘<s4>content</s4>’, and ‘<s5>all</s5>’.
Also see <c0>org-refile-keep</c0> to make this the default behavior, and beware that this may result in duplicated ‘<s1>ID</s1>’ properties.
另请参见<c0>org-refile-keep</c0>将其设置为默认行为，并请注意，这可能导致重复的" <s1>ID</s1>"属性。
Also turn a headline into a normal line by removing the stars.
还可以通过去掉星号来将标题转换为正常行。
Also, a working <t10>Alt</t10> key acts like <k11>C-x 8</k11> (unless followed by <t12>RET</t12>); e.g., <k13>A-[</k13> acts like <k14>C-x 8 [</k14> and inserts <t15>‘</t15>.
此外，工作的<t10>Alt</t10>键类似于<k11>C-x 8</k11>(除非后面紧跟<t12>RET</t12>)；例如，<k13>A-[</k13>类似于<k14>C-x 8 [</k14>并插入<t15>‘</t15>。
Also, hovering the mouse pointer above mouse-sensitive portions of the mode line shows tooltips (see <a2>Tooltips</a2>) with information about commands you can invoke by clicking on the mode line.
此外，将鼠标指针悬停在模式行的鼠标敏感部分上方会显示工具提示(请参阅<a2>工具提示</a2>)，其中包含有关通过单击状态栏可以调用的命令的信息。
Alternative defaults for the file name you may want are available by typing <k0>M-n</k0>, see <a1>Minibuffer History</a1>.
可以通过键入<k0>M-n</k0>获得您可能需要的文件名的其他默认值，请参阅<a1>迷你缓冲区历史</a1>。
Alternatively, you can ignore the default, and enter an absolute file name starting with a slash or a tilde after the default directory.
或者，您可以忽略默认设置，在默认目录后输入以斜杠或波浪号开头的绝对文件名。
Alternatively, you can type <k1>C-g</k1> to exit the minibuffer by canceling the command asking for the argument (see <a2>Quitting</a2>).
或者，您也可以键入<k1>C-g</k1>，通过取消请求参数的命令来退出微型缓冲区(请参阅<a2>退出</a2>)。
Alternatively, you can use <k3>M-<s4>DEL</s4></k3> to kill directory names backwards (see <a5>Words</a5>).
或者，您也可以使用<k3>M-<s4>DEL</s4></k3>向后删除目录名(请参阅<a5>单词</a5>)。
Alternatively, you can use the <k4>C-o</k4> (<c5>open-line</c5>) command (see <a6>Blank Lines</a6>).
或者，您也可以使用<k4>C-o</k4>(<c5>open-line</c5>)命令(请参阅<a6>空行</a6>)。
Alternatively, you can use the command <k0>C-x 8 <s1>RET</s1></k0> (<c2>insert-char</c2>).
Although completion is usually done in the minibuffer, the feature is sometimes available in ordinary buffers too.
虽然补全通常是在小缓冲区中补全的，但有时普通缓冲区中也可以使用该功能。
Although each editing command usually makes a separate entry in the undo records, very simple commands may be grouped together.
虽然每个编辑命令通常会在撤消记录中创建一个单独的条目，但也可以将非常简单的命令组合在一起。
An Emacs command may require you to answer a yes-or-no question during the course of its execution.
Emacs命令可能要求您在执行过程中回答是或否的问题。
An Emacs window is where the <e0>buffer</e0>—the text or other graphics you are editing or viewing—is displayed.
Emacs窗口显示<e0>缓冲区</e0>-您正在编辑或查看的文本或其他图形。
An abbreviation facility for minibuffer input.
一种用于迷你缓冲区输入的缩写工具。
An abbreviation that is unique among command names may not be unique among all function names.
在命令名中唯一的缩写在所有函数名中可能不是唯一的。
An alternate way to show an example.
展示示例的另一种方式。
An alternative to using a repeater is to create a number of copies of a task subtree, with dates shifted in each copy.
使用复读机的另一种选择是创建任务子树的多个副本，每个副本中的日期都会被移动。
An apropos pattern is interpreted as a regular expression if it contains any of the regular expression special characters, ‘<s1>^$*+?.\[</s1>’.
如果一个主题模式包含任何正则表达式特殊字符‘<s1>^$*+？.\[</s1>’，则该模式被解释为正则表达式。
An arrow on the right edge of a menu item means it leads to a subsidiary menu, or <e0>submenu</e0>.
菜单项右边缘的箭头表示它通向子菜单或<e0>子菜单</e0>。
An earlier version (7.3) of this manual is available as a <a0>paperback book from Network Theory Ltd.</a0>.
本手册的早期版本（7.3）可作为<a0>平装书从Network Theory Ltd获得。</a0>.
An empty line after the end of a subtree is considered part of it and is hidden when the subtree is folded.
子树末尾之后的空行被认为是子树的一部分，并且在子树折叠时被隐藏。
An example of a command that uses this behavior is <k0>M-x</k0>, since it is meaningless for it to accept a non-existent command name.
使用此行为的命令的一个示例是<k0>M-x</k0>，因为它接受不存在的命令名是没有意义的。
An excellent way to implement labels and contexts for cross-correlating information is to assign <e0>tags</e0> to headlines.
实现交叉关联信息的标注和上下文的一个很好的方法是将<e0>标签</e0>分配给标题。
An index of Org’s concepts and features.
An index that reaches across pages.
An overview of this structure is achieved by folding, i.e., hiding large parts of the document to show only the general document structure and the parts currently being worked on.
这种结构的概述是通过折叠来实现的，即隐藏文档的大部分以仅显示一般文档结构和当前正在处理的部分。
An upper-case letter in the regular expression makes the search case-sensitive (see <a8>Lax Search</a8>).
正则表达式中的大写字母使搜索区分大小写(请参见<a8>松散搜索</a8>)。
Another <t8>SPC</t8> at this point completes all the way to ‘<s9>auto-fill-mode</s9>’.
Another common way is the curved quote convention, which uses left and right single or double quotation marks ‘<t2>like this</t2>’ or “<t3>like this</t3>”<a4><s5>11</s5></a4>.
另一种常见的方法是弯曲引号约定，它使用左右单引号或双引号‘<t2>像这样</t2>’或“<t3>像这样</t3>”<a4><s5>11</s5></a4>。

Another convention, employed by older Macintosh systems, uses a carriage return character instead of a newline; when editing such files, the colon changes to either a forward slash (‘<s4>/</s4>’) or ‘<s5>(Mac)</s5>’.
较旧的Macintosh系统使用的另一个约定是使用回车符而不是换行符；当编辑这样的文件时，冒号变为正斜杠(‘<s4>/</s4>’)或‘<s5>(Mac)</s5>’。
Any element ending in a slash (<s1>/</s1>) represents a subdirectory name.
任何以斜杠(<s1>/</s1>)结尾的元素都表示一个子目录名。
Any leading directory name in front of the <s7>~</s7> is ignored: thus, <s8>/u2/emacs/~/foo/bar.txt</s8> is equivalent to <s9>~/foo/bar.txt</s9>.
忽略<s7>~</s7>前面的任何前导目录名：因此，<s8>/u2/emacs/~/foo/bar.txt</s8>等同于<s9>~/foo/bar.txt</s9>。
Any other non-digit terminates the sequence and then acts as normal input—thus, <k3>C-q 1 0 1 B</k3> inserts ‘<s4>AB</s4>’.
任何其他非数字都会终止序列，然后充当正常输入-因此，<k3>C-q 1 0 1 B</k3>插入‘<s4>AB</s4>’。
Any other self-inserting character key inserts the associated character into the password, and all other input is ignored.
任何其他自插入字符键都会将关联的字符插入到密码中，并且忽略所有其他输入。
Any prefix argument to this command forces a normal <c4>yank</c4> to be executed, with the prefix passed along.
此命令的任何前缀参数都强制执行正常的<c4>粘贴</c4>操作，并传递前缀。
Anything containing that word matches the pattern.
任何包含这个词的东西都符合这个模式。
Apart from <k0>C-h g</k0>, they all have the form <k1>C-h C-<v2>char</v2></k1>.
除了<k0>C-h g</k0>之外，它们的形式都是<k1>C-h C-<v2>char</v2></k1>。
Apart from <k3>C-h k</k3>, there are many other help commands providing different kinds of help.
除了<k3>C-h k</k3>之外，还有许多其他帮助命令可提供不同类型的帮助。

Apart from the built-in documentation and manuals, Emacs contains several other files describing topics like copying conditions, release notes, instructions for debugging and reporting bugs, and so forth.
除了内置的文档和手册之外，Emacs还包含其他几个文件，描述复制条件、发行说明、调试和报告错误的说明等主题。

Archiving helps to keep the system compact and fast.
归档有助于保持系统的紧凑和快速。

As described earlier, <k1>C-n</k1> (<c2>next-line</c2>) and <k3>C-p</k3> (<c4>previous-line</c4>) are special exceptions: they move point down and up, respectively, by one screen line (see <a5>Moving Point</a5>).
如前所述，<k1>C-n</k1>(<c2>next-line</c2>)和<k3>C-p</k3>(<c4>previous-line</c4>)是特殊例外：它们分别将指针向下和向上移动一个屏幕行(请参阅<a5>移动游标</a5>)。
As we explain later in this manual, you can change the way Emacs handles text insertion by turning on <e0>minor modes</e0>.
正如我们在本手册后面部分所解释的，您可以通过打开<e0>辅模式</e0>来更改Emacs处理文本插入的方式。
As with <t5>RET</t5>, you can use <k6>C-q</k6> to insert a <t7>TAB</t7>, <t8>SPC</t8>, or ‘<s9>?</s9>’ character.
与<t5>5>RET</t5>一样，您可以使用<k6>C-q</k6>插入<t7>TAB</t7>、<t8>SPC</t8>或‘<s9>?</s9>’字符。
Asking about a command, variable or function name.
询问命令、变量或函数名的作用。
询问一个字符是做什么的。

询问指定快捷键在Emacs中的作用。

询问与给定主题有关的内容。

为树的枝干条目分配时间。
At any time, one window is the <e0>selected window</e0>.
在任何时候，都有一个窗口是<e0>选定窗口</e0>。
At the bottom of each window is a <e0>mode line</e0>, which describes what is going on in the current buffer.
在每个窗口的底部是一个<e0>状态栏</e0>，它描述当前缓冲区中正在发生的事情。
At the top of the frame is a <e0>menu bar</e0>, which allows you to access commands via a series of menus.
窗体顶部有一个<e0>菜单栏</e0>，允许您通过一系列菜单访问命令。
At the very bottom of the frame is an <e2>echo area</e2>, where informative messages are displayed and where you enter information when Emacs asks for it.
在窗体的最底部是<e2>回显区</e2>，在此显示信息性消息，并在Emacs要求输入信息时在其中输入信息。

基本上，您需要一个名为“<s0>纪念日</s0>”的字段用于BBDB记录，该字段包含格式为“<s1>YYYY-MM-DD</s1>”或“<s2>MM-DD</s2>”的日期，后跟一个空格和周年纪念的类别(“<s3>生日</s3>”、“<s4>婚礼</s4>”或格式字符串)。
Beautiful math also on the web.
网上也有漂亮的数学作品。

在报告错误之前，使用最少的自定义启动Emacs并重现问题非常有帮助。

By contrast, <c3>what-line</c3> displays both the line number relative to the narrowed region and the line number relative to the whole buffer.
相比之下，<c3>what-line</c3>既显示相对于聚焦区域的行号，又显示相对于整个缓冲区的行号。
By convention, a command name consists of one or more words, separated by hyphens; for example, <c0>auto-fill-mode</c0> or <c1>manual-entry</c1>.
按照惯例，命令名由一个或多个用连字符分隔的单词组成；例如，<c0>auto-fill-mode</c0>或<c1>manual-entry</c1>。
By default Org mode uses the standard minibuffer completion facilities for entering tags.
默认情况下，Org mode使用标准的迷你缓冲区完成功能来输入标签。
By default this list is constructed dynamically, containing all tags currently used in the buffer<a1><s2>53</s2></a1>.
默认情况下，此列表是动态构建的，包含缓冲区<a1><s2>53</s2></a1>中当前使用的所有标签。
By default, Org maintains only a single agenda buffer and rebuilds it each time you change the view, to make sure everything is always up to date.
默认情况下，Org只会维持一个议程buffer，为使显示的内容都是最新状态，当你更改议程视图使，其内容都会自动更新。
By default, all apropos commands except <c0>apropos-documentation</c0> list their results in alphabetical order.
默认情况下，除<c0>apropos-documentation</c0>之外的所有主题搜索命令都按字母顺序列出其结果。
By default, all level 1 headlines in the current buffer are considered to be targets, but you can have more complex definitions across a number of files.
默认情况下，当前缓冲区中的所有一级标题均被视为目标，但是您可以在多个文件中使用更复杂的定义。
By default, continued lines are wrapped at the right window edge.
默认情况下，连续行在窗口右边缘换行。
By default, its value invokes the <c1>ffap</c1> package (see <a2>FFAP</a2>), which tries to guess the default file or URL from the text around point.
默认情况下，它的值调用<c1>ffap</c1>包(请参阅<a2>FFAP</a2>)，该包尝试从游标周围的文本猜测默认文件或URL。

By default, the cursor in the selected window is drawn as a solid block and appears to be <e0>on</e0> a character, but you should think of point as <e1>between</e1> two characters; it is situated <e2>before</e2> the character under the cursor.
默认情况下，所选窗口中的光标绘制为实心框，并在字符<e0>上</e0>显示，但您应将游标视为在两个字符<e1>之间</e1>；它位于光标下的字符<e2>之前</e2>。
By default, the report ignores commented (see <a0>Comment Lines</a0>) and archived (see <a1>Internal archiving</a1>) entries.
默认情况下，agenda buffer 会忽略被注释（详见<a0>行注释</a0>）和归档（详见<a1>内部归档</a1>）的条目。
By default, this lists items with a state the is not a DONE state.
默认情况下，该命令会列出所有状态不是“DONE”的事项。
By using them in <k0>C-h a</k0>, you will also get a feel for the naming conventions.
通过在<k0>C-h a</k0>中使用它们，您还将对命名约定有所了解。
C-h i d m emacs <s0>RET</s0> i <v1>topic</v1> <s2>RET</s2>

C-h i d m emacs <s0>RET</s0> s <v1>topic</v1> <s2>RET</s2>
C-h i d m emacs <s0>RET</s0> s <v1>主题</v1> <s2>RET</s2>
C.1 ADDENDUM: How to use this License for your documents
C.1 附录：如何将本许可证用于您的文档
Caching of refile targets can be turned on by setting <c0>org-refile-use-cache</c0>.
可以通过设置<c0>org-refile-use-cache</c0>来打开转接目标的缓存
Call functions from the command line.
Calling the command with a <k0>C-u</k0> prefix unconditionally inserts a new heading at the end of the current subtree, thus preserving its contents.
无条件地调用带有<k0>C-u</k0>前缀的命令会在当前子树的末尾插入一个新标题，从而保留其内容。
Capturing a thought is one key press away: simply Press <c0>C-c c</c0>, and a capture popup will appear in Emacs.
只需按一个按键即可捕获思想：只需按<c0>C-c c</c0>，捕获弹出窗口就会出现在Emacs中。
Case differences are ignored when completing arguments in which case does not matter.
补全参数时忽略大小写差异，在这种情况下大小写无关紧要。
Case is significant when completing case-sensitive arguments, such as command names.
在补全区分大小写的参数(如命令名)时，大小写非常重要。
Cautious completion is used for reading file names for files that must already exist, for example.
例如，谨慎补全用于读取必须已经存在的文件的文件名。
Changing sequence and level of headlines.
改变标题的顺序和级别。
Changing the appearance of the output.
Clear all tags for this line.
Click on a button with <k3>mouse-1</k3> or <k4>mouse-2</k4> to see the list of other packages related to that keyword.
用<k3>鼠标左键</k3>或<k4>鼠标右键</k4>单击一个按钮，查看与该关键字相关的其他软件包的列表。
Clone a subtree by making a number of sibling copies of it.
通过制作多个同级副本来克隆子树。
Command names and some internal functions.
Command names mostly use complete English words to make them easier to remember.
命令名称大多使用完整的英文单词，以便于记忆。
Command to use an Iswitchb-like interface to switch to and between Org buffers.
使用类似iswitchb的界面来在各org buffer之间切换.
Commands for asking Emacs about its commands.
用于向Emacs询问关于命令的信息。
Commands such as <k0>C-x C-f</k0> (<c1>find-file</c1>) use the minibuffer to read a file name argument (see <a2>Basic Files</a2>).
<k0>C-x C-f</k0>(<c1>find-file</c1>)等命令使用迷你缓冲区读取文件名参数(请参阅<a2>基本文件</a2>)。
Commands that don’t have key bindings, can still be invoked after typing less than their full name at the ‘<s0>M-x</s0>’ prompt.
在“<s0>M-x</s0>”提示符下键入的全名小于其全名后，仍可以调用没有键绑定的命令。

Commands that take a long time often display messages ending in ‘<s6>...</s6>’ while they are working (sometimes also indicating how much progress has been made, as a percentage), and add ‘<s7>done</s7>’ when they are finished.
耗时较长的命令通常在工作时显示以“<s6>.</s6>”结尾的消息(有时还以百分比形式指示已取得的进展)，并在补全时添加“<s7>补全</s7>”。
Commands to display auxiliary help files.
用于显示辅助帮助文件的命令。
用于插入时间戳的命令。
Commands to invoke and terminate capture.
调用和终止捕获的命令。
Compile an agenda for the current week from a list of Org files.
从Org文件列表中编译本周的议程。
Complete the text in the minibuffer as much as possible; if unable to complete, display a list of possible completions (<c0>minibuffer-complete</c0>).
尽可能补全迷你缓冲区中的文本；如果无法补全，则显示可能补全的列表(<c0>minibuffer-complete</c0>)。
Complete up to one word from the minibuffer text before point (<c0>minibuffer-complete-word</c0>).
在游标之前尽可能的补全迷你缓冲区文本中的一个单词(<c0>minibuffer-complete-word</c0>)。
补全并且提交迷你缓冲区文本。
Completion commands work by narrowing a large list of possible completion alternatives to a smaller subset that matches what you have typed in the minibuffer.
补全命令的工作方式是将可能的补全备选方案的大列表缩小到与您在迷你缓冲区中键入的内容相匹配的较小子集。
Complexity is not imposed, but a large amount of functionality is available when needed.
虽然并不要求复杂性，但是在需要时有大量的功能可以使用。
Computer manufacturers are free to distribute copies on the same terms that apply to everyone else.
计算机制造商可以按照适用于其他所有人的相同条款自由分发副本。
Configure the list of stuck projects (see <a0>Stuck projects</a0>).
可以通过设置变量org-stuck-projects来自定义停滞的项目和查找方式（详见<a0>停滞的项目）。</a0>
Configure the variable <c0>org-agenda-todo-list-sublevels</c0> to get this behavior.
您可以通过设置变量<c0>org-agenda-todo-list-sublevels</c0>来实现。

Configure the variables <c4>org-agenda-todo-ignore-scheduled</c4> to exclude some or all scheduled items from the global TODO list, <c5>org-agenda-todo-ignore-deadlines</c5> to exclude some or all items with a deadline set, <c6>org-agenda-todo-ignore-timestamp</c6> to exclude some or all items with an active timestamp other than a DEADLINE or a SCHEDULED timestamp and/or <c7>org-agenda-todo-ignore-with-date</c7> to exclude items with at least one active timestamp.

您可以设置变量<c4>org-agenda-todo-ignore-scheduled</c4>来剔除部分或所有定期事项，设置变量<c5>org-agenda-todo-ignore-deadlines</c5>来剔除部分或所有带有截止日期的事项，设置变量<c6>org-agenda-todo-ignore-timestamp</c6>来剔除部分或所有含有除DEADLINE和SCHEDULED之外时间戳的事项，设置变量<c7>org-agenda-todo-ignore-with-date</c7>来剔除所有含有至少一个时间戳的事项。
Copy the <e0>visible</e0> text in the region into the kill ring.
将区域中的<e0>可见性</e0>文本复制到剪切板中。
Copying works like refiling, except that the original note is not deleted.
复制的过程与转接一样，只是不删除原始笔记。

Create a list of entries selected by a boolean expression of keywords and/or regular expressions that must or must not occur in the entry.

Creating custom agenda commands can be a bit tricky at first, one easy way is to customize them via <c0>M-x customize-variable RET org-agenda-custom-commands</c0>.
创建自定义议程命令一开始可能有点棘手，一种简单的方法是通过<c0>M-x customize-variable RET org-agenda-custom-commands</c0>对它们进行自定义。
Cutting, finding the right location, and then pasting the note is cumbersome.
剪切，找到正确的位置，然后粘贴笔记。这样做很麻烦。
Cycle through agenda file list, visiting one file after the other.
按照agenda文件列表(org-agenda-files)的顺序,依次浏览所有文件。
在各种可见性状态之间循环。
Deadlines and scheduled items produce entries in the agenda when they are over-due, so it is important to be able to mark such an entry as done once you have done so.
截止日期和日程安排在过期时会在议程中生成条目，因此，一旦您这样做了，就能够将此类条目标记为已完成，这一点很重要。
Define the outline of different note types.
针对不同的笔记类型定义大纲。
定义自定义搜索内容和显示视图。
Delete all but one of many consecutive blank lines (<c0>delete-blank-lines</c0>).
删除多个连续空行中的一个以外的所有行(<c0>delete-blank-lines</c0>)。
Delete the character after point, or the region if it is active (<c0>delete-forward-char</c0>).
删除游标之后的字符，如果选区处于活动状态，则将其删除(<c0>delete-ward-char</c0>)。
Delete the character before point, or the region if it is active (<c0>delete-backward-char</c0>).
删除游标之前的字符，或者如果选区处于活动状态(<c0>delete-back-char</c0>)。
Demote the current subtree by one level.
将当前子树降低一个级别。
Depending on <c0>org-reverse-note-order</c0>, it is either the first or last subitem.
是作为第一个还是最后一个子项，取决于<c0>org-reverse-note-order</c0>。
Depending on the task, this may not be the best way to handle it.
根据任务的不同，这可能不是处理它的最佳方式。

Depending on the variables <c0>org-yank-adjusted-subtrees</c0> and <c1>org-yank-folded-subtrees</c1>, Org’s internal <c2>yank</c2> command pastes subtrees folded and in a clever way, using the same command as <k3>C-c C-x C-y</k3>.
根据变量<c0>org-yank-adjusted-subtree</c0>和<c1>org-yank-folded-subtree</c1>的不同，Org的内部<c2>yank</c2>命令使用与<k3>C-c-x C-y</k3>相同的命令巧妙地粘贴折叠的子树。
Describe the coding systems currently in use.
描述当前使用的编码系统。
Did you notice that <c0>someday.org</c0> is not part of the agenda files set in <c1>org-agenda-files</c1>?
您是否注意到<c0>someday.org</c0>不是<c1>org-agenda-files</c1>中设置的议程文件的一部分？
不同的文件，不同的要求。
Different ways to set header arguments.
设置标头参数的不同方式。
Display a description of your last 300 keystrokes (<c0>view-lossage</c0>).
显示最近300次按键的说明(<c0>view-lossage</c0>)。
Display a list of commands whose names match <v0>topics</v0> (<c1>apropos-command</c1>).
显示名称与<v0>主题</v0>匹配的命令列表(<c1>apropos-command</c1>)。
Display all active key bindings; minor mode bindings first, then those of the major mode, then global bindings (<c0>describe-bindings</c0>).
显示所有激活的键绑定；首先显示辅模式绑定，然后显示主模式的绑定，然后显示全局绑定(<c0>describe-bindings</c0>)。
Display documentation about the specified package (<c0>describe-package</c0>).
显示有关指定包的文档(<c0>describe-package</c0>)。
Display documentation of the Lisp symbol named <v0>symbol</v0> (<c1>describe-symbol</c1>).
Display documentation of the current major mode and minor modes (<c0>describe-mode</c0>).
显示当前主模式和辅模式的文档(<c0>describe-mode</c0>)。
Display documentation on the Lisp function named <v0>function</v0> (<c1>describe-function</c1>).
显示有关名为<v0>function</v0>(<c1>describe-function</c1>)的Lisp函数的文档。
Display how to order or download the latest version of Emacs and other GNU software (<c0>describe-distribution</c0>).
显示如何订购或下载最新版本的Emacs和其他GNU软件(<c0>describe-distribution</c0>)。
Display information about ordering printed copies of Emacs manuals (<c0>view-order-manuals</c0>).
显示有关订购Emacs手册打印副本的信息(<c0>view-order-manuals</c0>)。
Display information about where to get external packages (<c0>view-external-packages</c0>).
显示有关从何处获取外部包的信息(<c0>view-external-packages</c0>)。
Display information on the character sets, coding systems, and input methods used in language environment <v0>language-env</v0> (<c1>describe-language-environment</c1>).
显示有关语言环境<v0>language-env</v0>(<c1>describe-language-environment</c1>)中使用的字符集、编码系统和输入法的信息。
Display news of recent Emacs changes (<c0>view-emacs-news</c0>).
Display the <s0>HELLO</s0> file, which shows examples of various character sets.
显示<s0>HELLO</s0>文件，该文件显示各种字符集的示例。
Display the Emacs manual in Info (<c0>info-emacs-manual</c0>).
Display the Info documentation on symbol <v0>symbol</v0> according to the programming language you are editing (<c1>info-lookup-symbol</c1>).
根据您正在编辑的编程语言(<c1>info-lookup-symbol</c1>)显示有关符号<v0>符号</v0>的信息文档。
Display the character code of character after point, character position of point, and column of point (<c0>what-cursor-position</c0>).
显示游标之后的字符编码、游标的字符位置、游标的列(<c0>what-cursor-position</c0>)。
Display the commands and variables whose documentation matches <v0>topics</v0> (<c1>apropos-documentation</c1>).
显示其文档与<v0>主题</v0>(<c1>apropos-documentation</c1>)匹配的命令和变量。
Display the contents of the current <e0>syntax table</e0> (<c1>describe-syntax</c1>).
Display the documentation of the Lisp variable <v0>var</v0> (<c1>describe-variable</c1>).
Display the entire command history, showing all the commands <k0>C-x <s1>ESC</s1> <s2>ESC</s2></k0> can repeat, most recent first.
显示整个命令历史记录，显示<k0>C-x <s1>ESC</s1> <s2>ESC</s2></k0>可以重复的所有命令，最新的最先。
Display the full details on the complete absence of warranty for GNU Emacs (<c0>describe-no-warranty</c0>).
显示GNU Emacs完全没有保修的完整详细信息(<c0>describe-no-warranty</c0>)。
Display the help message for a special text area, if point is in one (<c0>display-local-help</c0>).
如果游标在一个文本区域(<c0>display-local-help</c0>)，则显示特殊文本区域的帮助消息。
Display the line number of point.
Display the list of known Emacs problems, sometimes with suggested workarounds (<c0>view-emacs-problems</c0>).
显示已知Emacs问题的列表，有时带有建议的解决方法(<c0>view-emacs-problems</c0>)。
Display the name and documentation of the command that <v0>key</v0> runs (<c1>describe-key</c1>).
显示<v0>快捷键</v0>运行的命令的名称和文档(<c1>describe-key</c1>)。
Display the news, which lists the new features in this version of Emacs (<c0>view-emacs-news</c0>).
显示新闻，其中列出了此版本的Emacs中的新功能(<c0>view-emacs-news</c0>)。
Display the number of lines, words, and characters that are present in the buffer.
显示缓冲区中存在的行数、字数和字符数。
Display the number of lines, words, and characters that are present in the region (<c0>count-words-region</c0>).
显示区域中存在的行数、字数和字符数(<c0>count-word-region</c0>)。
Display the rules under which you can copy and redistribute Emacs (<c0>describe-copying</c0>).
显示可以复制和重新分发Emacs的规则(<c0>describe-copying</c0>)。
Do not forget to document the steps you take.
不要忘记记录你采取的步骤。
Do not forget to press <k0>C-c C-c</k0> with point in one of these lines to activate any changes.
不要忘记将光标放在这些行中的一行上按<k0>C-c-c</k0>以激活任何更改。
Do not use it as a title for your own headings.
不要将其作为你自己的笔记的标题。
Do whatever you have to do to hit the error.
做你必须做的一切以解决错误。
Doing so often helps you determine if the problem is with your customization or with Org mode itself.
这样做通常可以帮助您确定问题出在您的自定义设置还是Org模式本身。
Doing so replaces the contents of the help buffer; to retrace your steps, type <k6>C-c C-b</k6> or <k7>l</k7> (<c8>help-go-back</c8>).
这样做将替换帮助缓冲区的内容；要回溯您的步骤，请键入<k6>C-c C-b</k6>或<k7>l</k7>(<c8>help-go-back</c8>)。
Donations to the Free Software Foundation are tax-deductible in the US.
在美国，对自由软件基金会的捐款是免税的。
Due to the way Org works, TODO items, time-stamped items, and tagged headlines can be scattered throughout a file or even a number of files.
由于 Org-mode 的工作方式，代办事项、定时事项和带标签的标题会散落在一个甚至几个文件中。
During a later weekly review, I’ll move it back to <c1>gtd.org</c1> when it will become active again.
在以后的每周审查期间，我会将其移回<c1>gtd.org</c1>，届时它将再次变为正在进行状态。
During completion, Emacs tries each completion style in turn.
在补全过程中，Emacs会依次尝试每种补全风格。
During each weekly review, I move projects back and forth between the “active” state (in <c0>gtd.org</c0>) and “later” state (in <c1>someday.org</c1>).
在每周审查期间，我在“正在进行”状态(在<c0>gtd.org</c0>中)和“将来/也许”状态(在<c1>someday.org</c1>中)之间来回移动项目。
During my weekly reviews, I archive done projects using <c0>C-c C-x C-a</c0> (<c1>org-archive-subtree-default</c1>), which moved the entry at point to an archive file.
在每周审查期间，我使用<c0>C-c C-x C-a</c0>(<c1>org-archive-subtree-default</c1>)将已完成的项目存档，它将条目移动到存档文件。

E.g., if ‘<s1>work</s1>’ is a group tag for the group ‘<s2>:work:lab:conf:</s2>’, then searching for ‘<s3>work</s3>’ also searches for ‘<s4>{\(?:work\|lab\|conf\)}</s4>’ and searching for ‘<s5>-work</s5>’ searches for all headlines but those with one of the tags in the group (i.e., ‘<s6>-{\(?:work\|lab\|conf\)}</s6>’).
举个例子，如果<s1>work</s1>是一个标签组<s2>:work:lab:conf</s2>里的标签，那么搜索<s3>work</s3>时会同时搜索<s4>{\(?:work\|lab\|conf\)}</s4>，搜索<s5>-work</s5>时会搜索所有不包含在标签组（<s6>{\(?:work\|lab\|conf\)}</s6>)中的标签的标题。
EBDB comes with integration for a few other Emacs packages, including Org and a number of mail user agents; see the following sections below for details.
EBDB附带了对其他几个Emacs包的集成，包括 org和许多邮件用户代理；请参阅以下各节 有关详细信息，请参阅。
Each <k2>M-p</k2> fetches an earlier item from the history list into the minibuffer, replacing its existing contents.
每个<k2>M-p</k2>从历史记录列表中取出一个较早的项到迷你缓冲区，替换其现有内容。
Each Emacs frame normally has a <e0>menu bar</e0> at the top which you can use to perform common operations.
每个Emacs窗体的顶部通常都有一个<e0>菜单栏</e0>，您可以使用它来执行常见操作。
Each Emacs major mode typically redefines a few keys and makes other changes in how editing works.
每个Emacs主模式通常重新定义几个键，并对编辑工作方式进行其他更改。
Each command name comes with a brief description and a list of keys you can currently invoke it with.
每个命令名都有一个简短的描述和当前可以用来调用它的键的列表。
Each element in the list should be a string; any file name ending in such a string is ignored as a completion alternative.
列表中的每个元素都应该是一个字符串；任何以这样的字符串结尾的文件名都会被忽略，作为补全选项。
Each element in the search is either a tag, a regular expression matching tags, or an expression like ‘<s4>PROPERTY OPERATOR VALUE</s4>’ with a comparison operator, accessing a property value.
搜索过程中的每一匹配项可以是一个标签，一条匹配某个标签的正则，或是一条型如`PROPERTY OPERATOR VALUE`的表达式。
Each element is a Lisp expression that describes one command and its arguments.
每个元素都是描述一个命令及其参数的Lisp表达式。
Each element may be preceded by ‘<s5>-</s5>’ to select against it, and ‘<s6>+</s6>’ is syntactic sugar for positive selection.
每个匹配项之前可以附加前缀，'<s5>-</s5>'表示不匹配，'<s6>+</s6>'表示匹配。
Each frame consists of several distinct regions.
每个窗体由几个不同的区域组成。
Each list element is the name of a completion style (a Lisp symbol).
每个列表元素都是一个补全风格的名称(一个Lisp符号)。
Each menu item is also designated by a letter or digit (usually the initial of some word in the item’s name).
每个菜单项也由字母或数字(通常是项目名称中某个单词的首字母)指定。
Each of the following apropos commands reads an apropos pattern in the minibuffer, searches for items that match the pattern, and displays the results in a different window.
下面的每个主题搜索命令都读取微型缓冲区中的一个主题模式，搜索与该模式匹配的项目，并在不同的窗口中显示结果。
Each of these commands asks for a <e4>regular expression</e4> as an argument, and fetches the first matching entry into the minibuffer.
这些命令中的每一个都要求将<e4>正则表达式</e4>作为参数，并将第一个匹配的条目提取到迷你缓冲区中。
Each project contains actions to be performed.
每个项目都包含要执行的行动。
Electric commands at the beginning of a headline.
Emacs accepts other command line arguments that tell it to load certain Lisp files, where to put the initial frame, and so forth.
Emacs接受其他命令行参数，这些参数告诉它加载某些Lisp文件，将初始窗体放在哪里，等等。
Emacs actually creates the file the first time you save this buffer with <k1>C-x C-s</k1>.
Emacs实际上在您第一次使用<k1>C-x C-s</k1>保存此缓冲区时创建了该文件。
Emacs also asks for confirmation if any subprocesses are still running, since killing Emacs will also kill the subprocesses (see <a4>Shell</a4>).
Emacs还要求确认是否有任何子进程仍在运行，因为终止Emacs也会终止子进程(请参阅<a4>Shell</a4>)。
Emacs also provides a variety of additional keyboard commands that move point in more sophisticated ways.
Emacs还提供了以更复杂的方式移动点的各种附加键盘命令。
Emacs also recognizes control characters that are entered using <e0>modifier keys</e0>.
Emacs还可以识别使用<e0>修饰键</e0>输入的控制字符。
Emacs also usually draws the mode line of the selected window with a different color from that of unselected windows, in order to make it stand out.
Emacs通常还使用与未选择窗口不同的颜色绘制所选窗口的状态栏，以使其突出。
Emacs attempts to offer plausible completions under most circumstances.
Emacs试图在大多数情况下提供看似合理的补全。
Emacs behaves very similarly on both kinds of frames.
Emacs在这两种窗体上的行为非常相似。
Emacs can optionally <e0>truncate</e0> long logical lines instead of continuing them.
Emacs可以选择<e0>截断</e0>长逻辑行，而不是接续它们。
Emacs can, optionally, record certain session information when you kill it, such as the files you were visiting at the time.
当您终止Emacs时，Emacs可以选择性地记录某些会话信息，例如您当时正在访问的文件。
Emacs contains several hundred built-in packages, and more can be installed over the network (see <a1>Packages</a1>).
Emacs包含数百个内置软件包，还可以通过网络安装更多(请参阅<a1>包</a1>)。
Emacs contains the calendar and diary by Edward M. Reingold.
Emacs包含了Edward M. Reingold的日历和日记。
Emacs displays a prompt in the echo area (such as ‘<s0>Password: </s0>’); after you type the required password, press <t1>RET</t1> to submit it.
Emacs在回显区显示提示(例如‘<s0>password：</s0>’)；在您键入所需的密码后，按<t1>RET</t1>提交密码。
Emacs disregards <c13>completion-ignored-extensions</c13> when showing completion alternatives in the completion list.
在补全列表中显示补全备选选项时，Emacs忽略<c13>completion-ignored-extensions</c13>。
Emacs editing commands operate in terms of characters, words, lines, sentences, paragraphs, and pages, as well as expressions and comments in various programming languages.
Emacs编辑命令根据字符、单词、行、句子、段落和页面以及各种编程语言的表达式和注释进行操作。
Emacs interprets <s0>~/</s0> as your home directory.
Emacs is one of the most widely ported programs, so that Org mode is available on every major platform.
Emacs是最广泛的移植程序之一，因此Org模式可以在每个主流平台上使用。
Emacs is the extensible, customizable, self-documenting real-time display editor.
Emacs是可扩展的、可自定义的、自文档的实时显示编辑器。
Emacs keeps separate history lists for several different kinds of arguments.
Emacs为几种不同类型的参数保存单独的历史记录列表。
Emacs mentions such shorthands in the echo area if they are significantly shorter than the full command name, and <c1>extended-command-suggest-shorter</c1> is non-<c2>nil</c2>.
如果这些速记比完整命令名短得多，则Emacs会回显区中提及这些速记，并且<c1>extended-command-suggest-shorter</c1>是非<c2>nil</c2>。
Emacs normally disallows most commands that use the minibuffer while the minibuffer is active.
在迷你缓冲区处于活动状态时，Emacs通常不允许大多数使用迷你缓冲区的命令。
Emacs obeys this command by <e0>visiting</e0> the file: it creates a buffer, copies the contents of the file into the buffer, and then displays the buffer for editing.
Emacs遵循此命令，<e0>访问</e0>文件：它创建一个缓冲区，将文件内容复制到缓冲区中，然后显示缓冲区进行编辑。
Emacs performs completion using one or more <e0>completion styles</e0>—sets of criteria for matching minibuffer text to completion alternatives.
Emacs使用一个或多个<e0>补全风格</e0>-用于将迷你缓冲区文本与补全备选方案相匹配的标准集来执行补全。
Emacs provides a wide variety of help commands, all accessible through the prefix key <k0>C-h</k0> (or, equivalently, the function key <t1>F1</t1>).
Emacs提供了各种各样的帮助命令，都可以通过前缀键<k0>C-h</k0>(或等效的功能键<t1>F1</t1>)访问。
Emacs records a list of changes made in the buffer text, so you can undo recent changes.
Emacs记录缓冲区文本中所做更改的列表，因此您可以撤消最近的更改。
Emacs supports 3 additional modifier keys, see <a0>Modifier Keys</a0>.
Emacs支持3个额外的修饰键，请参见<a0>修饰键</a0>。
Emacs then echoes all the characters of the command so far, to prompt you for the rest.
然后，Emacs会回显到目前为止键入的所有命令字符，以提示您输入剩余部分。
Enable or disable highlighting of the current line.
启用或禁用当前行的高亮显示。
Enjoy the versatility of source blocks.
享受源码块的多功能性。
Enter Info and go to the node that documents the Emacs command <v0>command</v0> (<c1>Info-goto-emacs-command-node</c1>).
打开Info并转到记录Emacs命令<v0>命令</v0>(<c1>Info-goto-emacs-command-node</c1>)的节点。
Enter Info and go to the node that documents the key sequence <v0>key</v0> (<c1>Info-goto-emacs-key-command-node</c1>).
打开Info并转到记录键序列<v0>快捷键</v0>(<c1>Info-goto-emacs-key-command-node</c1>)的节点。
Enter a tag in the minibuffer, even if the tag is not in the predefined list.
在迷你缓冲区中输入标签，即使该标签不在预定义列表中也是如此。
Enter new tags for the current headline.
为当前标题输入新标签。
进入Emacs交互式教程(<c0>教程帮助</c0>)。
Entering a password is similar to using a minibuffer.
输入密码类似于使用迷你缓冲区。
Entering arguments that are prompted for.
Entering file names with the minibuffer.
使用迷你缓冲区输入文件名。
Entering passwords in the echo area.
Error messages may be accompanied by beeping or by flashing the screen.
错误信息可能伴随有蜂鸣声或屏幕闪烁。
Even if you don’t know Lisp, it will probably be obvious which command is displayed for repetition.
即使您不了解Lisp，显示哪个命令以供重复也可能是显而易见的。
Every Emacs command has a name that you can use to run it.
每个Emacs命令都有一个可以用来运行它的名称。
Every argument that you enter with the minibuffer is saved in a <e0>minibuffer history list</e0> so you can easily use it again later.
您使用迷你缓冲区输入的每个参数都保存在<e0>迷你缓冲区历史列表</e0>中，这样您以后就可以轻松地再次使用它。
Every command has a name chosen by a programmer.
每个命令都有一个由程序员选择的名称。
Every command that uses the minibuffer once is recorded on a special history list, the <e0>command history</e0>, together with the values of its arguments, so that you can repeat the entire command.
使用迷你缓冲区一次的每个命令及其参数值都记录在一个特殊的历史列表中，即<e0>命令历史</e0>，以便您可以重复整个命令。
Every headline can contain a list of tags; they occur at the end of the headline.
每个标题都可以包含一个标签列表；它们出现在标题的末尾。
Every key sequence is either a complete key or a prefix key.
每个键序列要么是完全键，要么是前缀键。
Every thought should be collected there, and processed later on.
每一个想法都应该在那里收集起来，然后再进行处理。
Every tree branch can be a TODO item.
每个树分支都可以是一个TODO。
所有东西都安全地存放起来
Execute commands in the active region
在活动区域中执行命令
Execute commands on multiple items in Org or agenda view.
在Org或议程视图中对多个项执行命令。
Existing commands can even be redefined in the middle of an editing session, without having to restart Emacs.
甚至可以在编辑会话过程中重新定义现有命令，而不必重新启动Emacs。
Export, evaluate, and tangle code blocks.
导出、求值和糅合代码块。
Exporting HTML without CSS, Javascript, etc.
Exporting to LaTeX and processing to PDF.
Exporting to flat files with encoding.
使用指定编码导出到纯文本文件。
Expose all direct children of the subtree.

为了获得更好的体验，有三个Org命令应该是在Emacs的任何地方都可以访问的，而不仅仅是在Org缓冲区内，它们是<c0>org-store-link</c0>， <c1>org-capture</c1>和<c2>org-agenda</c2>。
For a read-only buffer, it shows ‘<s3>%*</s3>’ if the buffer is modified, and ‘<s4>%%</s4>’ otherwise.

For bug reports, please first try to reproduce the bug with the latest version of Org available—if you are running an outdated version, it is quite possible that the bug has been fixed already.
对于bug提交，请先尝试使用最新的Org版本重现该错误——如果您运行的是过时的版本，则很可能已经在后续版本修复了该bug。
For convenience, <k0>C-a</k0> (<c1>move-beginning-of-line</c1>) in a minibuffer moves point to the beginning of the argument text, not the beginning of the prompt.
为方便起见，迷你缓冲区中的<k0>C-a</k0>(<c1>move-beginning-of-line</c1>)将指向参数文本的开头，而不是提示符的开头。
For convenience, <k1>C-n</k1> and <k2>C-p</k2> move point by screen lines, as do the equivalent keys <k3><s4>down</s4></k3> and <k5><s6>up</s6></k5>.
为方便起见，<k1>C-n</k1>和<k2>C-p</k2>逐行移动指针，等价键<k3><s4>down</s4></k3>和<k5><s6>up</s6></k5>也是如此。
For convenience, many commands also have key bindings.
为方便起见，许多命令还具有键绑定。
For details about how Emacs internally handles input events, see <a1>Input Events</a1> in <c2>The Emacs Lisp Reference Manual</c2>.

For example, <c0>emacs foo.txt</c0> starts Emacs with a buffer displaying the contents of the file ‘<s1>foo.txt</s1>’.
例如，<c0>emacs foo.txt</c0>使用一个缓冲区启动Emacs，该缓冲区显示文件“<s1>foo.txt</s1>”的内容。

For example, <k0>C-x</k0> is a prefix key, so typing <k1>C-x</k1> alone does not invoke a command; instead, Emacs waits for further input (if you pause for longer than a second, it echoes the <k2>C-x</k2> key to prompt for that input; see <a3>Echo Area</a3>).
例如，<k0>C-x</k0>是前缀键，因此单独键入<k1>C-x</k1>不会调用命令；相反，Emacs会等待进一步的输入(如果暂停时间超过一秒，则会回显<k2>C-x</k2>键以提示输入；请参阅<a3>回显区</a3>)。
For example, <k1>C-x 8 [</k1> inserts <t2>‘</t2> which is Unicode code-point U+2018 <s3>LEFT SINGLE QUOTATION MARK</s3>, sometimes called a left single “curved quote” or “curly quote”.
例如，<k1>C-x 8 [</k1>inserts<t2>‘</t2>，它是Unicode代码点U+2018<s3>左单引号</s3>，有时称为左单引号“弯曲引号”或“卷引号”。

For example, <k1>C-x =</k1> (hold down <t2>Ctrl</t2> and type <k3>x</k3>, then let go of <t4>Ctrl</t4> and type <k5>=</k5>) displays a message describing the character at point, its position in the buffer, and its current column in the window.
例如，<k1>C-x=</k1>(按住<t2>Ctrl</t2>并键入<k3>x</k3>，然后松开<t4>Ctrl</t4>并键入<k5>=</k5>)将显示一条消息，描述该游标的字符、其在缓冲区中的位置以及其在窗口中的当前列。
For example, <k7>Control-a</k7> is entered by holding down the <t8>Ctrl</t8> key while pressing <k9>a</k9>; we will refer to this as <k10>C-a</k10> for short.
例如，<k7>Control-a</k7>是在按住<t8>Ctrl</t8>键的同时按<k9>a</k9>输入的，我们简称为<k10>C-a</k10>。
For example, Compilation buffers and Shell buffers display the status of the subprocess.
例如，编译缓冲区和Shell缓冲区显示子进程的状态。
For example, because <k0>C-f</k0> is a complete key, the two-event sequence <k1>C-f C-k</k1> is two key sequences, not one.
例如，因为<k0>C-f</k0>是一个完全键，所以<k1>C-f C-k</k1>是两个分离的键序列，而不是一个。
For example, commands that read buffer names usually show a buffer name as the default; you can type <t2>RET</t2> to operate on that default buffer.

For example, we will say that “The command <k1>C-n</k1> (<c2>next-line</c2>) moves point vertically down”, meaning that the command <c3>next-line</c3> moves vertically down, and the key <k4>C-n</k4> is normally bound to it.

For instance, <k0>C-k</k0> kills a logical line.
For instance, <k2>C-q <s3>DEL</s3></k2> inserts a literal ‘<s4>DEL</s4>’ character.
For instance, <k3>C-a</k3> (<c4>move-beginning-of-line</c4>) and <k5>C-e</k5> (<c6>move-end-of-line</c6>) respectively move to the beginning and end of the logical line.
例如，<k3>C-a</k3>(<c4>move-beginning-of-line</c4>)和<k5>C-e</k5>(<c6>move-end-of-line</c6>)分别移动到逻辑行的开始和结束。

For instance, <t0>DEL</t0> runs the command <c1>delete-backward-char</c1> by default (some modes bind it to a different command); it does not insert a literal ‘<s2>DEL</s2>’ character (<a3>ASCII</a3> character code 127).
例如，<t0>DEL</t0>默认情况下运行命令<c1>delete-back-char</c1>(某些模式将其绑定到不同的命令)；它不插入文字“<s2>DEL</s2>”字符(<a3>ASCII</a3>字符代码127)。
For instance, activating the ‘<s3>Emacs Tutorial</s3>’ link opens the Emacs tutorial; this does the same thing as the command <k4>C-h t</k4> (<c5>help-with-tutorial</c5>).
例如，激活“<s3>Emacs Tutorial</s3>”链接将打开Emacs教程；这与命令<k4>C-h t</k4>(<c5>help-with-tutorial</c5>)的作用相同。
For instance, after <k4>C-h k</k4> you can select a menu item from the menu bar, to view the documentation string of the command it runs.
例如，在<k4>C-h k</k4>之后，您可以从菜单栏中选择菜单项，以查看其运行的命令的文档字符串。
For instance, if a project has moved forward to a certain point, but I know that it will stall for a few weeks for some reason, I move it to <c0>someday.org</c0>.
例如，如果一个项目已经前进到某个点，但我知道由于某种原因它会停滞几周，我会将其移到<c0>someday.org</c0>。

For instance, if you use a programming language in which comments start with ‘<s1><**</s1>’ and end with ‘<s2>**></s2>’, you can tell the Emacs comment manipulation commands to use those strings (see <a3>Comments</a3>).

For instance, the minor mode called Auto Fill mode splits lines automatically when they get too long (see <a1>Filling</a1>).

在GUI终端上运行Unix shell的终端窗口中，您可以使用<k1>emacs &</k1>在后台运行Emacs；这样，Emacs就不会占用终端窗口，因此您可以使用它来运行其他shell命令。

Furthermore, if a buffer is displayed in multiple windows, each of those windows has its own value of point.
此外，如果缓冲区显示在多个窗口中，则每个窗口都有自己的游标。
Furthermore, if there is any text in the minibuffer after point, the rest of the completion alternative must contain that text as a substring.
此外，如果在游标之后的微型缓冲区中有任何文本，则补全备选方案的剩余部分必须将该文本作为子字符串包含。

Furthermore, if you change the variable <c1>minibuffer-eldef-shorten-default</c1> to a non-<c2>nil</c2> value, the default argument is displayed as ‘<s3>[<v4>default-arg</v4>]</s3>’ instead of ‘<s5>(default <v6>default-arg</v6>)</s5>’, saving some screen space.
此外，如果将变量<c1>minibuffer-eldef-shorten-default</c1>更改为非<c2>nil</c2>值，则默认参数将显示为‘<s3>[<v4>default-arg</v4>]</s3>’而不是‘<s5>(default<v6>default-arg</v6>)</s5>’，从而节省一些屏幕空间。
GNU Emacs is <e0>free software</e0>; this means that everyone is free to use it and free to redistribute it under certain conditions.
GNU Emacs是<e0>自由软件</e0>；这意味着在某些条件下，每个人都可以自由使用和自由重新分发它。

GNU Emacs is not in the public domain; it is copyrighted and there are restrictions on its distribution, but these restrictions are designed to permit everything that a good cooperating citizen would want to do.
GNU Emacs不属于公共领域；它是受版权保护的，并且对其分发有限制，但这些限制旨在允许好的合作公民想要做的一切。
GNU Emacs is primarily designed for use with the keyboard.
GNU Emacs主要设计用于键盘。
GTD contexts are just regular tags, starting with <c0>@</c0>.
GTD上下文只是一个以<c0>@</c0>开始的常规标签。
Generally, it is unnecessary and wasteful to start Emacs afresh each time you want to edit a file.
通常，每次要编辑文件时都重新启动Emacs是不必要的，也是浪费的。

I tend to avoid using timestamps in my projects as much as possible.
我倾向于尽量避免在我的项目中使用时间戳。

我想我主要使用相当常规的关键字：<c0>TODO</c0>、<c1>WAITING</c1>、<c2>DONE</c2>和<c3>CANCELLED</c3>。
I use custom agenda commands mostly to get an overview of actions by context or tag.
我使用自定义议程命令主要是为了根据上下文或标签获得行动概述。

我使用标签有几个目的：
I usually have around 30 active projects at the same time.
我通常在同一时间有大约30个正在进行的项目。
If <c0>completion-auto-help</c0> is set to <c1>nil</c1>, the completion commands never display the completion list buffer; you must type <k2>?</k2> to display the list.
如果<c0>completion-auto-help</c0>设置为<c1>nil</c1>，则补全命令永远不会显示补全列表缓冲区；您必须键入<k2>？</k2>才能显示列表。
If <c0>completion-cycle-threshold</c0> is non-<c1>nil</c1>, completion commands can cycle through completion alternatives.
如果<c0>completion-cycle-threshold</c0>为非<c1>nil</c1>，则补全命令可以循环补全备选方案。
If <c2>initial-buffer-choice</c2> is non-<c3>nil</c3>, then if you specify any files on the command line, Emacs still visits them, but does not display them initially.
如果<c2>initial-buffer-option</c2>不是<c3>nil</c3>，那么如果您在命令行上指定任何文件，Emacs仍然会访问它们，但最初不会显示它们。
If <k0>q</k0> is not assigned to a tag, it aborts like <k1>C-g</k1>.
如果<k0>q</k0>未分配给标记，它将像<k1>C-g</k1>一样中止。
If <t0>TAB</t0> or <t1>SPC</t1> is unable to complete, it displays a list of matching completion alternatives (if there are any) in another window.
如果<t0>TAB</t0>或<t1>SPC</t1>无法补全，它会在另一个窗口中显示匹配的补全备选方案(如果有)的列表。
If <v4>N</v4> is negative then go up that many levels.
如果<v4>N</v4>为负，则上升到该级别。
