如果Emacs在另一个递归编辑级别中处于另一个递归编辑级别，则会出现双方括号，依此类推。
If a different string is displayed, that indicates a nontrivial end-of-line convention for encoding a file.
如果显示不同的字符串，则表示对文件进行编码的重要行尾约定。
If a directory is part of this list, all files with the extension ‘<s4>.org</s4>’ in this directory are part of the list.
如果变量org-agenda-files为一个文件目录，则该目录下所有‘<s4>.org</s4>’文件都为agenda files。
If a heading has a certain tag, all subheadings inherit the tag as well.
如果标题具有某个标签，则所有子标题也会继承该标签。
If a key sequence invokes a command, we call it a <e2>complete key</e2>; for example, <k3>C-f</k3>, <k4>C-x C-f</k4> and <k5>C-x 4 C-f</k5> are all complete keys.
如果使用按键序列调用命令，我们将其称为<e2>完全键</e2>；例如，<k3>C-f</k3>、<k4>C-x C-f</k4>和<k5>C-x 4 C-f</k5>都是完全键。
If a key sequence isn’t long enough to invoke a command, we call it a <e6>prefix key</e6>; from the preceding example, we see that <k7>C-x</k7> and <k8>C-x 4</k8> are prefix keys.
如果键序列不足以调用命令，我们将其称为<e6>前缀键</e6>；从前面的示例中，我们可以看到<k7>C-x</k7>和<k8>C-x 4</k8>是前缀键。
If a style produces no matches, Emacs falls back on the next style.
如果某个风格没有生成匹配项，则Emacs会退回到下一个风格。
If a style yields one or more matches, that is used as the list of completion alternatives.
如果风格生成一个或多个匹配项，则将其用作补全备选方案的列表。
If agenda is already restricted there, remove the restriction.
如果此处已经有限制，那么会移除它。
If all recorded changes have already been undone, the undo command displays an error message and does nothing.
如果所有记录的更改都已撤消，则撤消命令将显示一条错误消息，并且不执行任何操作。

If an error message or an informative message is emitted while the minibuffer is active, the message hides the minibuffer for a few seconds, or until you type something; then the minibuffer comes back.
如果在迷你缓冲区处于活动状态时发出错误消息或信息性消息，则该消息会将迷你缓冲区隐藏几秒钟，或者直到您键入内容；然后迷你缓冲区才会返回。
If an error occurs, a “backtrace” can be very useful—see below on how to create one.
如果发生错误，“回溯”可能会非常有用-请参阅下文，了解如何创建。

If at least one tag has a selection key then pressing <k0>C-c C-c</k0> automatically presents you with a special interface, listing inherited tags, the tags of the current headline, and a list of all valid tags with corresponding keys<a1><s2>54</s2></a1>.
如果至少有一个标签有选择键，则按<k0>C-c C-c</k0>会自动显示一个特殊界面，其中列出继承的标签、当前标题的标签以及具有相应键的所有有效标签的列表<a1><s2>54</s2></a1>。
If called with a prefix argument, move to the column number specified by the argument’s numeric value.
如果使用前缀参数调用，请移动到参数的数字值指定的列号。

If headlines in the agenda files are marked with <e0>tags</e0> (see <a1>Tags</a1>), or have properties (see <a2>Properties and Columns</a2>), you can select headlines based on this metadata and collect them into an agenda buffer.
如果议程文件中的headline带有标签（详见<e0>标签</e0>）和属性（详见<a1>属性和列视图</a1>）,则你可以根据这些元数据作为匹配条件来筛选事项.
If it is a dash (‘<s2>-</s2>’), that indicates no special character set handling (with the possible exception of end-of-line conventions, described in the next paragraph).
如果它是破折号(‘<s2>-</s2>’)，则表示没有特殊的字符集处理(下一段中描述的行尾约定可能除外)。
If it is non-<c1>nil</c1>, adding a new element deletes from the list all other elements that are equal to it.
如果它是非<c1>nil</c1>，则添加新元素将从列表中删除与其相等的所有其他元素。
If it says the command is not on any key, that means you must use <k4>M-x</k4> to run it.
如果它显示该命令不在任何键上，这意味着您必须使用<k4>M-x</k4>来运行它。
If it was already in the list, it is moved to the front.
如果该文件已经在列表中，那么就会将它移动到首位。
If narrowing is in effect restrict to the narrowed part of the buffer.
如果当前buffer使用了聚焦命令（org-narrow-to-subtree），那么只会限制议程视图的显示范围为聚焦的部分。
If need be, I create a new project out of it.
如果需要，我会用它创建一个新项目。
If point is at the end of the line, the effect is to create a new blank line after it and indent the new line; if point is in the middle of a line, the line is split at that position.
如果游标在行尾，则效果是在它之后创建新的空行并缩进新行；如果游标在行的中间，则该行将在该位置拆分。
If point is on a nonblank line, <k4>C-x C-o</k4> deletes all following blank lines, if any exists.
如果游标位于非空行上，<k4>C-x C-o</k4>将删除后面的所有空行(如果存在)。
If point is on a single blank line, <k3>C-x C-o</k3> deletes it.
如果游标在单个空行上，<k3>C-x C-o</k3>会将其删除。
If point is on or just after a number in the buffer, that is the default for <v3>n</v3>.
如果游标处于打开状态或恰好在缓冲区中的数字之后，则这是<v3>n</v3>的默认设置。
If point lies within a run of several blank lines, <k2>C-x C-o</k2> deletes all but one of them.
如果游标位于几个空行的运行范围内，<k2>C-x C-o</k2>将删除除一个空行之外的所有空行。
If point was at the beginning of a line, this deletes the preceding newline, joining this line to the previous one.
如果游标位于行的开头，则会删除前面的换行符，将此行与上一行合并。
If point was at the end of a line, this joins the following line onto this one.
如果点在一条线的末尾，这会将下面的线连接到这条线上。
If so, set the variable <c0>org-agenda-skip-scheduled-if-deadline-is-shown</c0> to <c1>repeated-after-deadline</c1>.
如果是这样，请将变量<c0>org-agenda-skip-scheduled-if-deadline-is-shown</c0>设置为<c1>repeat-after-deadline</c1>。
If something surprising happens, and you are not sure what you typed, use <k0>C-h l</k0> (<c1>view-lossage</c1>).
如果发生意外情况，并且您不确定键入的内容，请使用<k0>C-h l</k0>(<c1>view-lossage</c1>)。
If the buffer has been narrowed, making some of the text at the beginning and the end temporarily inaccessible, <k0>C-x =</k0> displays additional text describing the currently accessible range.
如果缓冲区被聚焦，导致开头和结尾的某些文本暂时不可访问，<k0>C-x =</k0>将显示描述当前可访问范围的附加文本。
If the buffer is modified, it shows two stars (‘<s2>**</s2>’).
如果修改缓冲区，它将显示两个星号(‘<s2>**</s2>’)。

If the bug persists, prepare a report and provide as much information as possible, including the version information of Emacs (<k0>M-x emacs-version</k0>) and Org (<k1>M-x org-version</k1>), as well as the Org related setup in the Emacs init file.
如果bug在新版本依旧存在，请准备一份报告，并提供尽可能多的信息，包括Emacs(<k0>M-x emacs-version</k0>)和Org (<k1>M-x org-version</k1>)的版本信息，以及在Emacs init文件中关于Org的相关配置。

If the command is used at the <e0>beginning</e0> of a line, and if there is a heading or a plain list item (see <a1>Plain Lists</a1>) at point, the new heading/item is created <e2>before</e2> the current line.
如果在行的<e0>开始</e0>处使用该命令，并且在光标处有标题或普通列表项(请参阅<a1>普通列表</a1>)，则在当前行<e2>之前</e2>创建新的标题/项。
If the first line in the region was an item, turn only the item lines into headlines.
如果区域中的第一行是列表项，则仅将列表项行变为标题。
If the minibuffer prompt for <k1>C-h f</k1> shows the function name from the buffer as the default, it means that name is defined as a Lisp function.
如果<k1>C-h f</k1>的迷你缓冲区提示将缓冲区中的函数名显示为默认值，则意味着该名称被定义为Lisp函数。
If the radix is 16, the letters <k1>a</k1> to <k2>f</k2> serve as part of a character code, just like digits.
如果基数是16，字母<k1>a</k1>到<k2>f</k2>将作为字符代码的一部分，就像数字一样。
If the region is active (see <a0>Mark</a0>), display the numbers for the region instead.
如果该选区处于活动状态(请参阅<a0>标记</a0>)，则改为显示该选区的数字。
If the repeater is set for the scheduling information only, you probably want the repeater to be ignored after the deadline.
如果仅为日程安排信息设置复读机，您可能希望在截止日期之后忽略复读机。
If the result of the function call is non-<c3>nil</c3>, the session is killed, otherwise Emacs continues to run.
如果函数调用的结果为非<c3>nil</c3>，会话将被终止，否则Emacs将继续运行。
If the symbol has more than one definition, like it has both definition as a function and as a variable, this command will show the documentation of all of them, one after the other.
如果符号有多个定义，比如它同时定义为函数和变量，则此命令将一个接一个地显示所有定义的文档。
If the tag is only relevant to the file you are working on, then you can instead set the ‘<s0>TAGS</s0>’ keyword as:
如果标签仅与您正在处理的文件相关，则可以将“<s0>TAGS</s0>”关键字设置为：
If the terminating character is <t1>RET</t1>, that <t2>RET</t2> serves only to terminate the sequence.
如果终止字符是<t1>RET</t1>，则<t2>RET</t2>仅用于终止序列。
If the text completes to an exact match, <t2>RET</t2> performs that completion but does not exit yet; you must type a second <t3>RET</t3> to exit.
如果文本完全匹配，<t2>RET</t2>将执行该补全，但尚未退出；您必须键入第二个<t3>RET</t3>才能退出。
If the user option <c0>what-cursor-show-names</c0> is non-<c1>nil</c1>, the name of the character, as defined by the Unicode Character Database, is shown as well.
如果用户选项<c0>what-cursor-show-names</c0>为非<c1>nil</c1>，则还会显示Unicode字符数据库定义的字符名称。
If the value is <c1>t</c1>, there is no maximum length.
如果值为<c1>t</c1>，则没有最大长度。
If the value is <c2>t</c2>, the minibuffer window will also shrink automatically if you remove some lines of text from the minibuffer, down to a minimum of one screen line.
如果该值为<c2>t</c2>，如果您从迷你缓冲区中删除一些文本行，则迷你缓冲区窗口也会自动缩小，最小只有一个屏幕行。
If the value is <c3>lazy</c3>, Emacs only shows the completion list buffer on the second attempt to complete.
如果值为<c3>lazy</c3>，则Emacs仅在第二次尝试补全时显示补全列表缓冲区。
If the value is <c3>nil</c3>, the minibuffer window never changes size automatically, but you can use the usual window-resizing commands on it (see <a4>Windows</a4>).
如果该值为<c3>nil</c3>，则微型缓冲区窗口永远不会自动更改大小，但您可以在其上使用常用的窗口大小调整命令(请参阅<a4>窗口</a4>)。
If the value of the variable <c0>confirm-kill-emacs</c0> is non-<c1>nil</c1>, <k2>C-x C-c</k2> assumes that its value is a predicate function, and calls that function.
如果变量<c0>confirm-kill-emacs</c0>的值非<c1>nil</c1>，则<k2>C-x C-c</k2>假定其值是谓词函数(译者注: 返回值为布尔类型)，并调用该函数。
If the value of the variable <c0>confirm-kill-processes</c0> is <c1>nil</c1>, <k2>C-x C-c</k2> does not ask for confirmation before killing subprocesses started by Emacs.
如果变量<c0>confirm-kill-process</c0>的值为<c1>nil</c1>，则<k2>C-x C-c</k2>在终止Emacs启动的子进程之前不会要求确认。
If the variable <c0>apropos-do-all</c0> is non-<c1>nil</c1>, most apropos commands behave as if they had been given a prefix argument.
如果变量<c0>apropos-do-all</c0>是非<c1>nil</c1>，则大多数主题搜索命令的行为就像它们被赋予了前缀参数一样。
If the variable <c0>inhibit-startup-screen</c0> is non-<c1>nil</c1>, Emacs does not display the startup screen.
如果变量<c0>inhibit-startup-screen</c0>为非<c1>nil</c1>，则Emacs不显示启动屏幕。
If the variable <c1>apropos-sort-by-scores</c1> is non-<c2>nil</c2>, these commands instead try to guess the relevance of each result, and display the most relevant ones first.
如果变量<c1>apropos-sort-by-scores</c1>是非<c2>nil</c2>，则这些命令会尝试猜测每个结果的相关性，并首先显示最相关的结果。
If there already is a restriction at point, remove it.
如果已经限制在光标处的子树，那么就会移除限制。
If there are any modified file-visiting buffers when you type <k3>C-x C-c</k3>, Emacs first offers to save these buffers.
如果在您键入<k3>C-x C-c</k3>时有任何修改过的文件访问缓冲区，Emacs会首先提示保存这些缓冲区。
If there is a window displaying an agenda view, the new restriction takes effect immediately.
如果在设置范围限制时有一个窗口在显示议程视图，那么新的限制会立刻生效。
If there is an active region, restrict the following agenda command to the region.
如果有active region,则该命令限制接下来agenda视图的显示范围为该region.
If there is an active region, turn all lines in the region into headlines.
如果存在活动区域，会将该区域中的所有行都变成标题。
If this material is new to you, we suggest you first run the Emacs learn-by-doing tutorial, by typing <k0>C-h t</k0> (<c1>help-with-tutorial</c1>).
如果您对本材料不熟悉，我们建议您首先运行Emacs实践学习教程，方法是键入<k0>C-h t</k0>(<c1>help-with-tutorial</c1>)。
If working with Org produces an error with a message you do not understand, you may have hit a bug.
如果与Org一起使用时出现错误，并显示一条您不理解的消息，则可能是您遇到了错误。
If you alter the text, you can <e1>save</e1> the new text in the file by typing <k2>C-x C-s</k2> (<c3>save-buffer</c3>).
如果更改文本，可以通过键入<k2>C-x C-s</k2>(<c3>save-buffer</c3>)<e1>保存</e1>文件中的新文本。
If you are editing several files in Emacs, each in its own buffer, each buffer has its own value of point.
如果在Emacs中编辑多个文件，每个文件都在自己的缓冲区中，则每个缓冲区都有自己的游标。
If you are looking for a certain feature, but don’t know what it is called or where to look, we recommend three methods.
如果您正在寻找某个功能，但不知道它叫什么或在哪里查找，我们推荐三种方法。
If you are not a member of the mailing list, your mail will be passed to the list after a moderator has approved it<a2><s3>2</s3></a2>.
如果你不是一个邮件组的成员，经过主持人的批准后，你的邮件将被传递到该列表。<a2><s3>2</s3></a2>.
If you are not sending the Email from within Emacs, please copy and paste the content into your Email program.
如果您不是从Emacs内部发送电子邮件，请复制内容并将其粘贴到您的电子邮件程序中。
If you are using expert mode, the first <k0>C-c</k0> displays the selection window.
如果您使用的是专家模式，则第一个<k0>C-c</k0>将显示选择窗口。
If you are using the diary only for expression entries and holidays, it is faster to not use the above setting, but instead to copy or even move the entries into an Org file.
如果仅将日记用于表达式条目和节假日，则不使用上述设置，而是将条目复制甚至移动到Org文件中会更快。
If you call Emacs this way, the initial frame is split into two windows—one showing the specified file, and the other showing the startup screen.
如果以这种方式调用Emacs，初始帧将被分成两个窗口-一个显示指定的文件，另一个显示启动屏幕。

If you change <c2>completion-cycle-threshold</c2> to <c3>t</c3>, the completion command instead completes to the first of those completion alternatives; each subsequent invocation of the completion command replaces that with the next completion alternative, in a cyclic manner.
如果将<c2>completion-cycle-threshold</c2>更改为<c3>t</c3>，则补全命令将改为补全到这些补全备选方案中的第一个；每次后续调用补全命令都会以循环方式将其替换为下一个补全备选方案。
If you change it to <c2>nil</c2>, Emacs does not ask for confirmation, falling back on permissive completion.
如果将其更改为<c2>nil</c2>，则Emacs不会要求确认，而是退回到宽松补全。
If you change it to any other non-<c3>nil</c3> value, Emacs asks for confirmation whether or not the preceding command was <t4>TAB</t4>.
如果将其更改为任何其他非<c3>nil</c3>值，则Emacs会要求确认前面的命令是否为<t4>TAB</t4>。
If you do not like it, you can create an active region by using the mouse to select a region, or pressing <k1>C-<s2>SPC</s2></k1> twice before moving point.
如果您不喜欢它，可以通过使用鼠标选择一个区域或在光标之前按两次<k1>C-<s2>SPC</s2></k1>来创建活动区域。
If you do not save them all, it asks for confirmation again, since the unsaved changes will be lost.
如果不全部保存，系统会再次要求确认，因为未保存的更改将丢失。
If you do not want the line to be split, customize <c0>org-M-RET-may-split-line</c0>.
如果不想拆分该行，请自定义<c0>org-M-ret-May-plit-line</c0>。
If you don’t know Orgmode and are curious about it, you should head to <a0>its website</a0> first.
如果您不了解Orgmode并对其感兴趣，您应该先访问其<a0>网站</a0>。
If you edit the text inserted by the <k0>M-p</k0> or <k1>M-n</k1> minibuffer history commands, this does not change its entry in the history list.
如果编辑由<k0>M-p</k0>或<k1>M-n</k1>迷你缓冲区历史命令插入的文本，这不会更改其在历史记录列表中的条目。

If you enable Minibuffer Electric Default mode, a global minor mode, Emacs hides the default argument as soon as you modify the contents of the minibuffer (since typing <t0>RET</t0> would no longer submit that default).
如果您启用了Minibuffer Electric Default mode(一种全局辅模式)，Emacs会在您修改迷你缓冲区的内容时立即隐藏默认参数(因为键入<t0>RET</t0>将不再提交该默认参数)。

If you enter a code-point, it should be as a hexadecimal number (the convention for Unicode), or a number with a specified radix, e.g., <c4>#o23072</c4> (octal); See <a5>Integer Basics</a5> in <c6>The Emacs Lisp Reference Manual</c6>.
如果输入编码，它应该是十六进制数字(Unicode的约定)或具有指定基数的数字，例如，<c4>#o23072</c4>(八进制)；请参阅<c6>Emacs Lisp参考手册</c6>中的<a5>整数基础</a5>。
If you enter a name, the command provides completion (see <a3>Completion</a3>).
如果输入名称，该命令将提供补全(请参见<a3>补全</a3>)。
If you enter more than one digit, you need not hold down the <t0>Meta</t0> key for the second and subsequent digits.
如果输入多个数字，则不需要按住<t0>Meta</t0>键输入第二个和后续数字。
If you ever bring back the original minibuffer text, the prompt again shows the default.
如果您键入原始的微型缓冲区文本，提示将再次显示默认值。
If you find GNU Emacs useful, please <s0>send a donation</s0> to the Free Software Foundation to support our work.
如果您觉得GNU Emacs有用，请向自由软件基金会<s0>捐赠</s0>以支持我们的工作。
If you find problems with Org, or if you have questions, remarks, or ideas about it, please send an email to the Org mailing list <a0>emacs-orgmode@gnu.org</a0>.
如果你发现了Org的的问题，或者你有对Org的疑问、评价或者好的想法，请发送邮件到Org邮件列表<a0>emacs-orgmode@gnu.org</a0>。
If you find that most of the time you need only a single key press to modify your list of tags, set the variable <c0>org-fast-tag-selection-single-key</c0>.
如果您发现大多数情况下只需要按一次键来修改标签列表，那么可以设置变量<c0>org-fast-tag-election-single-key</c0>。
If you forget what a key does, you can find out by typing <k0>C-h k</k0> (<c1>describe-key</c1>), followed by the key of interest; for example, <k2>C-h k C-n</k2> tells you what <k3>C-n</k3> does.
如果忘记了快捷键的作用，可以通过键入<k0>C-h k</k0>(<c1>describe-key</c1>)，然后键入感兴趣的键；例如，<k2>C-h k C-n</k2>告诉您<k3>C-n</k3>的作用。
If you give <c4>completion-cycle-threshold</c4> a numeric value <v5>n</v5>, completion commands switch to this cycling behavior only when there are <v6>n</v6> or fewer alternatives.
如果给<c4>completion-cycle-threshold</c4>一个数值<v5>n</v5>，则仅当有<v6>n</v6>或更少替代选项时，补全命令才会切换到此循环行为。
If you have a fill prefix, the <k2>C-o</k2> command inserts the fill prefix on the new line, if typed at the beginning of a line.
如果您有填充前缀，<k2>C-o</k2>命令将在新行上插入填充前缀(如果在行首键入)。

If you have a preferred set of tags that you would like to use in every file, in addition to those defined on a per-file basis by ‘<s0>TAGS</s0>’ keyword, then you may specify a list of tags with the variable <c1>org-tag-persistent-alist</c1>.
除了由“<s0>TAGS</s0>”关键字在每个文件基础上定义的标签之外，如果您有希望在每个文件中使用的首选标签集，则可以使用变量<c1>org-tag-persistent-alist</c1>指定标签列表。
If you have access to the Internet, you can get the latest distribution version of GNU Emacs by anonymous FTP; see <a0>https://www.gnu.org/software/emacs</a0> on our website for more information.
如果您可以访问互联网，您可以通过匿名FTP获得GNU Emacs的最新分发版本；有关更多信息，请参阅我们网站上的<a0>https://www.gnu.org/software/emacs</a0>。

If you have globally defined your preferred set of tags using the variable <c0>org-tag-alist</c0>, but would like to use a dynamic tag list in a specific file, add an empty ‘<s1>TAGS</s1>’ keyword to that file:
如果您已使用变量<c0>org-tag-ist</c0>全局定义了首选的标签集，但希望在特定文件中使用动态标签列表，请向该文件添加空的“<s1>TAGS</s1>”关键字：
If you have this problem, you can either customize your window manager to not block those keys, or rebind the affected Emacs commands (see <a6>Customization</a6>).
如果遇到此问题，您可以自定义窗口管理器，使其不拦截那些键，或者重新绑定受影响的Emacs命令(请参阅<a6>自定义</a6>)。
If you have ‘<s3>auto-f</s3>’ in the minibuffer and type <t4>SPC</t4>, it finds that the completion is ‘<s5>auto-fill-mode</s5>’, but it only inserts ‘<s6>ill-</s6>’, giving ‘<s7>auto-fill-</s7>’.
如果在迷你缓冲区中有“<s3>auto-f</s3>”并键入<t4>SPC</t4>，它会发现补全是“<s5>auto-fill-mode</s5>”，但它只插入“<s6>ill-</s6>”，给出“<s7>auto-ill-</s7>”。
If you insert the character ‘<s7>!</s7>’ at that position, the result is ‘<s8>fro!b</s8>’, with point between the ‘<s9>!</s9>’ and the ‘<s10>b</s10>’.
如果在该位置插入字符“<s7>！</s7>”，则结果为“<s8>fro！b</s8>”，游标位于“<s9>！</s9>”和“<s10>b</s10>”之间。
If you need both a repeater and a special warning period in a deadline entry, the repeater should come first and the warning period last
如果在截止日期输入中既需要复读机，又需要特殊的提醒天数，则应先有中继器，最后才有提醒天数
If you need to contact the Free Software Foundation, see <a0>https://www.fsf.org/about/contact/</a0>, or write to
如果您需要联系自由软件基金会，请参阅<a0>https://www.fsf.org/about/contact/</a0>，或写信给
If you now type <k2>buffer.c</k2> as input, that specifies the file <s3>/u2/emacs/src/buffer.c</s3>.
如果您现在键入<k2>buffer.c</k2>作为输入，则指定文件<s3>/u2/emacs/src/buffer.c</s3>。

If you omit the class, it defaults to ‘<s5>birthday</s5>’.

If you prefer, you can make Emacs insert a newline automatically when a line gets too long, by using Auto Fill mode.
如果您愿意，可以使用Auto Fill mode让Emacs在行过长时自动插入换行符。
If you rebind <k5>C-n</k5> to the command <c6>forward-word</c6>, <k7>C-n</k7> will move forward one word instead.

If you repeat <k0>C-/</k0> (or its aliases), each repetition undoes another, earlier change, back to the limit of the undo information available.

If you specify just <k4>C-u</k4> as the prefix argument, <k5>C-h i</k5> prompts for the name of a documentation file, so you can browse a file which doesn’t have an entry in the top-level Info menu.
如果仅指定<k4>C-u</k4>作为前缀参数，<k5>C-h i</k5>会提示输入文档文件的名称，这样您就可以浏览在顶级信息菜单中没有条目的文件。

如果您经常在议程视图间切换，但是不能忍受其更新时间，那么您可以打开粘滞议程buffer（设置变量<c0>org-agenda-sticky</c0>使其默认打开）。

If you then occasionally need more keys, press <k3>C-c</k3> to turn off auto-exit for the current tag selection process (in effect: start selection with <k4>C-c C-c C-c</k4> instead of <k5>C-c C-c</k5>).
如果您偶尔需要更多键，请按<k3>C-c</k3>关闭当前标签选择过程的自动退出(实际上：使用<k4>C-c-c C-c</k4>而不是<k5>C-c C-c</k5>开始选择)。

If you type <k0>C-h f <s1>RET</s1></k0>, it describes the function called by the innermost Lisp expression in the buffer around point, <e2>provided</e2> that function name is a valid, defined Lisp function.
如果键入<k0>C-h f<s1>RET</s1></k0>，它将描述游标周围缓冲区中最内层的Lisp表达式调用的函数，<e2>前提是</e2>函数名是有效的、已定义的Lisp函数。

If you type <k0>M-n</k0> in the minibuffer when there are no later entries in the minibuffer history (e.g., if you haven’t previously typed <k1>M-p</k1>), Emacs tries fetching from a list of default arguments: values that you are likely to enter.
如果在迷你缓冲区历史记录中没有以后的项目时在迷你缓冲区中键入<k0>M-n</k0>(例如，如果您以前没有键入过<k1>M-p</k1>)，则Emacs会尝试从默认参数列表中提取：您可能会输入的值。
If you type <k0>M-x a u <s1>TAB</s1></k0>, the <t2>TAB</t2> looks for completion alternatives (in this case, command names) that start with ‘<s3>au</s3>’.
如果键入<k0>M-x a u<s1>TAB</s1></k0>，<t2>TAB</t2>将查找以“<s3>au</s3>”开头的补全选项(在本例中为命令名)。
If you type <k2>C-k</k2> at the beginning or middle of a line, it kills all the text up to the end of the line.
如果您在行首或行中键入<k2>C-k</k2>，则会取消直到行尾的所有文本。
If you type <k3>C-k</k3> at the end of a line, it joins that line with the following line.
如果您在行尾键入<k3>C-k</k3>，它会将该行与以下行连接起来。

如果立即再次键入<t0>TAB</t0>，则无法确定下一个字符；它可能是“<s1>-</s1>”、“<s2>a</s2>”或“<s3>c</s3>”。
If you type it from a client frame, it closes the client connection.
如果您从客户端窗体中键入它，它将关闭客户端连接。
If you type just <t3>RET</t3>, that repeats the command unchanged.
如果您只键入<t3>RET</t3>，则重复该命令不会改变。

It can be very useful to combine output from Org with the diary.
将来自Org的输出与日记相结合非常有用。
It can control subprocesses, indent programs automatically, show multiple files at once, edit remote files like they were local files, and more.
它可以控制子进程，自动缩进程序，一次显示多个文件，编辑远程文件，就像编辑本地文件一样，等等。
It displays a count for the region if the region is active, and for the buffer otherwise.
如果选区处于活动状态，它将显示选区的计数，否则将显示缓冲区的计数。
It displays a line in the echo area that looks like this:
它在回显区显示为一行，如下所示：
It displays a menu from which an additional letter is required to execute a command.
该命令会显示一个菜单界面，在该界面输入不同的字母会执行不同的命令。
It displays the list in the echo area.
它会在回显区中显示列表。
It is so-named because it corresponds to the completion behavior in Emacs 22.
之所以这样命名，是因为它对应于Emacs22中的补全行为。
It is used to display small amounts of text for various purposes.
它用于显示用于各种目的的少量文本。
It is useful for working near a location that has been exposed by a sparse tree command (see <a0>Sparse Trees</a0>) or an agenda command (see <a1>Agenda Commands</a1>).
对于在由稀疏树命令(请参阅<a0>稀疏树</a0>)或议程命令(请参阅<a1>议程命令</a1>)暴露出来的位置操作时，它非常有用。
It normally starts out with just one frame, but you can create additional frames if you wish (see <a1>Frames</a1>).
它通常只从一个窗体开始，但如果您愿意，也可以创建其他窗体(请参阅<a1>窗体</a1>)。
It offers lots of customization options.
它提供了很多定制选项。
It searches for all possible completions that match the existing minibuffer text, and attempts to complete as much as it can.
它搜索与现有迷你缓冲区文本匹配的所有可能的补全，并尝试尽可能多地补全。
It's easiest to install EBDB from the ELPA package repositories, though it's also possible to clone the package from [[https:github.com/girzel/ebdb][Github]] and put it on your load path.
从ELPA软件包存储库安装EBDB是最容易的， 虽然也可以从[[https：github.com/Girzel/ebdb][Github]]克隆软件包并将其 在你的装载路径上。
Items that show up again and again.
一次又一次出现的项目。
Its default is the Lisp symbol around or before point, if that is the name of a defined Lisp variable.
如果它是已定义的Lisp变量的名称，则它的默认值是点前后的Lisp符号。
It’s important to add these files to the agenda file (more on the agenda later), like the following:
将这些文件添加到议程文件非常重要(稍后将详细介绍议程)，如下所示：
I’ve been using <a0>Orgmode</a0> to implement the <a1>GTD methodology</a1> for the last 4 years.
在过去的4年里，我一直在使用<a0>Orgmode</a0>来实现<a1>GTD方法</a1>。
JavaScript supported display of web pages
Jump to a different place without changing the current outline visibility.
在不更改当前大纲可见性的情况下跳到其他位置。
Jump to the location where <c0>org-refile</c0> last moved a tree to.
跳转到<c0>org-refile</c0>命令上一次移动的位置。
Just type <t4>RET</t4> in the minibuffer to use it.
只需在迷你缓冲区中键入<t4>RET</t4>即可使用它。
按键绑定和有用的函数
Key bindings and where they are described.
按键绑定和描述它的位置。
Key sequences: what you type to request one editing action.
键序列：您键入的内容以请求一个编辑操作。
Keyboard input into Emacs is based on a heavily-extended version of <a0>ASCII</a0>.
Emacs中的键盘输入基于<a0>ASCII</a0>的高度扩展版本。
Keywords and blocks are written in uppercase to enhance their readability, but you can use lowercase in your Org files.
关键字和块以大写形式编写，以增强其可读性，但是您可以在Org文件中使用小写形式。
Kill back to the beginning of the previous word (<c0>backward-kill-word</c0>).
向后删除到前一个单词的开头(<c0>backward-kill-word</c0>)。
Kill forward to the end of the next word (<c0>kill-word</c0>).
向前删除到下一个单词的末尾(<c0>kill-word</c0>)。
Kill subtree, i.e., remove it from buffer but save in kill ring.
删除子树，即将其从缓冲区中移除，但保存在剪切板中。
Kill to the end of the line (<c0>kill-line</c0>).
Kinds of input events (characters, buttons, function keys).
各种输入事件(字符、按钮、功能键)。
LaTeX can be freely used inside Org documents.
Labels and captions in ODT export
Let’s say you will have to pay a bill in a month.
比方说你一个月后得付账单。
Like <k0>C-<s1>RET</s1></k0>, the new headline is inserted after the current subtree.
与<k0>C-<s1>ret</s1></k0>类似，新标题插入到当前子树之后。

Like <k0>M-p</k0> and <k1>M-n</k1>, but move to the previous or next line of a multi-line item before going to the previous history item (<c2>previous-line-or-history-element</c2> and <c3>next-line-or-history-element</c3>) .
与<k0>M-p</k0>和<k1>M-n</k1>类似，但在转到上一历史记录项目(<c2>previous-line-or-history-element</c2>和<c3>next-line-or-history-element</c3>)之前移动到多行项目的上一行或下一行。
Like <k0>m</k0>, but only select headlines that are also TODO items and force checking subitems (see the variable <c1>org-tags-match-list-sublevels</c1>).
该命令和<k0>m</k0>类似，但是只会选择标记为TODO的标题，并且强制检查子项。（详见变量<c1>org-tags-match-list-sublevels</c1>）
Like <k2><s3>DEL</s3></k2>, it deletes the text in the region if the region is active (see <a4>Mark</a4>).
与<k2><s3>DEL</s3></k2>类似，如果选区处于活动状态，它会删除选区中的文本(请参阅<a4>标记</a4>)。
Like before, but require the ‘<s0>laptop</s0>’ lines to be tagged also ‘<s1>night</s1>’.
和前者类似，但是要带有<s0>laptop</s0>标签的标题同时带有<s1>night</s1>标签。
Like the above, but allows selection of a specific TODO keyword.
类似M-x org-agenda t，但支持选择符合特定关键字的TODO事项。
Line 1 is the beginning of the buffer.
Linking from my C source code?
Links to other places in the current file.
链接到当前文件中的其他位置。
Lisp programs can re-execute a command by calling <c1>eval</c1> with the <c2>command-history</c2> element.
Lisp程序可以通过使用<c2>command-history</c2>元素调用<c1>eval</c1>来重新执行命令。
List of supported code block languages.
支持的代码块语言列表。
用于搜索表格的查找函数。
Make targets trigger links in plain text.
生成目标触发纯文本形式的链接。
Many Emacs commands move point to different places in the buffer; for example, you can place point by clicking mouse button 1 (normally the left button) at the desired location.
许多Emacs命令将游标移动到缓冲区中的不同位置；例如，您可以通过单击鼠标键1(通常是左键)将游标放在所需位置。
Many commands in Org work on the region if the region is <e0>active</e0>.
如果某区域为<e0>活跃状态</e0>，则Org中的许多命令都可以在该区域上使用。
Many help commands display their information in a special <e0>help buffer</e0>.
许多帮助命令在特殊的<e0>帮助缓冲区</e0>中显示其信息。
Many simple commands, such as those invoked with a single key or with <k0><s1>M-x</s1> <v2><s3>command-name</s3></v2> <s4>RET</s4></k0>
许多简单的命令，例如使用单键调用或使用<k0><s1>M-x</s1> <v2><s3>command-name</s3></v2> <s4>RET</s4></k0>调用的命令
Many users actually run only a—very personal—fraction of Org’s capabilities, and know that there is more whenever they need it.
实际上，许多用户只运行Org的一部分功能（非常个人化），并且知道在需要时还会有更多功能。
Mapping over all or selected entries.
在所有或选定条目上映射。
在光标位置标记该子树。
Marking this DONE shifts the date by at least one day, and also
如果将此标记为DONE，则日期至少会移动一天，
Marking this DONE shifts the date by at least one week, but also
将此标记为DONE会将日期至少移动一周，
Marking this DONE shifts the date to exactly one hour from now.
如果将此标记为DONE，则日期将恰好从现在起移至一个小时后。
Marking this DONE shifts the date to one month after today.
将此标记为DONE会将日期移至今天之后的一个月。
在嵌入式上下文中匹配。
Matching specific TODO keywords can also be done as part of a tags search (see <a0>Tag Searches</a0>).
通过标签搜索也能匹配特定的TODO关键字（详见<a0>标签搜索</a0>）
Matching specific TODO keywords together with a tags match is also possible, see <a3>Tag Searches</a3>.
同时匹配TODO关键字和标签也是可行的，详见<a3>标签搜索</a3>。
HTML导出中的数学格式设置
ODT导出中的数学格式设置
Mixing it all, still finding your way.
把它们混合在一起，仍然能找到你的路。
Modifier keys can also be applied to non-alphanumerical characters, e.g., <k16>C-<s17>F1</s17></k16> or <k18>M-<s19>LEFT</s19></k18>.
修饰键还可以应用于非字母数字字符，例如，<k16>C-<s17>F1</s17></k16>或<k18>M-<s19>LEFT</s19></k18>。
Most Emacs commands have no key bindings, so the only way to run them is by name.
大多数Emacs命令没有键绑定，因此运行它们的唯一方式是按名称。
Most Emacs commands implicitly apply to the current buffer; the text displayed in unselected windows is mostly visible for reference.
大多数Emacs命令都隐式应用于当前缓冲区；显示在未选中窗口中的文本大多可见以供参考。
Most commands that act on lines act on logical lines, not screen lines.
大多数作用于行的命令作用于逻辑行，而不是屏幕行。
Most of the editing commands in Emacs are written in Lisp; the few exceptions could have been written in Lisp but use C instead for efficiency.
Emacs中的大多数编辑命令都是用Lisp编写的；少数例外可能是用Lisp编写的，但为了提高效率改用C语言实现。
Most of the features and commands associated with the minibuffer <e0>cannot</e0> be used when entering a password.
输入密码时，<e0>无法使用与迷你缓冲区</e0>关联的大多数功能和命令。
Most of the variables documented in this manual are meant for customization: some command or other part of Emacs examines the variable and behaves differently according to the value that you set.
本手册中记录的大多数变量都用于自定义：Emacs的某些命令或其他部分会检查变量，并根据您设置的值采取不同的行为。
Most of these are described in more detail in the following sections.
以下各节将更详细地介绍其中的大部分内容。
Most optional features in Emacs are grouped into <e0>packages</e0>.
Emacs中的大多数可选功能都分组到<e0>包</e0>中。
Most users will simply activate Org and begin exploring its many features.
大多数用户只需要激活Org并开始探索其众多功能。
Move point back to the previous hyperlink (<c0>backward-button</c0>).
将游标移回上一个超链接(<c0>backward-button</c0>)。
Move point forward to the next hyperlink (<c0>forward-button</c0>).
将游标移到下一个超链接(<c0>forward-button</c0>)。
Move subtree down, i.e., swap with next subtree of same level.
下移子树，即与同级的下一个子树互换。
Move subtree up, i.e., swap with previous subtree of same level.
上移子树，即与同级的上一个子树互换。
Move to a later item in the minibuffer history that matches <v0>regexp</v0> (<c1>next-matching-history-element</c1>).
移动到迷你缓冲区历史记录中与<v0>regexp</v0>匹配的后一项(<c1>next-matching-history-element</c1>)。
Move to an earlier item in the minibuffer history that matches <v0>regexp</v0> (<c1>previous-matching-history-element</c1>).
移动到迷你缓冲区历史记录中与<v0>regexp</v0>匹配的较早项(<c1>previous-matching-history-element</c1>)。
Move to the beginning of the line (<c0>move-beginning-of-line</c0>).
Move to the end of the buffer (<c0>end-of-buffer</c0>).
Move to the end of the line (<c0>move-end-of-line</c0>).
Move to the next item in the minibuffer history (<c0>next-history-element</c0>).
移至迷你缓冲区历史记录中的下一项(<c0>next-history-element</c0>)。
Move to the previous item in the minibuffer history, an earlier argument (<c0>previous-history-element</c0>).
移至迷你缓冲区历史记录中的上一项，即较早的参数(<c0>previous-history-element</c0>)。
Move to the top of the buffer (<c0>beginning-of-buffer</c0>).
Moving a tree to an archive file
Moving a tree to an archive file.
移动一棵节点树到一个归档文件中。
Moving and copying information with ease.
Moving the cursor to the place where you want to change something.
将光标移动到要更改某些内容的位置。
Moving/copying a tree from one place to another.
移动/拷贝一棵节点树到另外一个地方。
Multi-character commands (see <a1>Keys</a1>) are echoed if you pause for more than a second in the middle of a command.
如果您在输入命令时暂停超过一秒，则会回显多字符命令(请参阅<a1>快捷键</a1>)。
Multiple keyword sets in one file
一个文件中的多个关键字集

My contexts tend to change over time, but I always have at least <c0>@home</c0>, <c1>@office</c1>, <c2>@travelling</c2>, <c3>@phone</c3>, <c4>@email</c4>, <c5>@errands</c5> to filter out next actions based on my current location for instance.
我的上下文往往会随着时间的推移而变化，但我始终至少使用<c0>@home</c0>, <c1>@office</c1>, <c2>@travelling</c2>, <c3>@phone</c3>, <c4>@email</c4>, <c5>@errands</c5>，以根据我当前的位置筛选出下一步行动。
My inbox is then processed and emptied daily.
然后，我的收件箱每天都会被处理和清空。
Named functions run by key sequences to do editing.
命名函数由键序列运行以进行编辑。
将缓冲区聚焦到当前块。
将缓冲区聚焦到当前子树
New commands are simply programs written in the Lisp language, which are run by Emacs’s own Lisp interpreter.
新命令只是用Lisp语言编写的程序，由Emacs自己的Lisp解释器运行。
New export backends can be derived from existing ones, or defined from scratch.
新的导出后端可以从现有的后端衍生出来，也可以从头开始定义。
下一个/上一个同级标题。
下一个/上一个可见标题。

Nonetheless, relative file name arguments are still interpreted based on the same default directory.
尽管如此，相对文件名参数仍然基于相同的默认目录进行解释。
Normally the global TODO list simply shows all headlines with TODO keywords.
一般来说，全局TODO列表只是简单的展示所有带有TODO关键字的大纲标题。
Normally, Emacs automatically handles these settings for you, but it is sometimes useful to have this information.
通常，Emacs会自动为您处理这些设置，但有时拥有此信息很有用。
Normally, if there is more than one completion alternative for the text in the minibuffer, a completion command completes up to the longest common substring.
通常，如果迷你缓冲区中的文本有多个可选补全选项，则补全命令最多会补全到最长的公共子字符串。
Normally, the minibuffer window occupies a single screen line.
通常，迷你缓冲区窗口占据单个屏幕行。
Normally, this command undoes the last change, moving point back to where it was before the change.
通常，此命令会撤消上一次更改，将游标移回更改前的位置。
并不是所有的任务都是相等的。
Note that <c0>forward-char</c0> is the same command that you invoke with the key <k1>C-f</k1>.
请注意，<c0>forward-char</c0>与您使用键<k1>C-f</k1>调用的命令相同。
Note that Orgmode is quite smart about how you can enter a date, if you don’t know about it, refer to the <a2>manual entry</a2>.
请注意，Orgmode在如何输入日期方面非常聪明，如果你不会使用，请参阅<a2>使用手册</a2>。
Note that in this case, ‘<s0>make autoloads</s0>’ is mandatory: it defines Org’s version in ‘<s1>org-version.el</s1>’ and Org’s autoloads in ‘<s2>org-loaddefs.el</s2>’.
请注意，在这种情况下，必须使用'<s0>make autoloads</s0>'：它在'<s1>org-version.el</s1>'中定义Org的版本，并在'<s2>org-loaddefs .el</s2>'中定义Org的自动加载。
Note that inside tables (see <a0>Tables</a0>), <k1>S-<s2>TAB</s2></k1> jumps to the previous field instead.
请注意，在表格中(请参阅<a0>表格</a0>)，<k1>S-<s2>TAB</s2></k1>会跳转到上一个字段。
Note that the expression entries must start at the left margin, no whitespace is allowed before them, as seen in the following segment of an Org file:<a0><s1>96</s1></a0>
请注意，表达式条目必须从左边距开始，前面不允许有空格，如Org文件的以下片段所示：<a0><s1>96</s1></a0>
Note that this <e0>does not</e0> insert five copies of ‘<s1>0</s1>’ and move down one line, as you might expect—the ‘<s2>0</s2>’ is treated as part of the prefix argument.
请注意，张扬<e0>不会</e0>像您预期的那样插入5个‘<s1>0</s1>’副本并向下移动一行——‘<s2>0</s2>’被视为前缀参数的一部分。
Note that this meaning of <k3>C-u</k3> applies only to this case.
请注意，<k3>C-u</k3>的这一含义仅适用于此情况。
Note that when point is inside a table (see <a0>Tables</a0>), the Meta-Cursor keys have different functionality.
请注意，当光标位于表格中时(请参见<a0>表格</a0>)，Meta修饰标键具有不同的功能。
Numeric arguments for repeating a command N times.
用于将命令重复N次的数字参数。
Obsolete commands are those for which newer, better alternatives exist, and which are slated for removal in some future Emacs release.
过时的命令是那些存在更新的、更好的替代命令的命令，并且计划在将来的某些Emacs版本中删除这些命令。
Often a small example file helps, along with clear information about:
通常，一个小的示例文件会有所帮助，同时提供以下方面的清晰信息：
Often the description of a command will say, “To change this, set the variable <c1>mumble-foo</c1>.” A variable is a name used to store a value.
通常，命令的描述会说，“要更改这一点，请设置变量<c1>mumble-foo</c1>。”变量是用于存储值的名称。
On MS-Windows and MS-DOS systems, where a user doesn’t always have a home directory, Emacs uses several alternatives.
在MS-Windows和MS-DOS系统上，用户并不总是有主目录，Emacs使用几种替代方法。
On a display that supports a mouse, you can use the mouse to choose a command from the menu bar.
在支持鼠标的显示器上，您可以使用鼠标从菜单栏中选择命令。
On a graphical display, Emacs indicates line wrapping with small bent arrows in the left and right window fringes.
在图形显示上，Emacs表示在左右窗口边缘用小弯曲箭头换行。
On a graphical display, a truncated line is indicated by a small straight arrow in the right fringe; on a text terminal, it is indicated by a ‘<s1>$</s1>’ character in the right margin.
在图形显示上，一条截断的行由右边缘的小直箭头表示；在文本终端上，它由右边缘的“<s1>$</s1>”字符表示。
On a graphical display, directly below the menu bar is a <e1>tool bar</e1>, a row of icons that perform editing commands when you click on them.
在图形显示器上，菜单栏正下方是<e1>工具栏</e1>，这是一行图标，当您单击它们时，它们会执行编辑命令。
On a graphical display, such as on GNU/Linux using the X Window System, Emacs occupies a graphical window.
在图形显示器上，例如在使用X窗口系统的GNU/Linux上，Emacs占据一个图形窗口。
On a graphical display, the mode line is drawn with a 3D box appearance.
在图形显示上，状态栏以3D长方体外观绘制。
On a graphical display, the selected window shows a more prominent cursor (usually solid and blinking); other windows show a less prominent cursor (usually a hollow box).
在图形显示器上，所选窗口显示较突出的光标(通常为实心且闪烁)；其他窗口显示较不突出的光标(通常为空心框)。
On a graphical display, the window possesses a <e1>scroll bar</e1> on one side, which can be used to scroll through the buffer.
在图形显示器上，窗口的一侧有一个<e1>滚动条</e1>，可用于在缓冲区中滚动。

On a graphical display, this command <e2>minimizes</e2> (or <e3>iconifies</e3>) the selected Emacs frame, hiding it in a way that lets you bring it back later (exactly how this hiding occurs depends on the window system).
在图形显示上，此命令<e2>最小化</e2>(或<e3>图标化</e3>)选定的Emacs窗体，以允许您稍后将其恢复的方式将其隐藏(隐藏的确切方式取决于窗口系统)。
On a text terminal, <v0>cs</v0> is preceded by two additional characters that describe the coding systems for keyboard input and terminal output.
在文本终端上，<v0>cs</v0>前面有两个额外的字符，用于描述键盘输入和终端输出的编码系统。
On a text terminal, Emacs indicates line wrapping by displaying a ‘<s5>\</s5>’ character at the right margin.
在文本终端上，Emacs通过在右边距显示‘<s5>\</s5>’字符来指示换行。
On a text terminal, Emacs occupies the entire terminal screen.
在文本终端上，Emacs占据整个终端屏幕。
On a text terminal, suspend Emacs; on a graphical display, iconify (or “minimize”) the selected frame (<c0>suspend-frame</c0>).
在文本终端上挂起Emacs；在图形显示器上，图标化(或“最小化”)选定的窗体(<c0>suspend-frame</c0>)。

On a text terminal, the <k4>C-z</k4> command <e5>suspends</e5> Emacs, stopping the program temporarily and returning control to the parent process (usually a shell); in most shells, you can resume Emacs after suspending it with the shell command <c6>%emacs</c6>.
在文本终端上，<k4>C-z</k4>命令<e5>挂起</e5>emacs，暂时停止程序并将控制权返回给父进程(通常是shell)；在大多数shell中，挂起Emacs后，您可以使用shell命令<c6>%emacs</c6>恢复Emacs。
On a text terminal, there is only one cursor, which is shown in the selected window.
在文本终端上，只有一个光标显示在所选窗口中。
On a text terminal, this text is followed by a series of dashes extending to the right edge of the window.
在文本终端上，此文本后面跟着一系列延伸到窗口右边缘的破折号。
On a text terminal, you can optionally access the menu-bar menus in the echo area.
在文本终端上，您可以选择访问回显区的菜单栏菜单。
On frames created for <c0>emacsclient</c0> (see <a1>Invoking emacsclient</a1>), the next character is ‘<s2>@</s2>’.
在为<c0>emacsclient</c0>创建的窗体上(请参阅<a1>调用emacsclient</a1>)，下一个字符是“<s2>@</s2>”。
On graphical displays, <k0>C-0</k0>, <k1>C-1</k1>, etc. act the same as <k2>M-0</k2>, <k3>M-1</k3>, etc.
On graphical displays, <k1>C-<s2>END</s2></k1> does the same.
在图形显示上，<k1>C-<s2>END</s2></k1>执行同样的操作。
On graphical displays, <k3>C-<s4>HOME</s4></k3> does the same.
在图形显示上，<k3>C-<s4>HOME</s4></k3>执行同样的操作。
On graphical displays, as well as some text terminals which support mouse tracking, moving the mouse over the active text displays the help text as a <e2>tooltip</e2>.
在图形显示以及某些支持鼠标跟踪的文本终端上，将鼠标移到活动文本上会将帮助文本显示为<e2>工具提示</e2>。
On graphical displays, the window manager might block some keyboard inputs, including <k0>M-<s1>TAB</s1></k0>, <k2>M-<s3>SPC</s3></k2>, <k4>C-M-d</k4> and <k5>C-M-l</k5>.
在图形显示上，窗口管理器可能会拦截一些键盘输入，包括<k0>M-<s1>TAB</s1></k0>、<k2>M-<s3>SPC</s3></k2>、<k4>C-M-d</k4>和<k5>C-M-l</k5>。
On most keyboards, <t0>DEL</t0> is labeled <t1>BACKSPACE</t1>, but we refer to it as <t2>DEL</t2> in this manual.
在大多数键盘上，<t0>DEL</t0>标记为<t1>BACKSPACE</t1>，但在本手册中我们将其称为<t2>DEL</t2>。
On some systems, Emacs displays ‘<s6>(Unix)</s6>’ instead of the colon for files that use newline as the line separator.
在某些系统上，对于使用换行符作为行分隔符的文件，Emacs显示“<s6>(Unix)</s6>”，而不是冒号。
On terminals that don’t support mouse-tracking, you can display the help text for active buffer text at point by typing <k0>C-h .</k0> (<c1>display-local-help</c1>).
在不支持鼠标跟踪的终端上，可以通过键入<k0>C-h .</k0>(<c1>display-local-help</c1>)显示缓冲区内游标处交互文本的帮助文本。
On these systems, the <s2>~<v3>user-id</v3>/</s2> construct is supported only for the current user, i.e., only if <v4>user-id</v4> is the current user’s login name.
在这些系统上，即仅当<v4>user-id</v4>是当前用户的登录名时才支持<s2>~<v3>user-id</v3>/</s2>结构。
Once a task is done, I mark it as such using the <c0>DONE</c0> todo keyword.
一旦任务完成，我就使用<c0>DONE</c0>关键字对其进行标记。
Once echoing has started, the rest of the command echoes immediately as you type it.
回显开始后，命令的剩余部分会在您键入它时立即回显。
Once information is in the system, it may need to be moved around.
当信息进入系统后，可能需要四处移动。
Once inside the minibuffer for <k0>C-x <s1>ESC</s1> <s2>ESC</s2></k0>, you can use the usual minibuffer history commands (see <a3>Minibuffer History</a3>) to move through the history list.
进入<k0>C-x <s1>ESC</s1> <s2>ESC</s2></k0>的迷你缓冲区后，可以使用常用的迷你缓冲区历史记录命令(请参阅<a3>微型缓冲区历史记录</a3>)在历史记录列表中移动。
Once you’re done capturing, <c1>C-c C-c</c1> and it will get stored in the inbox.
一旦您完成捕获，使用<c1>C-c C-c</c1>将它存储在收件箱中。
One common way to quote is the typewriter convention, which quotes using straight apostrophes <t0>'like this'</t0> or double-quotes <t1>"like this"</t1>.
一种常见的引用方式是打字机约定，它使用直撇号<t0>‘像这样’</t0>或双引号<t1>“像这样”</t1>引用。
One convenient function to use as the value of <c4>confirm-kill-emacs</c4> is the function <c5>yes-or-no-p</c5>.
用作<c4>confirm-kill-emacs</c4>值的一个方便函数是<c5>yes-or-no-p</c5>函数。
One of the most important aspects of GTD is the inbox.
GTD最重要的一个方面是收件箱。
One of these prefix keys is <t4>ESC</t4>, because <k5><s6>ESC</s6> C-h</k5> is actually <k7>C-M-h</k7>, which marks a defun.
这些前缀键之一是<t4>ESC</t4>，因为<k5><s6>ESC</s6>C-h</k5>实际上是<k7>C-M-h</k7>，它标记一个函数定义。
One way to get a copy of GNU Emacs is from someone else who has it.
获得GNU Emacs副本的一种方式是从其他拥有它的人那里。
Only graphic characters can be inserted by typing the associated key; other keys act as editing commands and do not insert themselves.
只有图形字符可以通过键入相关键来插入；其他键充当编辑命令，不会自行插入。
Only show a template in a specific context.
仅在特定上下文中显示模板。
Optionally, you can compile the files and/or install them in your system.
（可选）您可以编译文件和/或将它们安装在系统中。
Options for exporting tables to LaTeX.
Org can be used to implement many different project planning schemes, such as David Allen’s GTD system.
Org可以用来实践多种不同的项目规划方案，例如David Allen的GTD系统。
Org can select items based on various criteria and display them in a separate buffer.
Org 可以根据各种条件来选择符合条件的事项，并在一个新的缓冲区中显示它们。
Org develops organizational tasks around notes files that contain lists or information about projects as plain text.
Org围绕笔记文件开发组织任务，这些笔记文件以纯文本形式包含有关项目的列表或信息。
Org files can include source code blocks, which makes Org uniquely suited for authoring technical documents with code examples.
Org文件可以包含源代码块，这使Org特别适合编写带有代码示例的技术文档。
Org files can serve as a single source authoring system with export to many different formats such as HTML, LaTeX, Open Document, and Markdown.
Org文件可以用作单一源创作系统，并可以导出多种不同的格式，例如HTML、LaTeX，Open Document和Markdown。
Org greatly simplifies the use of outlines by compressing the entire show and hide functionalities into a single command, <c0>org-cycle</c0>, which is bound to the <k1><s2>TAB</s2></k1> key.
Org通过将显示和隐藏的功能压缩到<c0>org-cycle</c0>这个单一的命令上来简化大纲的使用，它的按键绑定为<k1><s2>TAB</s2></k1>。
Org headlines start on the left margin<a0><s1>3</s1></a0> with one or more stars followed by a space.
Org标题从左边距<a0><s1>3</s1></a0>开始，后面跟着一个或者多个星号和空格。
Org is a mode for keeping notes, maintaining TODO lists, and project planning with a fast and effective plain-text markup language.
Org是Emacs的一个模式，它使用一种快速高效的纯文本标记语言，用来进行笔记管理、维护TODO列表以及项目规划。
Org is implemented on top of Outline mode, which makes it possible to keep the content of large files well structured.
Org基于大纲模式实现，这样就可以保持大型文件的内容结构良好。
Org is included in all recent distributions of GNU Emacs, so you probably do not need to install it.
Org包含在GNU Emacs的所有最新发行版中，因此您可能不需要安装它。
Org使简单的事情变得更简单。
Org mode buffers need Font Lock to be turned on: this is the default in Emacs<a0><s1>1</s1></a0>.
Org模式缓冲区需要打开字体锁定，这是Emacs中的默认设置s<a0><s1>1</s1></a0>。

Org mode deals with this in the following way: when you try to mark such an entry as done, using <k4>C-c C-t</k4>, it shifts the base date of the repeating timestamp by the repeater interval, and immediately sets the entry state back to TODO<a5><s6>70</s6></a5>.
Org mode通过以下方式处理此问题：当您尝试使用<k4>C-c C-t</k4>将这样的条目标记为完成时，它将重复时间戳的基准日期移位一个复读机间隔，并立即将条目状态设置回TODO<a5><s6>70</s6></a5>。
Org mode either offers completion or a special single-key interface for setting tags, see below.
组织模式提供完成或特殊的单键界面来设置标签，如下所示。
Org mode evaluates diary-style expression entries, and does it faster because there is no overhead for first creating the diary display.
Org mode计算日记样式的表达式条目，并且计算速度更快，因为第一次创建日记显示没有开销。
Org mode has extensive support for tags.
Org mode对标签有广泛的支持。
Org mode helps to organize such tasks using a so-called repeater in a ‘<s0>DEADLINE</s0>’, ‘<s1>SCHEDULED</s1>’, or plain timestamps<a2><s3>69</s3></a2>.
Org mode为了组织这样的任务，使通过在 ‘<s0>DEADLINE</s0>’, ‘<s1>SCHEDULED</s1>’,或普通时间戳<a2><s3>69</s3></a2> 上使用被称为复读机的功能。
Org mode often uses the same key for different functions, depending on context.
Org模式通常根据上下文将相同的键用于不同的功能。
Org provides Refile, Copy and Archive commands for this.
Org为此提供了转接，拷贝和归档命令。
Org source code blocks are fully functional; they can be evaluated in place and their results can be captured in the file.
Org源代码块功能齐全，可以对其进行求值，并将结果捕获到文件中。
Org supports tag insertion based on a <e0>list of tags</e0>.
Org支持基于<e0>标签列表</e0>的标签插入。
Org supports this and can show BBDB anniversaries as part of the agenda.
Org支持这一点，并可以将BBDB周年纪念作为议程的一部分。
Org uses just two commands, bound to <k0><s1>TAB</s1></k0> and <k2>S-<s3>TAB</s3></k2> to change the visibility in the buffer.
Org只使用两个命令来更改缓冲区中的可见性，分别是按键绑定<k0><s1>TAB</s1></k0>和<k2>S-<s3>TAB</s3></k2>。
Org uses various syntactical elements: TODO keywords, tags, property names, keywords, blocks, etc.
Org使用各种语法元素：TODO关键字，标签，属性名称，关键字，块等。
Org-mode’s built-in agenda commands are powerful tools for searching your notes and for gathering, sorting, filtering, and displaying your tasks.
Org-mode的内置议程命令是搜索笔记以及收集、排序、过滤和显示任务的强大工具。
Orgmode has a great feature that fits really well with this concept: <a0>org-capture</a0>.
Org模式有一个非常好的特性，非常适合这个概念：<a0>org-capture</a0>。
Orgmode is such a moldable tool that I don’t think that there are 2 exactly identical setups.
Orgmode是一个具有可塑性的的工具，我不认为有两个完全相同的设置。
Orgtbl for LaTeX and other programs.
Other characters represent various <e4>coding systems</e4>—for example, ‘<s5>1</s5>’ represents ISO Latin-1.
其他字符表示各种<e4>编码系统</e4>-例如，‘<s5>1</s5>’表示ISO Latin-1。
Other commands take two or more input events to invoke, such as <k1>C-x C-f</k1> and <k2>C-x 4 C-f</k2>.
其他命令需要调用两个或多个输入事件，例如<k1>C-x C-f</k1>和<k2>C-x 4 C-f</k2>。
Other history lists include buffer names, command names (used by <k0>M-x</k0>), and command arguments (used by commands like <c1>query-replace</c1>).
其他历史记录列表包括缓冲区名称、命令名称(由<k0>M-x</k0>使用)和命令参数(由<c1>query-replace</c1>等命令使用)。
Other useful combinations are <k3>C-u C-n</k3>, <k4>C-u C-u C-n</k4> (move down a good fraction of a screen), <k5>C-u C-u C-o</k5> (make sixteen blank lines), and <k6>C-u C-k</k6> (kill four lines).
其他有用的组合有<k3>C-u C-n</k3>、<k4>C-u C-u C-n</k4>(向下移动相当一部分屏幕)、<k5>C-u C-u C-o</k5>(留出16个空行)和<k6>C-u C-k</k6>(删除四行)。
Otherwise autoload Org functions will mess up the installation.
否则，自动加载的Org函数会破坏安装操作。
Otherwise the children of the current headline are sorted.
否则，对当前标题的子项进行排序。
Otherwise, Emacs refuses to exit the minibuffer; instead it tries to complete, and if no completion can be done it momentarily displays ‘<s2>[No match]</s2>’ after the minibuffer text.
否则，Emacs拒绝退出迷你缓冲区；相反，它会尝试补全，如果无法补全，它会在迷你缓冲区文本之后暂时显示“<s2>[No Match]</s2>”。

Otherwise, it is ‘<s3>Top</s3>’ if you are looking at the beginning of the buffer, ‘<s4>Bot</s4>’ if you are looking at the end of the buffer, or ‘<s5><v6>nn</v6>%</s5>’, where <v7>nn</v7> is the percentage of the buffer above the top of the window.
否则，如果查看的是缓冲区的开头，则为“<s3>Top</s3>”，如果查看的是缓冲区的末尾，则为“<s4>Bot</s4>”，或者为“<s5><v6>nn</v6>%</s5>”，其中<v7>nn</v7>是窗口顶部以上的缓冲区的百分比。
Otherwise, restrict it to the current subtree<a0><s1>94</s1></a0>.
否则,限制agenda视图的范围为当前的subtree
Outlines allow a document to be organized in a hierarchical structure, which, least for me, is the best representation of notes and thoughts.
大纲可以使使文档按层次进行组织结构，至少对我而言，这是笔记和思想的最佳表示形式。
Outlines make it possible to hide parts of the text in the buffer.
大纲可以让隐藏缓冲区中的部分文本成为可能。
Packages that conflict with Org mode

Place results of evaluation in the Org buffer.
将求值结果放入Org缓冲区。
Plain text URL-like links connect to websites, emails, Usenet messages, BBDB entries, and any files related to the projects.
类似纯文本URL的链接连接到网站，电子邮件，Usenet消息，BBDB记录以及与项目相关的任何文件。
Please run ‘<s4>make help</s4>’ to get the list of compilation/installation options.
请运行‘<s4>make help</s4>’ 来获得编译/安装选项的列表。
Please take the time to check the list.
请花一些时间检查这个列表。
Point must be on a headline for this to work<a0><s1>4</s1></a0>.
必须位于标题上才能正常工作<a0><s1>4</s1></a0>。
Position 1 is the beginning of the buffer.
Pressing keys assigned to tags adds or removes them from the list of tags in the current line.
按分配给标签的键可以在当前行的标签列表中添加或删除它们。
Prevent Org from interpreting your writing.
Preventing mistakes when editing invisible parts.
防止编辑不可见部分时出错。

Project planning and task management make use of metadata which is part of an outline node.
项目计划和任务管理利用了元数据，这些元数据是作为大纲节点一部分存在。
Promote or demote current heading by one level.
将当前标题提升或降低一个级别。
Promote the current subtree by one level.
将当前子树提升一个级别。

用于快速格式化的纯魔法。
Questions and bug reports can be raised on the Github issues page, or on the Emacs bug tracker or mailing lists, provided you cc the maintainer.
问题和错误报告可以在 GitHub问题页面，或者在Emacs错误跟踪器或邮件列表上， 只要你抄送维护员。
Rather than explaining the GTD methodology itself or how Orgmode works, in this post I’ll detail how I use Orgmode to implement GTD.
在这篇文章中，我将详细介绍如何使用Orgmode实现GTD，而不是解释GTD方法本身或Orgmode是如何工作的。
Re-execute a recent minibuffer command from the command history (<c0>repeat-complex-command</c0>).
从命令历史记录重新执行最近的迷你缓冲区命令(<c0>repeat-complex-command</c0>)。
Re-executing commands that used the minibuffer.
重新执行使用迷你缓冲区的命令。
Read a number <v0>n</v0> and move point to buffer position <v1>n</v1>.
读取数字<v0>n</v0>并将指针移动到缓冲区位置<v1>n</v1>。
Read a number <v0>n</v0> and move point to the beginning of line number <v1>n</v1> (<c2>goto-line</c2>).
读取数字<v0>n</v0>并将指针移动到行号<v1>n</v1>的开头(<c2>goto-line</c2>)。
Read a number <v0>n</v0> and move to column <v1>n</v1> in the current line.
读取一个数字<v0>n</v0>并移动到当前行中的列<v1>n</v1>。
阅读有关当前语法的文档。
Recent Emacs distributions include a packaging system which lets you install Elisp libraries.
最新的Emacs发行版包括一个打包系统，可让您方便的安装Elisp库。
重新计算所有从属字段。
Refile and Copy helps with moving and copying outlines.
转接和拷贝有助于移动和复制大纲。
Refile and keep the entry in place.
转接并在当前位置保留。
Refile as the child of the item currently being clocked.
转接到当前正在计时的节点的子项。
Refile entry or region to a different location.
将条目或区域转接到其他位置。
Refile the entry or region at point.
转接该位置上的记录或区域。
Related, but different feature is <c0>display-line-numbers-mode</c0> (see <a1>Display Custom</a1>).
相关但不同的功能是<c0>display-line-numbers-mode</c0>(请参阅<a1>显示自定义</a1>)。
Reload uncompiled versions of all Org mode Lisp files.
重新加载所有Org模式Lisp文件的未编译版本。
Remember to add the correct load path as described in the method above.
请记住按照上述方法添加正确的加载路径。
Remote editing from the agenda buffer means, for example, that you can change the dates of deadlines and appointments from the agenda buffer.
例如，从议程缓冲区进行远程编辑意味着您可以从议程缓冲区更改截止日期和约会日期。
Remote editing of TODO items means that you can change the state of a TODO entry with a single key press.
在议程buffer可以远程编辑TODO事项，这意味着您按一次键就可以改变某TODO事项的状态。
Remove current file from the list of agenda files.
将当前文件从agenda files中移除。
Remove the restriction created by <k0>C-c C-x <</k0>.
移除由<k0>C-c C-x</k0>创建的范围限制。
Repeating a command uses the same arguments that were used before; it does not read new arguments each time.
重复命令使用的参数与以前使用的参数相同；它不会每次都读取新的参数。
Repetition ends when you type a character other than <k2>z</k2> or press a mouse button.
当您键入<k2>z</k2>以外的字符或按下鼠标按钮时，重复结束。
Replying yes or no in the echo area.
Resolving idle time and continuous clocking
解决空闲时间和连续时钟
Resolving time when you’ve been idle.
在你空闲的时候解决时间问题。
Restrict an agenda command to the current buffer<a0><s1>93</s1></a0>.
限定接下来调用的议程视图的显示范围为当前buffer
Restrict the agenda to the current subtree.
将agenda的范围限制在当前的子树中。
Restrict the agenda to the item—either an Org file or a subtree in such a file—at point in the Speedbar frame.
将agenda的范围限制在光标所在处的项──可以是org文件，也可以是文件里的子树。
重用最近的迷你缓冲区参数。
Reveal context around point, showing the current entry, the following heading and the hierarchy above.
显示光标周围的上下文，显示当前条目、下面的标题和上面的层次结构。

Similarly, you can use <c3>:newline</c3> to indicate a line break.
同样，您可以使用<c3>:newline</c3>来指示换行符。
Simple characters and control characters, as well as certain non-keyboard inputs such as mouse clicks, are collectively referred to as <e0>input events</e0>.
简单字符和控制字符以及某些非键盘输入(如鼠标单击)统称为<e0>输入事件</e0>。
Simple characters, like ‘<s1>a</s1>’, ‘<s2>B</s2>’, ‘<s3>3</s3>’, ‘<s4>=</s4>’, and the space character (denoted as <t5>SPC</t5>), are entered by typing the corresponding key.
通过键入相应的键来输入简单字符，如‘<s1>a</s1>’、‘<s2>B</s2>>’、‘<s3>3</s3>>’、‘<s4>=</s4>’和空格字符(表示为<t5>SPC</t5>)。
Since <t0>RET</t0> in the minibuffer submits the argument, you can’t use it to insert a newline.
由于迷你缓冲区中的<t0>RET</t0>为提交参数，因此不能使用它插入换行符。
Since commands are Lisp functions, this works for commands too.
因为命令是Lisp函数，所以这也适用于命令。
Since commands are Lisp functions, you can use this method to view the documentation of any command whose name you know.
因为命令是Lisp函数，所以您可以使用此方法查看您知道其名称的任何命令的文档。
Since recursive editing levels affect Emacs globally, such square brackets appear in the mode line of every window.
由于递归编辑级别在全局范围内影响Emacs，因此这样的方括号出现在每个窗口的模式行中。
Since the minibuffer appears in the echo area, it can conflict with other uses of the echo area.
由于迷你缓冲区出现在回显区中，因此它可能与回显区的其他用途冲突。
Since the wrapping may occur in the middle of a word, continued lines can be difficult to read.
由于换行可能发生在单词的中间，因此连续的行会很难阅读。

由于时间戳记中有时间，因此如果您在20:00之前完成任务，
Since we are discussing customization, we should tell you about <e0>variables</e0>.
因为我们正在讨论定制，所以我们应该告诉您有关<e0>变量</e0>的内容。

Org 提供了六种不同的浏览视图。
So if you have not paid the rent for three months, marking this entry DONE still keeps it as an overdue deadline.
因此，如果你已经三个月没有付房租了，标记这个条目仍然是一个逾期的最后期限。
So it does not add any characters; instead, <t4>TAB</t4> displays a list of all possible completions in another window.
因此它不会添加任何字符；相反，<t4>TAB</t4>会在另一个窗口中显示所有可能的补全列表。
So that <c0>C-c C-w</c0> prompts me either for a project, the tickler, or someday/maybe list.
因此<c0>C-c C-w</c0>会提示我选择一个项目、备忘录或将来/也许清单。
Some Emacs commands are invoked by just one input event; for example, <k0>C-f</k0> moves forward one character in the buffer.
一些Emacs命令仅由一个输入事件调用；例如，<k0>C-f</k0>在缓冲区中向前移动一个字符。
Some commands care whether there is an argument, but ignore its value.
有些命令关心是否有参数，但忽略其值。
Some commands display informative messages in the echo area to tell you what the command has done, or to provide you with some specific information.
某些命令在回显区域显示信息性消息，以告诉您该命令执行了什么操作，或者为您提供一些特定信息。
Some commands interpret the argument as a repetition count.
一些命令将参数解释为重复计数。
Some commands use the value of the argument as a repeat count but do something special when there is no argument.
有些命令使用参数的值作为重复计数，但在没有参数时会做一些特殊的事情。
Some features are listed together with the minor modes whenever they are turned on, even though they are not really minor modes.
某些功能在打开时会与辅模式一起列出，即使它们不是真正的辅模式。
Some major modes display additional information after the major mode name.
某些主模式在主模式名称后显示附加信息。
Some of the commands in the menu bar have ordinary key bindings as well; if so, a key binding is shown after the item itself.
菜单栏中的一些命令也有普通的按键绑定；如果是这样，则在项本身之后显示一个按键绑定。
Some people find the many stars too noisy and would prefer an outline that has whitespace followed by a single star as headline starters.
有些人觉得星号太多了，他们更喜欢在大纲中使用空格后跟着一个星号作为标题的开头。
Some people view a TODO item that has been <e0>scheduled</e0> for execution or have a <e1>deadline</e1> (see <a2>Timestamps</a2>) as no longer <e3>open</e3>.
有人认为定期事项（有schedule属性）和有截止日期（有deadline属性）的事项（详见<e0>时间戳</e0>）不属于代办事项。
Some tasks need to be repeated again and again.
有些任务需要一遍又一遍地重复。
Some things are more important than others.
有些事情比其他事情更重要。
Sometimes you may inadvertently edit an invisible part of the buffer and be confused on what has been edited and how to undo the mistake.
有时，您可能会无意中编辑缓冲区的不可见部分，并对已编辑的内容以及如何撤消错误感到困惑。
Sometimes you might face a problem due to an error in your Emacs or Org mode setup.
有时您可能会由于Emacs或Org模式设置错误而遇到问题。
Sometimes, a line of text in the buffer—a <e0>logical line</e0>—is too long to fit in the window, and Emacs displays it as two or more <e1>screen lines</e1>.
有时，缓冲区中的一行文本(<e0>逻辑行</e0>)太长，窗口无法容纳，Emacs会将其显示为两个或多个<e1>屏幕行</e1>。
Sometimes, an entry may cover just part of a complex command.
有时，一个条目可能只包含复杂命令的一部分。
Sometimes, the prompt shows a <e0>default argument</e0>, inside parentheses before the colon.
有时，提示符会在冒号前的括号内显示<e0>默认参数</e0>。
Sometimes, you may need to edit files containing many long logical lines, and it may not be practical to break them all up by adding newlines.
有时，您可能需要编辑包含许多长逻辑行的文件，而通过添加换行符将它们全部拆分可能并不实际。
Sometimes, you may need to enter a password into Emacs.
有时，您可能需要在Emacs中输入密码。

TODO事项可能含有多个层级，用于将一个任务分解为多个子任务。

使用内置的表格编辑器可以轻松创建表格。

当议程搜索尝试匹配<c0>标签</c0>或<c1>标签-待办事项</c1>议程类型中的标签时，标签继承是相关的。

只需在缓冲区中的标题末尾键入标签即可。
Tags must be preceded and followed by a single colon, e.g., ‘<s2>:work:</s2>’.
标签必须前后各有一个冒号，例如，“<s2>:work:</s2>”。

这个EBDB的主要部分是记录，它代表人和组织；表示有关记录的详细数据的字段；以及保存并保存记录的数据库。

The <c3>apropos-documentation</c3> command lists its results in order of relevance by default; to list them in alphabetical order, change the variable <c4>apropos-documentation-sort-by-scores</c4> to <c5>nil</c5>.
<c3>apropos-documentation</c3>命令默认情况下按相关顺序列出其结果；要按字母顺序列出它们，请将变量<c4>apropos-documentation-sort-by-scores</c4>更改为<c5>nil</c5>。

The <e0>apropos</e0> commands answer questions like, “What are the commands for working with files?” More precisely, you specify an <e1>apropos pattern</e1>, which means either a word, a list of words, or a regular expression.
<e0>主题搜索</e0>命令回答类似于“处理文件的命令是什么？”。更准确地说，您指定了一个<e1>主题的模式</e1>，它表示一个单词、一个单词列表或一个正则表达式。
The <e0>minibuffer</e0> is where Emacs commands read complicated arguments, such as file names, buffer names, Emacs command names, or Lisp expressions.
<e0>迷你缓冲区</e0>是Emacs命令读取复杂参数的地方，比如文件名、缓冲区名、Emacs命令名或Lisp表达式。
The <k0><s1>DEL</s1></k0> (<c2>delete-backward-char</c2>) command removes the character before point, moving the cursor and the characters after it backwards.
<k0><s1>DEL</s1></k0>(<c2>delete-back-char</c2>)命令删除游标之前的字符，将光标及其后面的字符向后移动。
The <k0>C-M-v</k0> command in the minibuffer scrolls the help text from commands that display help text of any sort in another window.
在任何窗口中都可以使用<k0>C-M-v</k0>命令来滚动显示在迷你缓冲区中的帮助文本。
The <k0>r</k0> key in the agenda buffer regenerates it, and you can give a prefix argument to this command to change the selected TODO keyword, for example <k1>3 r</k1>.
在议程buffer中按<k0>r</k0>会刷新议程视图，您也可以通过一个前缀参数n筛选第n个TODO关键字，如<k1>3 r</k1>.

The <k6>i</k6> command to insert new entries for the current date works in the agenda buffer, as well as the commands <k7>S</k7>, <k8>M</k8>, and <k9>C</k9> to display Sunrise/Sunset times, show lunar phases and to convert to other calendars, respectively.
为当前日期插入新条目的<k6>I</k6>命令在议程缓冲区中起作用，<k7>S</k7>、<k8>M</k8>和<k9>C</k9>分别用于显示日出/日落时间、显示月相和转换为其他日历。
The <s3>*Messages*</s3> buffer is limited to a certain number of lines, specified by the variable <c4>message-log-max</c4>.
<s3>*Messages*</s3>缓冲区限制为一定的行数，由变量<c4>message-log-max</c4>指定。
The <t0>Delete</t0> (<c1>delete-forward-char</c1>) command deletes in the opposite direction: it deletes the character after point, i.e., the character under the cursor.
<t0>Delete</t0>(<c1>delete-ward-char</c1>)命令以相反的方向删除：它删除游标之后的字符，即光标下的字符。
The <v0>cs</v0> string and the colon character after it describe the character set and newline convention used for the current buffer.
<v0>cs</v0>字符串及其后面的冒号字符描述了用于当前缓冲区的字符集和换行符约定。
The AND operator ‘<s7>&</s7>’ is optional when ‘<s8>+</s8>’ or ‘<s9>-</s9>’ is present.
The Emacs manual is available in Info.

The MS-DOS convention uses a carriage return character followed by a linefeed character; when editing such files, the colon changes to either a backslash (‘<s2>\</s2>’) or ‘<s3>(DOS)</s3>’, depending on the operating system.
MS-DOS约定使用回车字符后跟换行符；编辑此类文件时，冒号将更改为反斜杠(‘<s2>\</s2>’)或‘<s3>(DOS)</s3>’，具体取决于操作系统。
The Org menu contains the current list of files and can be used to visit any of them.
org-switchb会列出当前agenda文件列表中的所有org文件,你可以用该菜单访问这些org文件。
The agenda shows the entries for each day.
议程显示了每天的条目。
The argument can be a keyword, a list of keywords, or a regular expression (see <a1>Regexps</a1>).
参数可以是关键字、关键字列表或正则表达式(请参阅<a1>正则表达式</a1>)。
The argument value appears in the prompt while the command name is being read, and finally <k2>M-x</k2> passes the argument to that command.
当读取命令名时，参数值出现在提示符中，最后<k2>M-x</k2>将该参数传递给该命令。

The arrow keys <k0><s1>UP</s1></k0> and <k2><s3>DOWN</s3></k2> work like <k4>M-p</k4> and <k5>M-n</k5>, but if the current history item is longer than a single line, they allow you to move to the previous or next line of the current history item before going to the previous or next history item.
箭头键<k0><s1>UP</s1></k0>和<k2><s3>DOWN</s3></k2>类似于<k4>M-p</k4>和<k5>M-n</k5>，但是如果当前历史项目超过一行，则它们允许您在转到上一个或下一个历史项目之前移动到当前历史项目的上一行或下一行。
The backtrace contains much more information if it is produced with uncompiled code.
如果回溯跟踪是用未编译的代码生成的，则包含更多信息。
The best way to report this is by providing, in addition to what was mentioned above, a backtrace.
最好的报告方法是，除了上面提到的以外，还提供回溯。
The bindings between keys and commands are recorded in tables called <e0>keymaps</e0>.
快捷键和命令之间的绑定记录在称为<e0>键映射</e0>的表中。
The buffer displayed in the selected window is called the <e1>current buffer</e1>, and it is where editing happens.
所选窗口中显示的缓冲区称为<e1>当前缓冲区</e1>，它是进行编辑的地方。
The buffer is in Agenda mode, so there are commands to examine and manipulate the TODO entries directly from that buffer (see <a1>Agenda Commands</a1>).
该buffer的主模式为Agenda mode，因此在该buffer中，许多命令可以直接检查和操作TODO事项（详见<a1>议程命令</a1>）。
The buffer lists the keywords that relate to the package in the form of buttons.
缓冲区以按钮的形式列出与包相关的关键字。
The calendar displays a three-month calendar with holidays from different countries and cultures.
该日历显示一个三个月的日历，其中包含来自不同国家和文化的假期。
The calendar page with current tasks.
包含当前任务的日历页。
The character after <v0>ch</v0> is normally a dash (‘<s1>-</s1>’).
The character after <v0>cs</v0> is usually a colon.
The characters between those two positions are the accessible ones.
这两个位置之间的字符是可访问的字符。
The command <c1>next-line</c1> does a vertical move downward.
The command <k0>C-c C-x c</k0> was created for this purpose; it is described in <a1>Structure Editing</a1>.
命令<k0>C-c C-x c</k0>就是为此创建的；<a1>结构编辑</a1>中介绍了该命令。
The command <k0>C-h C</k0> (<c1>describe-coding-system</c1>) describes coding systems—either a specified coding system, or the ones currently in use.
命令<k0>C-h C</k0>(<c1>describe-coding-system</c1>)描述编码系统-可以是指定的编码系统，也可以是当前使用的编码系统。
The command <k0>C-h I</k0> (<c1>describe-input-method</c1>) describes an input method—either a specified input method, or by default the input method currently in use.
命令<k0>C-h I</k0>(<c1>describe-input-method</c1>)描述一种输入法-指定的输入法，或默认情况下当前使用的输入法。
The command <k0>C-h h</k0> (<c1>view-hello-file</c1>) displays the file <s2>etc/HELLO</s2>, which demonstrates various character sets by showing how to say “hello” in many languages.
命令<k0>C-h h</k0>(<c1>view-hello-file</c1>)显示文件<s2>etc/HELLO</s2>，该文件通过显示如何用多种语言说“hello”来演示各种字符集。
The command <k0>C-x =</k0> (<c1>what-cursor-position</c1>) shows information about the current cursor position and the buffer contents at that position.
命令<k0>C-x =</k0>(<c1>what-cursor-position</c1>)显示有关当前光标位置和该位置的缓冲区内容的信息。
The command <k0>C-x z</k0> (<c1>repeat</c1>) provides another way to repeat an Emacs command many times.
命令<k0>C-x z</k0>(<c1>repeat</c1>)提供了将一个Emacs命令重复多次的另一种方法。
The command <k0>M-x count-words</k0> does the same job, but with a different calling convention.
命令<k0>M-x count-words</k0>执行相同的任务，但具有不同的调用约定。
The command prompts for a selection criterion, which is a boolean logic expression with tags, like ‘<s0>+work+urgent-withboss</s0>’ or ‘<s1>work|home</s1>’ (see <a2>Tags</a2>).
该命令会提示你输入筛选条件，该条件可使用布尔表达式，如“<s0>+word+urgent-withboss</s0>”或"<s1>work | home</s1>"（详见 <a2>标签</a2>）。

The command prompts for the sorting method, which can be alphabetically, numerically, by time—first timestamp with active preferred, creation time, scheduled time, deadline time—by priority, by TODO keyword—in the sequence the keywords have been defined in the setup—or by the value of a property.
该命令提示您输入排序方法，该方法可以按字母顺序、数字顺序，也可以首次有效时间戳、创建时间、计划时间、截止日期时间排序，同样也可以按优先级、按TODO关键字（按照关键字在设置中定义的顺序）或按属性的值进行排序。
The command that is bound to such keys has a generic name, like <c0>org-metaright</c0>.
绑定到此类键的命令具有通用名称，例如<c0>org-metaright</c0>。
The command then inserts the corresponding character into the buffer.
然后，该命令将相应的字符插入到缓冲区中。
The commands available in the Agenda buffer are listed in <a0>Agenda Commands</a0>.
<a0>议程命令</a0>中列出了议程缓冲区中可用的命令。
The commands available in the TODO list are described in <a0>Agenda Commands</a0>.
<a0>议程相关命令</a0>中提供了在议程buffer中的可用命令。
The commands available in the tags list are described in <a0>Agenda Commands</a0>.
要了解tags list视图中的可用命令,请参见<a0>议程视图中的命令</a0>。
The completion percentage you see on the screenshot is <a0>yet another neat feature</a0> of Orgmode :)
您在屏幕截图上看到的完成百分比是<a0>Orgmode的另一个出色的功能</a0>：)
The cursor in the selected window shows the location where most editing commands take effect, which is called <e0>point</e0><a1><s2>2</s2></a1>.
选定窗口中的光标是大多数编辑命令生效的位置，称为<e0>游标</e0><a1><s2>2</s2></a1>。
The default behavior is to display the binding for 2 seconds.
默认行为是显示绑定2秒。
The default completion styles are (in order):
默认补全风格为(按顺序)：
The default number of days displayed in the agenda is set by the variable <c0>org-agenda-span</c0>.
议程中显示的默认天数由变量<c0>org-agenda-span</c0>设置。
The default value is <c1>grow-only</c1>, which means the behavior we have just described.
默认值是<c1>grow-only</c1>，这意味着我们刚才描述的行为。

The default value is <c2>nil</c2> on systems that have case-sensitive file-names, such as GNU/Linux; it is non-<c3>nil</c3> on systems that have case-insensitive file-names, such as Microsoft Windows.
在具有区分大小写的文件名的系统(如GNU/Linux)上，默认值为<c2>nil</c2>；在具有不区分大小写的文件名的系统(如Microsoft Windows)上，默认值为非<c3>nil</c3>。
The default value, <c1>after-completion</c1>, gives the behavior we have just described.
缺省值<c1>after-completion</c1>给出了我们刚才描述的行为。
The defaults put into the “future history” in this case are controlled by the functions mentioned in the value of the option <c0>file-name-at-point-functions</c0>.
在这种情况下，放入“未来历史”中的默认值由选项<c0>file-name-at-point-functions</c0>的值中提到的函数控制。
The details of how this command works depend on the major mode.
此命令如何工作的详细信息取决于主模式。
The diary allows you to keep track of anniversaries, lunar phases, sunrise/set, recurrent appointments (weekly, monthly) and more.
这本日记可以让你记录周年纪念日、农历相位、日出/日落、定期约会(每周、每月)等等。
The dispatcher offers the following default commands:
议程调度程序提供了以下一些默认命令：
The downloaded archive contains contributed libraries that are not included in Emacs.
下载的档案包含Emacs中没有的贡献库。
The easiest way to do this is to use the command
最简单的方式就是使用命令
The easiest way to specify a numeric argument is to type a digit and/or a minus sign while holding down the <t0>Meta</t0> key.
指定数字参数的最简单方法是在按住<t0>Meta</t0>键的同时键入数字或减号。
The easy way to get rid of extra blank lines is with the command <k0>C-x C-o</k0> (<c1>delete-blank-lines</c1>).
删除多余空行的简单方法是使用命令<k0>C-x C-o</k0>(<c1>delete-blank-lines</c1>)。
The echo area is also used to display an <e0>error message</e0> when a command cannot do its job.
回显区还用于在命令无法执行其工作时显示<e0>错误信息</e0>。
The echo area is also used to display the <e0>minibuffer</e0>, a special window where you can input arguments to commands, such as the name of a file to be edited.
回显区还用于显示<e0>迷你缓冲区</e0>，这是一个特殊窗口，您可以在其中为命令输入参数，例如要编辑的文件名。
The echo area is so-named because one of the things it is used for is <e0>echoing</e0>, which means displaying the characters of a multi-character command as you type.
回显区之所以这样命名，是因为它的用途之一是<e0>回显</e0>，这意味着在您键入时显示多字符命令的字符。
The entire Emacs manual is available within Info, along with many other manuals for the GNU system.
整个Emacs手册以及GNU系统的许多其他手册都可以在Info中找到。
The executed command is added to the front of the command history unless it is identical to the most recent item.
执行的命令将添加到命令历史记录的前面，除非它与最近的项目相同。
The existence of a key binding does not stop you from running the command by name.
键绑定的存在不会阻止您按名称运行该命令。
The extracted information is displayed in a special <e0>agenda buffer</e0>.
检索出来的信息会显示在一个特殊的<e0>agenda buffer</e0>中。
The file is added to the front of the list.
当前文件会被添加在变量列表的首位。
The first <k2>C-x z</k2> repeats the command once, and each subsequent <k3>z</k3> repeats it once again.
第一个<k2>C-x z</k2>重复该命令一次，随后的每个<k3>z</k3>重复一次。
The first action of each project is called its “next action”, and that’s always the one I will do when working on a project.
每个项目的第一个行动被称为“下一步行动”，这也是我在处理项目时总是要做的。
The first two are opened in Emacs, and the third using a web browser via the <c0>browse-url</c0> command (see <a1>Browse-URL</a1>).
前两个是在Emacs中打开的，第三个是通过<c0>browse-url</c0>命令使用Web浏览器打开的(请参阅<a1>浏览器链接</a1>)。
The first two for are used for incomplete states, and the last two for completed states.
前两个用于未完成状态，后两个用于已完成状态。
The following additional completion styles are also defined, and you can add them to <c0>completion-styles</c0> if you wish (see <a1>Customization</a1>):
还定义了以下其他补全风格，如果您愿意，可以将它们添加到<c0>补全风格</c0>中(请参阅<a1>自定义</a1>)：
The following commands can be used with the completion list:
以下命令可以与补全列表一起使用：
The following commands jump to other headlines in the buffer.
以下命令跳转到缓冲区中的其他标题。
The following keys work if you turn off <c0>org-goto-auto-isearch</c0>
The global TODO list contains all unfinished TODO items formatted and collected into a single place.
全局TODO列表会将所有未完成的TODO事项整合在一起显示。
The goal column remains in effect until canceled.
目标列在取消之前保持有效。
The help commands <k0>C-h F <v1>function</v1> <s2>RET</s2></k0> and <k3>C-h K <v4>key</v4></k3>, described above, enter Info and go straight to the documentation of <v5>function</v5> or <v6>key</v6>.
上述帮助命令<k0>C-h F<v1><s2>RET</s2></k0>和<k3>C-h K</v4></k3>输入Info并直接转到<v5>函数</v5>或<v6>快捷键</v6>的文档。
The help commands to get information about a key sequence are <k0>C-h c</k0> (<c1>describe-key-briefly</c1>) and <k2>C-h k</k2> (<c3>describe-key</c3>).
用于获取键序列信息的帮助命令是<k0>C-h c</k0>(<c1>describe-key-briefly</c1>)和<k2>C-h k</k2>(<c3>describe-key</c3>)。
The homepage for GNU Emacs is at <a0>https://www.gnu.org/software/emacs/</a0>.<br1>
The if and where of the table of contents.
是否需要目录和目录的位置。
The ignored part of the file name is dimmed if the terminal allows it.
如果终端允许，文件名中被忽略的部分将变暗。
The income from sales goes to support the foundation’s purpose: the development of new free software, and improvements to our existing programs including GNU Emacs.
销售收入将用于支持基金会的目标：开发新的自由软件，并改进我们现有的程序，包括GNU Emacs。
The information to be shown is normally collected from all <e0>agenda files</e0>, the files listed in the variable <c1>org-agenda-files</c1><a2><s3>91</s3></a2>.
议程缓冲区显示的信息通常来自<e0>agenda file</e0>， 所谓agenda files 指的是变量<c1>org-agenda-files</c1>中的文件<a2><s3>91</s3></a2>。
The item (or all items in the region) is filed below the target heading as a subitem.
该项（或该区域中的所有项）作为子项转接在目标标题下方。
The key <t1>F1</t1> serves as an alias for <k2>C-h</k2>.
The keyboard commands <k1>C-f</k1>, <k2>C-b</k2>, <k3>C-n</k3>, and <k4>C-p</k4> move point to the right, left, down, and up, respectively.
键盘命令<k1>C-f</k1>、<k2>C-b</k2>、<k3>C-n</k3>和<k4>C-p</k4>分别指向右、左、下和上。
The keys <k0>M-1</k0>, <k1>M-2</k1>, and so on, as well as <k2>M--</k2>, are bound to commands (<c3>digit-argument</c3> and <c4>negative-argument</c4>) that set up an argument for the next command.
键<k0>M-1</k0>、<k1>M-2</k1>等等以及<k2>M--</k2>被绑定到为下一个命令设置参数的命令(<c3>数字参数</c3>和<c4>负参数</c4>)。
The last line of the window is a <e2>mode line</e2>.
窗口的最后一行是<e2>状态栏</e2>。
The line at the very bottom of the frame is the <e0>echo area</e0>.
窗体最底部的一栏是<e0>回音区</e0>。
The list of matches may then become very long.
然后，匹配的列表可能会变得非常长。
The list of previous minibuffer-using commands is stored as a Lisp list in the variable <c0>command-history</c0>.
以前使用迷你缓冲区的命令列表以Lisp列表的形式存储在变量<c0>command-history</c0>中。
The list variable <c0>completion-styles</c0> specifies the completion styles to use.
列表变量<c0>completion-styles</c0>指定要使用的补全风格。
The main area of the frame, below the tool bar (if one exists) and above the echo area, is called <e0>the window</e0>.
位于工具栏(如果存在)下方、回显区上方的窗体主区域称为<e0>窗口</e0>。
The manual lists both the keys and the corresponding commands for accessing a functionality.
该手册列出了用于访问一个功能的按键和相应的命令。
The mark: how to delimit a region of text.
标记：如何界定文本区域。
The match syntax described here also applies when creating sparse trees with <k3>C-c / m</k3>.
这里使用的匹配规则语法与创建sparse tree（<k3>C-c / m</k3>）时使用的语法是一样的。
The minibuffer is an Emacs buffer, albeit a peculiar one, and the usual Emacs commands are available for editing the argument text.
迷你缓冲区是一个Emacs缓冲区，尽管这是一个特殊的缓冲区，并且可以使用常用的Emacs命令来编辑参数文本。
The minibuffer now contains ‘<s1>auto-f</s1>’, and the only command name that starts with this is <c2>auto-fill-mode</c2>.
迷你缓冲区现在包含“<s1>auto-f</s1>”，并且唯一以此开头的命令名是<c2>auto-full-mode</c2>。
The minibuffer starts with a <e0>prompt</e0>, usually ending with a colon.
迷你缓冲区以<e0>prompt</e0>开始，通常以冒号结束。
The minor mode called Overwrite mode causes inserted characters to replace (overwrite) existing text, instead of shoving it to the right.
称为覆盖模式的辅模式会导致插入的字符替换(覆盖)现有文本，而不是将其推到右侧。
The name defined in <c0>org-footnote-section</c0> is reserved.

名称通常由几个用短划线分隔的英文单词组成；例如，<c0>next-line</c0>或<c1>forward-word</c1>。
The next <k2><s3>TAB</s3></k2> makes it a parent, and so on, all the way to top level.
下一次<k2><s3>TAB</s3></k2>使其成为父级，依此类推，一直到顶层。
The next element on the mode line is the string indicated by <v0>ch</v0>.
状态栏上的下一个元素是<v0>ch</v0>指示的字符串。

后面的数字是缓冲区中的总字符数，括号中的数字以总字符数的百分比表示位置。

The place in the text where editing commands operate.
文本中操作编辑命令的位置。

确切的条件可以在Emacs附带的GNU通用公共许可证中找到，也可以在本手册<a1><s2>1</s2></a1>中找到。

然而，这样做的问题是，重复条目的<e3>下一个</e3>实例也将不会处于正在进行的状态。
The procedure of determining what constitutes a match is quite intricate.
确定什么构成匹配的过程相当复杂。
The prompt is highlighted using the <c1>minibuffer-prompt</c1> face (see <a2>Faces</a2>).
提示符使用<c1>minibuffer-prompt</c1>字符样式突出显示(请参阅<a2>字符样式</a2>)。
The prompt states what kind of input is expected, and how it will be used.
提示符说明预期的输入类型，以及将如何使用它。
The purpose of the weekly/daily <e0>agenda</e0> is to act like a page of a paper agenda, showing all the tasks for the current week or day.
每周/每日<e0>议程</e0>的目的是充当纸质议程的页面，显示当前一周或一天的所有任务。
The real command name <c2>kill-backward</c2> will match that; if there were a command <c3>kill-text-before</c3>, it would also match, since it contains two of the specified words.
实际的命令名<c2>kill-backward</c2>将与此匹配；如果有命令<c3>kill-text-before</c3>，它也会匹配，因为它包含两个指定的单词。

The reason is simple: unless an entry is an appointment (to the dentist for instance) or has a fixed deadline (a release scheduled with a customer), I should decide what to work on depending on the current context (among other things).
原因很简单：除非条目是预约的(例如去看牙医)，或者有固定的截止日期(与客户安排的发布)，否则我应该根据当前的上下文(以及其他事情)来决定要做什么。
The recommended way to use Emacs is to start it just once, just after you log in, and do all your editing in the same Emacs session.
建议使用Emacs的方法是在登录后只启动一次，然后在同一个Emacs会话中进行所有编辑。
The second type of yes-or-no query is typically employed if giving the wrong answer would have serious consequences; it thus features a longer prompt ending with ‘<s0>(yes or no)</s0>’.
如果给出错误答案会产生严重后果，则通常使用第二种是或否查询；因此，它的提示以“<s0>(yes or no)</s0>”结尾。
The setting of <c3>suggest-key-bindings</c3> affects these hints as well.
The simplest kind of apropos pattern is one word.
最简单的一种主题搜索的句型就是一个词。
The simplest way to enter a minibuffer argument is to type the text, then <t0>RET</t0> to submit the argument and exit the minibuffer.
输入迷你缓冲区参数的最简单方法是键入文本，然后<t0>RET</t0>提交参数并退出迷你缓冲区。

此规则的唯一例外是<t2>ESC</t2>:<k3><s4>ESC</s4>C-h</k3>等同于<k5>C-M-h</k5>，它执行完全不同的任务。

<c2>completion-ignored-extensions</c2>的标准值有几个元素，包括<c3>“.o”</c3>、<c4>“.elc”</c4>和<c5>“~”</c5>。
The string ‘<s3>M-x</s3>’ appears at the beginning of the minibuffer as a <e4>prompt</e4> to remind you to enter a command name to be run.
字符串“<s3>M-x</s3>”显示在迷你缓冲区的开头，作为<e4>提示</e4>，提醒您输入要运行的命令名。
The syntax of capture templates is explained <a0>here</a0>.
<a0>此处</a0>介绍了捕获模板的语法。
The syntax table says which characters are opening delimiters, which are parts of words, and so on.
语法表说明哪些字符是开始分隔符，哪些是单词的一部分，等等。
The table editor as minor mode.
表格编辑器作为次要模式。
The table editor has spreadsheet capabilities.
具有电子表格功能的表格编辑器。
The tags interface shows the available tags in a splash window.
标签界面在启动窗口中显示可用标签。
The text displayed in the mode line has the following format:
状态栏中显示的文本格式如下：

The text inside the parenthesis shows the corresponding decimal, octal and hex character codes; for more information about how <k1>C-x =</k1> displays character information, see <a2>International Chars</a2>.
括号内的文本显示相应的十进制、八进制和十六进制字符代码；有关<k1>C-x =</k1>如何显示字符信息的详细信息，请参阅<a2>国际字符</a2>。
The tickler is one of the best concepts of GTD in my opinion.
在我看来，备忘录是GTD最好的概念之一。
The undo command applies only to changes in the buffer; you can’t use it to undo cursor motion.
撤消命令仅适用于缓冲区中的更改；您不能使用它来撤消光标移动。
The use of octal sequences is disabled in ordinary non-binary Overwrite mode, to give you a convenient way to insert a digit instead of overwriting with it.
在普通的非二进制覆盖模式下禁用八进制序列，以便为您提供插入数字而不是用其覆盖的便捷方式。
The usual solution is to break your lines before they get too long, by inserting newlines.
通常的解决方案是在行太长之前插入换行符。
The usual way to invoke Emacs is with the shell command <c0>emacs</c0>.
调用Emacs的通常方式是使用shell命令<c0>emacs</c0>。
The value of <c1>initial-buffer-choice</c1> may also be a function (of no arguments) that should return a buffer which is then displayed.
<c1>initial-buffer-choice</c1>的值也可以是一个函数(没有参数)，它应该返回一个缓冲区，然后显示该缓冲区。
The value of <c5>suggest-key-bindings</c5> can also be a number, in which case Emacs will show the binding for that many seconds before removing it from display.
<c5>suggest-key-bindings</c5>的值也可以是一个数字，在这种情况下，Emacs将在将绑定从显示中删除之前显示绑定的秒数。
The variable <c0>history-delete-duplicates</c0> specifies whether to delete duplicates in history.
变量<c0>history-delete-duplicates</c0>指定是否删除历史记录中的重复项。
The variable <c0>history-length</c0> specifies the maximum length of a minibuffer history list; adding a new element deletes the oldest element if the list gets too long.
变量<c0>history-length</c0>指定迷你缓冲区历史列表的最大长度；如果列表太长，添加新元素会删除最旧的元素。
The variable <c0>max-mini-window-height</c0> controls the maximum height for resizing the minibuffer window.
变量<c0>max-mini-window-height</c0>控制调整迷你缓冲区窗口大小的最大高度。
The variable <c0>resize-mini-windows</c0> controls the resizing of the minibuffer.
变量<c0>resize-mini-windows</c0>控制迷你缓冲区的大小调整。
The views are created through a dispatcher, accessible with <k0>M-x org-agenda</k0>, or, better, bound to a global key (see <a1>Activation</a1>).
各种议程视图都是通过一个调度程序创建的，其可以通过输入<k0>M-x org-agenda</k0>来显示，此外，更好的方式是将其绑定到一个全局快捷键上（详见<a1>激活</a1>
The yank level can also be specified with a numeric prefix argument, or by yanking after a headline marker like ‘<s0>****</s0>’.
粘贴时的级别也可以使用数字前缀参数指定，或者通过粘贴标题标记(如“<s0>****</s0>”)来指定。

'<s1>minimal-org.el</s1>”设置文件可以具有如下所示的内容。

文件名的“未来历史”包括几个您可能会觉得有用的备选方案，例如文件名或当前缓冲区中各点的URL。
Then <k4>C-n</k4> and <k5>C-p</k5>, when starting at the end of the logical line, move to the end of the next logical line.

Then typing <t2>F10</t2> will run the command <c3>tmm-menubar</c3> instead of dropping down the menu.
然后键入<t2>F10</t2>将运行命令<c3>tmm-menubar</c3>，而不是下拉菜单。
Then you no longer have to press <k1><s2>RET</s2></k1> to exit fast tag selection—it exits after the first change.
然后，您不必再按<k1><s2>RET</s2></k1>退出快速标签选择-它在第一次更改后退出。

There are a large number of configuration options listed in this manual, but the only one you might want to tweak in advance is ~ebdb-sources~ (see [[id:9a02f8fb-01e2-4cd8-8166-608814a031f7][The EBDB Database]]), which controls where EBDB stores its records.
此中列出了大量配置选项 手册，但您可能想要提前调整的唯一一个是 ~ebdb-sources~(请参阅[[id:9a02f8fb-01e2-4cd8-8166-608814a031f7][The EBDB数据库]])，它控制EBDB的位置 存储其记录。
There are compatibility issues between Org mode and some other Elisp packages (see <a0>Conflicts</a0>).
Org模式与某些其他Elisp软件包之间存在兼容性问题（请参见<a0>冲突</a0>）。
