有几个选项，包括<c4>auto-fill-mode</c4>和<c5>autoconf-mode</c5>，但它们都以<c6>auto</c6>开头，因此迷你缓冲区中的‘<s7>au</s7>’补全为‘<s8>auto</s8>’。

但是，对迷你缓冲区窗口有一些限制：例如，您不能拆分它。

有两种方法可以使其更加简洁紧凑。

有一个用于Org的网站，该网站提供指向Org最新版本的链接，以及其他信息，常见问题解答（FAQ），教程链接等。

还有一个用于插入标签的特殊命令：

还有一种非常简单的补全风格，称为<c0>emacs21</c0>。

没有历史记录或补全，在提交密码之前，您不能使用Emacs更改窗口或执行任何其他操作。
There is no limit to the length of key sequences, but in practice they are seldom longer than three or four input events.
键序列的长度没有限制，但实际上它们很少超过三个或四个输入事件。

Therefore, this manual mainly documents how to edit with the keyboard.
因此，本手册主要介绍如何使用键盘进行编辑。
There’s no need to list them here, as you can more easily see them yourself.
没有必要在这里列出它们，因为您可以更容易地亲眼看到它们。
These <e0>informative</e0> messages, unlike error messages, are not accompanied with a beep or flash.
与错误信息不同，这些<e0>信息性</e0>消息不会伴随蜂鸣声或闪烁。
These commands act cyclically; for instance, typing <t5>TAB</t5> at the last hyperlink moves back to the first hyperlink.
这些命令循环执行；例如，在最后一个超链接处键入<t5>TAB</t5>会返回到第一个超链接。
These commands are unusual, in that they use the minibuffer to read the regular expression argument, even though they are invoked from the minibuffer.
这些命令是不寻常的，因为它们使用迷你缓冲区来读取正则表达式参数，即使它们是从迷你缓冲区调用的。
These commands attempt to complete the text in the minibuffer, based on a set of <e4>completion alternatives</e4> provided by the command that requested the argument.
这些命令尝试根据请求参数的命令提供的一组<e4>补全选项</e4>来补全迷你缓冲区中的文本。
These dashes are omitted on a graphical display.
这些破折号在图形显示上被省略。
These features are described later in the manual.
本手册稍后将介绍这些功能。
These help commands are described in the following sections.
以下各节将介绍这些帮助命令。

这些条款要求他们向您提供完整的源代码，包括他们可能做出的任何更改，并允许您根据通用公共许可证的通常条款重新分发从他们那里收到的GNU Emacs。
These unusual cases are described when they come up; they exist to make an individual command more convenient, and they are documented in that command’s documentation string.
这些不寻常的情况会在出现时进行描述；它们的存在是为了使单个命令更方便，并且记录在该命令的文档字符串中。
They are then linked (using <c1>org-store-link</c1>) from Dired buffers into my projects for quick access.
然后将它们从Dired缓冲区链接(使用<c1>org-store-link</c1>)到我的项目中，以便快速访问。
This will open a new buffer in ~ebdb-mode~, and prompt you to create a database, if one doesn't already exist.
这 将在~ebdb-mode~中打开一个新缓冲区，并提示您创建 数据库(如果尚不存在)。
This <e1>startup screen</e1> contains information about Emacs and <e2>links</e2> to common tasks that are useful for beginning users.
此<e1>启动屏幕</e1>包含有关Emacs的信息，并且<e2>链接</e2>指向对初学者有用的常见任务。
This adds the character to the buffer at point.
这将在游标处将字符添加到缓冲区。
This aggressive completion style divides the minibuffer text into words separated by hyphens or spaces, and completes each word separately.
这种积极的补全风格将迷你缓冲区文本分成用连字符或空格分隔的单词，并分别补全每个单词。
This allows you to select and deselect tags with just a single key press.
这使您只需按一次键即可选择和取消选择标签。
This also keeps my agenda clean, free of any fake or self-imposed deadline or schedule.
这也让我的议程保持干净，没有任何虚假的或自我强加的最后期限或时间表。
This behavior is designed to give confident users fast response, while giving hesitant users maximum feedback.
此行为旨在为自信的用户提供快速响应，同时为犹豫不决的用户提供最大反馈。
This behavior is used by most commands that read file names, like <k0>C-x C-f</k0>, and commands that read buffer names, like <k1>C-x b</k1>.
大多数读取文件名的命令(如<k0>C-x C-f</k0>)和读取缓冲区名称的命令(如<k1>C-x b</k1>)都使用此行为。
This buffer is read-only, but provides commands to visit the corresponding locations in the original Org files, and even to edit these files remotely.
这个 agenda buffer 是只读的，但是它提供了一些命令来访问和编辑原文件的相应内容。
This can be achieved using a Org Indent minor mode.
这可以使用Org缩进辅模式来实现。
This can be configured through the variable <c3>org-startup-folded</c3>, or on a per-file basis by adding one of the following lines anywhere in the buffer:
这可以通过变量<c3>org-start-folded</c3>进行配置，也可以通过在缓冲区中的任意位置添加以下行之一来针对每个文件进行配置：
This can be useful, for example, to create a number of tasks related to a series of lectures to prepare.
例如，这对于创建与要准备的一系列讲座相关的多个任务非常有用。
This catches a common mistake, in which one types <t5>RET</t5> before realizing that <t6>TAB</t6> did not complete as far as desired.
这捕获了一个常见的错误，在该错误中，在意识到<t6>TAB</t6>没有补全之前，输入<t5>RET</t5>。
This collects the TODO items from all agenda files (see <a0>Agenda Views</a0>) into a single buffer.
该命令会从全部议程文件中收集TODO事项，并将其显示在一个buffer中（详见<a0>议程视图</a0>）
This command (<c0>left-char</c0>) behaves like <k1>C-b</k1>, except if the current paragraph is right-to-left (see <a2>Bidirectional Editing</a2>).
此命令(<c0>left-char</c0>)的行为类似于<k1>C-b</k1>，除非当前段落是从右向左的(请参阅<a2>双向编辑</a2>)。
This command (<c0>left-word</c0>) behaves like <k1>M-b</k1>, except it moves <e2>forward</e2> by one word if the current paragraph is right-to-left.
此命令(<c0>left-word</c0>)的行为与<k1>M-b</k1>类似，不同之处在于，如果当前段落是从右向左的，则它将<e2>向前移动</e2>一个单词。
This command (<c0>right-char</c0>) behaves like <k1>C-f</k1>, except when point is in a right-to-left paragraph (see <a2>Bidirectional Editing</a2>).
此命令(<c0>right-char</c0>)的行为类似于<k1>C-f</k1>，但游标位于从右向左的段落时除外(请参阅<a2>双向编辑</a2>)。
This command (<c0>right-word</c0>) behaves like <k1>M-f</k1>, except it moves <e2>backward</e2> by one word if the current paragraph is right-to-left.
此命令(<c0>right-word</c0>)的行为与<k1>M-f</k1>类似，不同之处在于，如果当前段落是从右向左的，则它将<e2>向后</e2>移动一个单词。
This command attempts to keep the horizontal position unchanged, so if you start in the middle of one line, you move to the middle of the next.
此命令尝试保持水平位置不变，因此如果您从一行的中间开始，则会移动到下一行的中间。
This command is not available for arguments that often include spaces, such as file names.
此命令不适用于经常包含空格的参数，例如文件名。
This command is usually redundant because the current line number is shown in the mode line (see <a1>Mode Line</a1>).
此命令通常是冗余的，因为当前行号显示在状态栏中(请参阅<a1>状态栏</a1>)。
This command offers possible locations for refiling the entry and lets you select one with completion.
此命令提供了可能的位置来转接该条记录，并让您选择一个完整的位置。
This command preserves position within the line, like <k1>C-n</k1>.
此命令保留行内的位置，如<k1>C-n</k1>。
This command repeats the previous Emacs command, whatever that was.
此命令重复前面的Emacs命令，不管是什么。
This completion style is similar to <c0>basic</c0>, except that it ignores the text in the minibuffer after point.
此补全风格类似于<c0>basic</c0>，不同之处在于它忽略了迷你缓冲区中游标之后的文本。
This copies the altered buffer contents back into the file <s4>test.emacs</s4>, making them permanent.
这会将更改后的缓冲区内容复制回文件<s4>test.emacs</s4>，使其成为永久性内容。
This creates an empty buffer, in which you can insert the text you want to put in the file.
这将创建一个空缓冲区，您可以在其中插入要放入文件中的文本。
This default will be used as the argument if you just type <t1>RET</t1>.
如果您只键入<t1>RET</t1>，则此默认值将用作参数。

This displays a help buffer describing the languages supported by the language environment, and listing the associated character sets, coding systems, and input methods, as well as some sample text for that language environment.
这将显示一个帮助缓冲区，描述语言环境支持的语言，并列出相关的字符集、编码系统和输入法，以及该语言环境的一些示例文本。
This displays a list of all command names that contain ‘<s2>file</s2>’, including <c3>copy-file</c3>, <c4>find-file</c4>, and so on.
这将显示包含“<s2>file</s2>”的所有命令名列表，包括<c3>copy-file</c3>、<c4>find-file</c4>等等。
This displays the Emacs FAQ, using Info.
这将使用信息显示Emacs常见问题。
This displays the available Emacs packages based on keywords.
这将根据关键字显示可用的Emacs包。
This displays the buffer <s2>*Messages*</s2>, where those messages are kept.
这将显示保存这些消息的缓冲区<s2>*Messages*</s2>。
This displays various information about what is going on in the buffer, such as whether there are unsaved changes, the editing modes that are in use, the current line number, and so forth.
这将显示有关缓冲区中正在进行的操作的各种信息，例如是否存在未保存的更改、正在使用的编辑模式、当前行号等。
This does modify the level of the subtree to make sure the tree fits in nicely at the yank position.
这会修改子树的级别，以确保树很好地适应在所粘贴的位置。
This feature exists mainly for compatibility with other editors, which are designed to be launched from the shell for short editing sessions.
此功能的存在主要是为了与其他编辑器兼容，这些编辑器设计为从shell启动，用于简短的编辑会话。
This feature is useful on certain text terminals where the <t14>Meta</t14> key does not function reliably.
此功能在<t14>Meta</t14>键功能不可靠的某些文本终端上非常有用。
This file should be reviewed once a week as part of the weekly review (which I do this on Sunday evenings).
这份文件应该每周审查一次，作为每周审查的一部分(我在周日晚上做这件事)。
This includes hyperlinks in Emacs buffers, as well as parts of the mode line.
这包括Emacs缓冲区中的超链接，以及部分状态行。
This includes the possibility to create extended agenda buffers that contain several blocks together, for example the weekly agenda, the global TODO list and a number of special tags matches.
自定义命令有很多功能，你可以创建一个自定义的议程buffer，其包含许多不同的模块，如每周议程、所有的TODO事项和一些匹配特定标签的标题。
This indication is typical for frames of an Emacs process running as a daemon (see <a3>Emacs Server</a3>).
此指示通常用于作为守护程序运行的Emacs进程的窗体(请参阅<a3>Emacs服务器</a3>)。
This information is then available the next time you start Emacs.
此信息在下次启动Emacs时可用。
This is a very wide topic, so obviously I haven’t covered everything, but I hope that explains the basics of how I use Orgmode to implement GTD.
这是一个非常广泛的主题，所以显然我没有涵盖所有内容，但我希望这解释了我如何使用Orgmode实现GTD的基础知识。
This is called <e2>line wrapping</e2> or <e3>continuation</e3>, and the long logical line is called a <e4>continued line</e4>.
这称为<e2>换行</e2>或<e3>继续</e3>，长逻辑行称为<e4>连续行</e4>。
This is done using the <c0>undo</c0> command, which is bound to <k1>C-/</k1> (as well as <k2>C-x u</k2> and <k3>C-_</k3>).
这是使用<c0>undo</c0>命令补全的，该命令绑定到<k1>C-/</k1>(以及<k2>C-x u</k2>和<k3>C-_</k3>)。
This is easy to do using the key <k3>C-o</k3> (<c4>open-line</c4>), which inserts a newline after point but leaves point in front of the newline.
使用键<k3>C-o</k3>(<c4>open-line</c4>)很容易做到这一点，它在换行符之后插入一个换行符，但将游标留在换行符前面。
This is especially useful with long lists of possible completions.
对于可能补全的长列表，这尤其有用。
This is information from the built-in debugger about where and how the error occurred.
这是内置调试器提供的有关错误发生的位置和方式的信息。
This is really only my way of doing it.
这实际上知识我个人的方法。
This is straightforward when the character is not a digit; for example, <k0><s1>C-u</s1> 6 4 a</k0>
当字符不是数字时，这很简单；例如，<k0><s1>C-u</s1>6 4 a</k0>
This is the <c0>GNU Emacs Manual</c0>, updated for Emacs version 27.1.
这是<c0>GNU Emacs手册</c0>，针对Emacs版本27.1进行了更新。
This is the official manual for the latest <a0>Org mode</a0> release.
这是最新版本 <a0>Org mode</a0> 的官方手册.
This is the only way to get the documentation of a command that is not bound to any key (one which you would normally run using <k1>M-x</k1>).
这是获取未绑定到任何键(通常使用<k1>M-x</k1>运行的键)的命令文档的唯一方法。
This is useful if you want to browse multiple Info manuals simultaneously.
如果您想要同时浏览多个信息手册，这将非常有用。
This knows about various manuals, not just the Emacs manual, and finds the right one.
它了解各种手册，而不仅仅是Emacs手册，并且找到了正确的手册。
This letter or digit is separated from the item name by ‘<s8>==></s8>’.
此字母或数字与项目名称之间用“<s8>==></s8>”分隔。
This list can become very long.
This lists packages using a package menu buffer.
这将使用包菜单缓冲区列出包。
This makes it possible to create a single file reproducible research compendium.
这使得创建单文件可重复性研究手册成为了可能。
This manual describes how to edit with Emacs and some of the ways to customize it; it corresponds to GNU Emacs version 27.1.
本手册描述了如何使用Emacs进行编辑以及定制它的一些方法；它对应于GNU Emacs版本27.1。
This manual is for Org version 9.4.
This manual is full of passages that tell you what particular keys do.
这本手册有很多段落告诉你特定的快捷键键有什么作用。
This means that after you type part of the argument, Emacs can fill in the rest, or some of it, based on what was typed so far.
这意味着在您键入部分参数后，Emacs可以根据到目前为止键入的内容填充剩余或其中的一部分。
This means that every logical line occupies a single screen line; if it is longer than the width of the window, the rest of the line is not displayed.
这意味着每条逻辑线都占据一条屏幕行；如果长于窗口宽度，则不会显示该行的剩余部分。
This method lets you assign tags to a headline with very few keys.
此方法允许您使用很少的键将标签分配给标题。
This paves the way for using the commands below.
这为使用下面的命令铺平了道路。
This prompts for the Unicode name or code-point of a character, using the minibuffer.
这会提示使用迷你缓冲区输入字符的Unicode名称或编码。
This restriction remains in effect until removed with <k0>C-c C-x ></k0>, or by typing either <k1><</k1> or <k2>></k2> in the agenda dispatcher.
此限制将一直有效，直到使用<k0>C-c C-x ></k0>删除，或通过在议程调度器中键入<k1><</k1>或<k2>></k2>。
This searches for <v0>topic</v0> in the indices of the Emacs Info manual, displaying the first match found.
这将在Emacs信息手册的索引中搜索<v0>主题</v0>，并显示找到的第一个匹配项。
This searches for commands whose names match the argument <v0>topics</v0>.
这将搜索名称与参数<v0>主题</v0>匹配的命令。
This shows the documentation for all the meanings of the symbol—as a variable, as a function, and/or as a face.
这显示了符号的所有含义的文档-作为变量、作为函数或作为字符样式。
This shows two dashes (‘<s1>--</s1>’) if the buffer displayed in the window has the same contents as the corresponding file on the disk; i.e., if the buffer is unmodified.
如果窗口中显示的缓冲区与磁盘上的相应文件具有相同的内容，即如果缓冲区未修改，则会显示两个破折号(‘<s1>--</s1>’)。
This takes you back to command level.
这会将您带回命令级别。
该查找通过命令<c1>multi-occur</c1>来实现。
This variable can be set to any number of days you want to see by default in the agenda, or to a span name, such a <c1>day</c1>, <c2>week</c2>, <c3>month</c3> or <c4>year</c4>.
此变量可以设置为您希望在议程中默认看到的任意天数，也可以设置为范围名称，例如<c1>日</c1>、<c2>周</c2>、<c3>月</c3>或<c4>年</c4>。
This very aggressive completion style attempts to complete acronyms and initialisms.
这种非常激进的补全风格视图补全缩略词和缩写。
This way my GTD files remain uncluttered and I never delete any data.
这样，我的GTD文件就会保持整洁，而且我永远不会删除任何数据。
This will show the documentation of all kinds of symbols: functions, variables, and faces.
这将显示各种符号的文档：函数、变量和字符样式。
Thus we might say <k1>M-x auto-fill-mode</k1> rather than <k2><s3>M-x</s3> <s4>auto-fill-mode</s4> <s5>RET</s5></k2>
因此，我们可以说<k1>M-x auto-fill-mode</k1>而不是<k2><s3>M-x</s3><s4>auto-fill-mode</s4><s5>RET</s5></k2>
Thus, <k2>C-u C-u C-f</k2> moves forward sixteen characters.
因此，<k2>C-u C-u C-f</k2>向前移动了16个字符。
Thus, <s1>~/foo/bar.txt</s1> specifies a file named <s2>bar.txt</s2>, inside a directory named <s3>foo</s3>, which is in turn located in your home directory.
因此，<s1>~/foo/bar.txt</s1>指定了一个名为<s2>bar.txt</s2>的文件，该文件位于名为<s3>foo</s3>的目录中，而该目录又位于您的主目录中。
Thus, even if you only work with a single Org file, that file should be put into the list<a0><s1>92</s1></a0>.
因此，即使你只使用一个org文件,也需要把该文件列入变量`org-agenda-files`中<a0><s1>92</s1></a0>。

Thus, if the text in the minibuffer is ‘<s0>foobar</s0>’, with point between ‘<s1>foo</s1>’ and ‘<s2>bar</s2>’, that matches ‘<s3><v4>a</v4>foo<v5>b</v5>bar<v6>c</v6></s3>’, where <v7>a</v7>, <v8>b</v8>, and <v9>c</v9> can be any string including the empty string.

Thus, if you are looking for commands to kill a chunk of text before point, you could try <k0>C-h a kill back backward behind before <s1>RET</s1></k0>.
因此，如果您正在寻找在游标之前删除文本块的命令，您可以尝试<k0>C-h a kill back backward behind before <s1>RET</s1></k0>
Thus, the cursor remains over the ‘<s11>b</s11>’, as before.
因此，光标仍然停留在“<s11>b</s11>”上，如前所述。
Thus, to find commands that work on files, type <k0>C-h a file <s1>RET</s1></k0>.
因此，要查找处理文件的命令，请键入<k0>C-h a file<s1>RET</s1></k0>。
Thus, to move down fifty lines, type
因此，要向下移动50行，请键入
Thus, two <k5>C-k</k5> commands with no arguments can kill a nonblank line, just like <k6>C-k</k6> with an argument of one.
因此，两个没有参数的<k5>C-k</k5>命令可以杀死一个非空行，就像<k6>C-k</k6>有一个参数一样。
Thus, you can enter <k1>M-a</k1> by typing <k2><s3>ESC</s3> a</k2>.

时间戳、日程安排和截止日期
Tips on how to speed up your agendas.
关于如何加快日程安排的小贴士。
To activate a link, either move point onto it and type <k6><s7>RET</s7></k6>, or click on it with <k8>mouse-1</k8> (the left mouse button).
要激活链接，可以将指针移到该链接上并键入<k6><s7>RET</s7></k6>，或者用<k8>鼠标键1</k8>(鼠标左键)单击该链接。
To activate a selected menu item, press <t6>RET</t6>; to cancel menu navigation, press <k7>C-g</k7> or <k8><s9>ESC</s9> <s10>ESC</s10> <s11>ESC</s11></k8>.
要激活选定的菜单项，请按<t6>RET</t6>；要取消菜单导航，请按<k7>C-g</k7>或<k8><s9>ESC</s9><s10>ESC</s10><s11>ESC</s11></k8>。
To add a deadline, press <c1>C-c C-d</c1>.
若要添加截止日期，请按<c1>C-c C-d</c1>。
To allow such commands in the minibuffer, set the variable <c0>enable-recursive-minibuffers</c0> to <c1>t</c1>.
要在迷你缓冲区中允许这样的命令，请将变量<c0>enable-recursive-minibuffers</c0>设置为<c1>t</c1>。
To answer, you must type ‘<s0>yes</s0>’ or ‘<s1>no</s1>’ into the minibuffer, followed by <t2>RET</t2>.
若要回答，必须在微型缓冲区中键入“<s0>yes</s0>”或“<s1>no</s1>”，后跟<t2>RET</t2>。
To begin editing this file in Emacs, type
要开始在Emacs中编辑此文件，请键入
To cancel the <k0>M-x</k0> and not run a command, type <k1>C-g</k1> instead of entering the command name.
若要取消<k0>M-x</k0>并且不运行命令，请键入<k1>C-g</k1>而不是输入命令名。
To create a file, just visit it with <k0>C-x C-f</k0> as if it already existed.
要创建文件，只需使用<k0>C-x C-f</k0>访问它，就好像它已经存在一样。

To disable this guessing, customize the option to a <c3>nil</c3> value, then the “future history” of file names will include only the file, if any, visited by the current buffer, and the default directory.
要禁用这种猜测，请将该选项自定义为<c3>nil</c3>值，那么文件名的“未来历史”将只包括当前缓冲区访问的文件(如果有的话)和默认目录。
To do more than insert characters, you have to know how to move point (see <a0>Point</a0>).
要做的不仅仅是插入字符，您必须知道如何移动游标(请参阅<a0>游标</a0>)。
To do that, press <c0>C-c C-s</c0> on an entry, and enter the date and/or time.
为此，请在条目上按<c0>C-c C-s</c0>，然后输入日期或时间。
To edit a file from another program while Emacs is running, you can use the <c0>emacsclient</c0> helper program to open a file in the existing Emacs session.
要在Emacs运行时编辑另一个程序中的文件，可以使用<c0>emacsclient</c0>帮助程序在现有Emacs会话中打开文件。
To enable this minor mode, type <k7>M-x minibuffer-electric-default-mode</k7>.
要启用此辅模式，请键入<k7>M-x minibuffer-electric-default-mode</k7>。
To end a line and start a new one, type <t0>RET</t0> (<c1>newline</c1>).
若要结束一行并开始新行，请键入<t0>RET</t0>(<c1>newline</c1>)。
To exclude scheduled/deadline items, see the variable <c2>org-agenda-tags-todo-honor-ignore-options</c2>.
您如果想要在搜索结果中剔除含有 Scheduled和Deadline 的事项，请参见<c2>org-agenda-tags-todo-honor-ignore-options</c2>.
To find a command’s documentation in a manual, use <k0>C-h F</k0> (<c1>Info-goto-emacs-command-node</c1>).
要在手册中查找命令文档，请使用<k0>C-h F</k0>(<c1>Info-goto-emacs-command-node</c1>)。
To further customize what happens when Emacs is exiting, see <a0>Killing Emacs</a0> in <c1>The GNU Emacs Lisp Reference Manual</c1>.
要进一步自定义退出Emacs时发生的情况，请参阅<c1>GNU Emacs Lisp参考手册</c1>中的<a0>终止Emacs</a0>。
To get an overview of open action items, or of events that are important for a particular date, this information must be collected, sorted and displayed in an organized way.
你如果要查看所有未完成的行动事项，或者某些特定日期的重要事件，那么必须要有一种方式来有组织地收集、分类和展示这些信息。
To insert a non-graphic character, or a character that your keyboard does not support, first <e0>quote</e0> it by typing <k1>C-q</k1> (<c2>quoted-insert</c2>).
若要插入非图形字符或键盘不支持的字符，请先通过键入<k1>C-q</k1>(<c2>quoted-insert</c2>)对其加<e0>引号</e0>。
To keep any text permanently, you must put it in a <e0>file</e0>.
若要永久保留任何文本，必须将其放入<e0>文件</e0>。
To kill Emacs without being prompted about saving, type <k0>M-x kill-emacs</k0>.
要在不提示保存的情况下终止Emacs，请键入<k0>M-x kill-emacs</k0>。
To learn more about the <c0>undo</c0> command, see <a1>Undo</a1>.
若要了解有关<c0>撤消</c0>命令的详细信息，请参阅<a1>撤消</a1>。
To learn more about using files in Emacs, see <a0>Files</a0>.
若要了解有关在Emacs中使用文件的详细信息，请参阅<a0>文件</a0>。
To limit tag inheritance to specific tags, or to turn it off entirely, use the variables <c0>org-use-tag-inheritance</c0> and <c1>org-tags-exclude-from-inheritance</c1>.
要将标签继承限制为特定标签，或将其完全关闭，请使用变量<c0>org-use-tag-inheritation</c0>和<c1>org-tag-exclude-from-heritation</c1>。
To make it easier to find packages related to a topic, most packages are associated with one or more <e0>keywords</e0> based on what they do.
为了更容易地查找与主题相关的包，大多数包都根据它们所做的事情与一个或多个<e0>关键字</e0>相关联。
To make the command see new possible targets, you have to clear the cache with this command.
要使命令能看到新的可可选择目标，必须使用此命令清除缓存。
To make use of this, you need to have Transient Mark mode turned on, which is the default.
要使用此功能，您需要打开“瞬变标记”模式，这是默认设置。
To mark a task with a repeater as DONE, use <k0>C-- 1 C-c C-t</k0>, i.e., <c1>org-todo</c1> with a numeric prefix argument of ‘<s2>-1</s2>’.
要使用复读机将任务标记为已完成，请使用<k0>C--1C-c C-t</k0>，即<c1>org-todo</c1>携带数字前缀参数‘<s2>-1</s2>’。
To move projects around, I also use refiling.
为了移动项目，我还使用转接。
To pass a numeric argument to the command you are invoking with <k0>M-x</k0>, specify the numeric argument before <k1>M-x</k1>.
要将数值参数传递给使用<k0>M-x</k0>调用的命令，请在<k1>M-x</k1>之前指定数值参数。
To prevent Emacs from inserting the default directory when reading file names, change the variable <c0>insert-default-directory</c0> to <c1>nil</c1>.
要防止Emacs在读取文件名时插入默认目录，请将变量<c0>insert-default-directory</c0>更改为<c1>nil</c1>。
To prevent others from seeing your password, every character you type is displayed as a dot (‘<s2>.</s2>’) instead of its usual form.
为防止其他人看到您的密码，您键入的每个字符都显示为点(“<s2>.</s2>”)，而不是通常的格式。
To repeat the command more than once, type additional <k0>z</k0>’s: each <k1>z</k1> repeats the command one more time.
要多次重复该命令，请键入其他<k0>z</k0>：每个<k1>z</k1>都重复该命令一次。

如果想要较长时间内agenda的范围,可以使用以下命令:

若要查看最近的回显区消息，请使用<k0>C-h e</k0>(<c1>view-echo-area-messages</c1>)。

若要查看哪些字符具有<k16>C-x 8</k16>速记，请键入<k17>C-x 8 C-h</k17>。

To select a region of headlines, it is best to place both point and mark at the beginning of a line, mark at the beginning of the first headline, and point at the line just after the last headline to change.
要选择标题区域，最好将光标和标记同时放置在行的开头，标记在第一个标题的开头，然后指向要更改的最后一个标题之后的行。
To select an agenda command to execute, press <c0>C-c a</c0>.
若要选择要执行的议程命令，请按<c0>C-c a</c0>。
To set these mutually exclusive groups in the variable <c0>org-tags-alist</c0>, you must use the dummy tags <c1>:startgroup</c1> and <c2>:endgroup</c2> instead of the braces.
要在变量<c0>org-tag-ist</c0>中设置这些互斥的组，必须使用虚拟标签<c1>:startgroup</c1>和<c2>:endgroup</c2>，而不是大括号。
To simplify this process, you can use the following special command:
为了简化此过程，可以使用以下特殊命令：
To specify a file in a completely different directory, you can kill the entire default with <k0>C-a C-k</k0> (see <a1>Minibuffer Edit</a1>).
要在完全不同的目录中指定文件，可以使用<k0>C-a C-k</k0>终止整个默认文件(请参阅<a1>迷你缓冲区编辑</a1>)。
To take another example, you can rebind the basic cursor motion commands (up, down, left and right) to any keys on the keyboard that you find comfortable.
再举一个例子，您可以将基本光标移动命令(上、下、左和右)重新绑定到键盘上您觉得舒服的任何键上。
To that effect, you need to bind them to globally available keys, like the ones reserved for users (see <a3>(elisp)Key Binding Conventions</a3>).
为此，你需要把它们绑定到全局可用的按键上，例如为用户保留的按键（请参阅 <a3>(elisp)键绑定约定</a3>）。
To this end, customize the variable <c0>tty-menu-open-use-tmm</c0> to a non-<c1>nil</c1> value.
To turn off the auto-indentation, you can either disable Electric Indent mode (see <a7>Indent Convenience</a7>) or type <k8>C-j</k8>, which inserts just a newline, without any auto-indentation.
要关闭自动缩进，您可以禁用电子缩进模式(请参阅<a7>缩进便利性</a7>)或键入<k8>C-j</k8>，它只插入换行符，而不自动缩进。
To turn on Org mode in a file that does not have the extension ‘<s1>.org</s1>’, make the first line of a file look like this:
要在非“ <s1>.org</s1>'扩展名的文件中打开Org模式，请在文件的第一行增加以下内容：
To use decimal or hexadecimal instead of octal, set the variable <c0>read-quoted-char-radix</c0> to 10 or 16.
要使用十进制或十六进制而不是八进制，请将变量<c0>read-quoted-char-radix</c0>设置为10或16。
To view a list of packages for a given keyword, type <t3>RET</t3> on that line; this displays the list of packages in a Package Menu buffer (see <a4>Package Menu</a4>).
要查看给定关键字的包列表，请在该行键入<t3>RET</t3>；这将显示包菜单缓冲区中的包列表(请参见<a4>包菜单</a4>)。
To view all documentation about any symbol in the text, move point to the symbol and type <k0>C-c C-c</k0> (<c1>help-follow-symbol</c1>).
要查看有关文本中任何符号的所有文档，请将游标移动到该符号，然后键入<k0>C-c C-c</k0>(<c1>help-follow-symbol</c1>)。
To view the associated documentation, move point there and type <t2>RET</t2> (<c3>help-follow</c3>), or click on the hyperlink with <k4>mouse-1</k4> or <k5>mouse-2</k5>.
要查看相关文档，请将游标移至此处并键入<t2>RET</t2>(<c3>help-follow</c3>)，或使用<k4>鼠标左键</k4>或<k5>鼠标右键</k5>单击超链接。
To view the full command name and documentation for a menu item, type <k0>C-h k</k0>, and then select the menu bar with the mouse in the usual way (see <a1>Key Help</a1>).
若要查看菜单项的完整命令名和文档，请键入<k0>C-h k</k0>，然后按常规方式使用鼠标选择菜单栏(请参阅<a1>按键帮助</a1>)。
To view this manual in other formats, click <a2>here</a2>.<br3>
若要以其他格式查看本手册，请单击<a2>此处</a2><br3>。
Toggle auto-exit after the next change (see below).
在下一次更改后切换自动退出(见下文)。
Toggle automatic display of the current line number or column number.
切换当前行号或列号的自动显示。
Toggle automatic display of the size of the buffer.
切换缓冲区大小的自动显示。
开启/关闭粘滞议程视图
Tracking how long you spend on a task.
跟踪您在一项任务上花费的时间。
Turn a normal line or plain list item into a headline—so that it becomes a subheading at its location.
将普通行或普通列表项转换为标题-使其在其所在位置成为副标题。
Turn off groups of mutually exclusive tags.
Two commonly-used modifier keys are <t1>Control</t1> (usually labeled <t2>Ctrl</t2>), and <t3>Meta</t3> (usually labeled <t4>Alt</t4>)<a5><s6>3</s6></a5>.
两个常用的修饰键是<t1>Control</t1>(通常标记为<t2>Ctrl</t2>)和<t3>Meta</t3>(通常标记为<t4>Alt</t4>)<a5><s6>3</s6></a5>。

Two variables control how the agenda buffer is displayed and whether the window configuration is restored when the agenda exits: <c0>org-agenda-window-setup</c0> and <c1>org-agenda-restore-windows-after-quit</c1>.
变量<c0>org-agenda-window-setup</c0>控制agenda buffer的显示方式，变量<c1>org-agenda-restore-windows-after-quit</c1>决定在退出agenda后是否恢复之前的窗口配置状态。
Type <k1>C-h p</k1> (<c2>finder-by-keyword</c2>) to bring up a list of package keywords, together with a description of what the keywords mean.
键入<k1>C-h p</k1>(<c2>finder-by-keyword</c2>)调出包关键字列表，并说明关键字的含义。
Type <k2>C-g</k2> to cancel the <k3>C-h f</k3> command if you don’t really want to view the documentation.
如果您确实不想查看文档，请键入<k2>C-g</k2>取消<k3>C-h f</k3>命令。
Type <k4>h</k4> after entering Info to run a tutorial on using Info.
输入Info后键入<k4>h</k4>以运行有关使用Info的教程。
Type <k8>C-g</k8> to dismiss the query, and quit the minibuffer and the querying command (see <a9>Quitting</a9>).
键入<k8>C-g</k8>取消查询，然后退出迷你缓冲区和查询命令(请参阅<a9>退出</a9>)。
Typesetting Conventions Used in this Manual
Typesetting conventions used in this manual.
Typing <k0>M-v</k0>, while in the minibuffer, selects the window showing the completion list (<c1>switch-to-completions</c1>).
在迷你缓冲区中键入<k0>M-v</k0>，选择显示补全列表的窗口(<c1>switch-to-completions</c1>)。
Typing <k3>M-n</k3> (<c4>next-history-element</c4>) moves through the minibuffer history list in the opposite direction, fetching later entries into the minibuffer.
键入<k3>M-n</k3>(<c4>next-history-element</c4>)以相反的方向遍历迷你缓冲区历史列表，将稍后的项提取到迷你缓冲区中。
Typing <t1>RET</t1> does not complete, it just submits the argument as you have entered it.
键入<t1>RET</t1>不会补全，它只提交您输入的参数。
Typing <t1>RET</t1> exits the minibuffer only if the minibuffer text is an exact match, or completes to one.
仅当迷你缓冲区文本完全匹配或只有一个补全选项时，键入<t1>RET</t1>才会退出迷你缓冲区。
Typing the help character (<k0>C-h</k0> or <t1>F1</t1>) after a prefix key displays a list of the commands starting with that prefix.
在前缀键后键入帮助字符(<k0>C-h</k0>或<t1>F1</t1>)将显示以该前缀开头的命令列表。
Typing three slashes in a row ignores everything in remote file names.
在一行中键入三个斜杠将忽略远程文件名中的所有内容。
指向互联网的类似URL的链接。
Undo one entry of the undo records—usually, one command worth (<c0>undo</c0>).
撤消一个撤消记录条目-通常相当于一个命令(<c0>undo</c0>)。
Undoing recent changes in the text.
撤消文本中最近的更改。
Unlike <k0>C-n</k0> and <k1>C-p</k1>, most of the Emacs commands that work on lines work on <e2>logical</e2> lines.
与<k0>C-n</k0>和<k1>C-p</k1>不同，大多数适用于行的Emacs命令都适用于<e2>逻辑行</e2>。
Unlike <t10>Meta</t10>, <t11>ESC</t11> is entered as a separate character.
与<t10>Meta</t10>不同，<t11>ESC</t11>作为单独的字符输入。
Until then, you can just focus on something else and free your mind from this task.
在那之前，你可以把注意力放在别的事情上，把你的思想从这项任务中解放出来。
Until you save, the changed text exists only inside Emacs, and the file <s5>test.emacs</s5> is unaltered.
在保存之前，更改后的文本仅存在于Emacs中，文件<s5>test.emacs</s5>未更改。
Use and contribute to a library of useful code blocks.
使用有用的代码块类库并为其做出贡献。
Use the current column of point as the <e0>semipermanent goal column</e0> for <k1>C-n</k1> and <k2>C-p</k2> (<c3>set-goal-column</c3>) in the current buffer.
将当前游标所在的列用作当前缓冲区中<k1>C-n</k1>和<k2>C-p</k2>(<c3>set-target-column</c3>)的<e0>半永久目标列</e0>。
Use the refile interface to jump to a heading.
使用转接界面跳转到标题。
Use this to (as an exception) assign several tags from such a group.
使用此选项(作为例外)从这样的组中分配多个标记。
User-defined properties are capitalized; built-in properties with special meaning are written with all capitals.
用户定义的属性以首字母大写形式； 具有特殊含义的内置属性使用全大写字母书写。
User-defined tags are written in lowercase; built-in tags with special meaning are written as they should appear in the document, usually with all capitals.
用户定义的标签以小写形式编写； 具有特殊含义的内置标签应按应在文档中出现的方式书写，通常使用全大写。
Using Column View in the Agenda
Using a command line argument, you can tell Emacs to visit one or more files as soon as it starts up.
使用命令行参数，您可以告诉Emacs在启动时立即访问一个或多个文件。
Using column view for collected entries.
对收集到的条目使用列视图。
Using direct HTML in Org files.
Using dired to select an attachment
Usually, lines of text are separated by <e1>newline characters</e1> in a file, but two other conventions are sometimes used.
通常，文件中的文本行由<e1>换行符</e1>分隔，但有时还会使用另外两个约定。
Usually, this is the same as the name of a file you are editing.
通常，这与您正在编辑的文件的名称相同。
Usually, we state the name of the command which really does the work in parentheses after mentioning the key that runs it.
通常，在提到运行该命令的快捷键之后，我们会在括号中说明真正执行该工作的命令的名称。
Viewing and capture on a mobile device.
在移动设备上查看和捕获。
Visibility cycling and structure editing help to work with the tree.
可见性循环和结构编辑有助于与树配合使用。
Visit the <a0>page</a0> with information about the GNU Project (<c1>describe-gnu-project</c1>).
有关GNU项目的信息，请访问<a0>页面</a0>(<c1>describe-gnu-project</c1>)。
Visual Line mode also redefines editing commands such as <k1>C-a</k1>, <k2>C-n</k2>, and <k3>C-k</k3> to operate on screen lines rather than logical lines.
Visual Line mode还重新定义编辑命令，如<k1>C-a</k1>、<k2>C-n</k2>和<k3>C-k</k3>，以在屏幕行而不是逻辑行上操作。
We <s0>strongly recommend</s0> sticking to a single installation method.
我们<s0>强烈建议</s0>坚持只使用一种安装方法。
We also sell hardcopy versions of this manual and <c0>An Introduction to Programming in Emacs Lisp</c0>, by Robert J. Chassell.
我们还销售本手册的硬拷贝版本和Robert J. Chassell.编写的<c0>Emacs Lisp编程入门</c0>。
We ask you to read and respect the <a4>GNU Kind Communications Guidelines</a4> when sending messages on this mailing list.
在此邮件列表上发送消息时，我们请您阅读并遵守<a4>GNU善意沟通准则</a4>
We call Emacs <e0>advanced</e0> because it can do much more than simple insertion and deletion of text.
我们称Emacs<e0>高级</e0>是因为它不只是简单地插入和删除文本。
We call it the “minibuffer” because it’s a special-purpose buffer with a small amount of screen space.
我们称它为“迷你缓冲区”，因为它是一个具有少量屏幕空间的专用缓冲区。
We have seen how <k0><s1>RET</s1></k0> (<c2>newline</c2>) starts a new line of text.
我们已经看到<k0><s1>RET</s1></k0>(<c2>newline</c2>)如何开始新的文本行。
We mention the <t0>RET</t0> only for emphasis, such as when the command is followed by arguments.
我们提到<t0>RET</t0>只是为了强调，例如当命令后面跟着参数时。

We use the term <e0>prefix argument</e0> to emphasize that you type such arguments <e1>before</e1> the command, and to distinguish them from minibuffer arguments (see <a2>Minibuffer</a2>), which are entered <e3>after</e3> invoking the command.
我们使用术语<e0>前缀参数</e0>来强调您在命令<e1>之前</e1>键入这样的参数，并将它们与迷你缓冲区参数(请参阅<a2>迷你缓冲区</a2>)区分开来，后者是在调用命令<e3>之后</e3>输入的。
We will use the term <e0>frame</e0> to mean a graphical window or terminal screen occupied by Emacs.
我们将使用术语<e0>窗体</e0>来表示Emacs占据的图形窗口或终端屏幕。
What did you expect to happen?
What files are part of the project?
哪些文件是项目的一部分？
What is available out of the box?
开箱即用的功能有哪些？
What is needed for a complete template entry.
完整的模板条目需要什么。
What is not allowed is to try to prevent others from further sharing any version of GNU Emacs that they might get from you.
不允许的是试图阻止其他人进一步分享他们可能从您那里获得的任何版本的GNU Emacs。
What line, row, or column is point on?
游标处于哪一行、那一列？
What to do with finished products.
完成后的节点怎么处理。
What will this snippet look like?
这个片段会是什么样子呢？
When <c0>line-move-visual</c0> is <c1>nil</c1>, you can also set the variable <c2>track-eol</c2> to a non-<c3>nil</c3> value.
当<c0>line-move-visual</c0>为<c1>nil</c1>时，您还可以将变量<c2>track-eol</c2>设置为非<c3>nil</c3>值。
When <k0>M-x</k0> completes on commands, it ignores the commands that are declared <e1>obsolete</e1>; for these, you will have to type their full name.
当<k0>M-x</k0>补全命令时，它将忽略声明为<e1>已过时</e1>的命令；对于这些命令，您必须键入其全名。
When <k0>S-<s1>TAB</s1></k0> is called with a numeric prefix argument <v2>N</v2>, view contents only up to headlines of level <v3>N</v3>.
当<k0>S-<s1>TAB</s1></k0>使用数字前缀参数<v2>N</v2>调用时，仅查看直到<v3>N</v3>级别的标题的内容。
When Emacs first visits an Org file, the global state is set to <c0>showeverything</c0>, i.e., all file content is visible<a1><s2>6</s2></a1>.
当Emacs首次访问Org文件时，全局状态设置为<c0>showeverything</c0>，即所有文件内容均可见<a1><s2>6</s2></a1>。
When Emacs starts up, the initial frame displays a special buffer named ‘<s0>*GNU Emacs*</s0>’.
当Emacs启动时，初始窗体中显示一个名为‘<s0>*GNU Emacs*</s0>’的特殊缓冲区。
When a command reads an argument using the minibuffer with completion, it also controls what happens when you type <t0>RET</t0> (<c1>minibuffer-complete-and-exit</c1>) to submit the argument.
当命令使用带有补全的迷你缓冲区读取参数时，它还控制当您键入<t0>RET</t0>(<c1>minibuffer-complete-and-exit</c1>)提交参数时发生的情况。
When a function name, variable name, or face name (see <a0>Faces</a0>) appears in the documentation in the help buffer, it is normally an underlined <e1>hyperlink</e1>.
当函数名、变量名或字符样式名(请参阅<a0>字符样式</a0>)出现在帮助缓冲区的文档中时，它通常是带下划线的<e1>超链接</e1>。
When a headline matches during a tags search while tag inheritance is turned on, all the sublevels in the same tree—for a simple match form—match as well<a0><s1>52</s1></a0>.
如果在打开标记继承的情况下在标签搜索期间匹配标题，则同一树中的所有子级别(对于简单匹配表单)也会匹配<a0><s1>52</s1></a0>。
When a line of text in the buffer is longer than the width of the window, Emacs usually displays it on two or more <e0>screen lines</e0>.
当缓冲区中的一行文本长于窗口宽度时，Emacs通常将其显示在两个或多个<e0>屏幕行</e0>上。
When a semipermanent goal column is in effect, those commands always try to move to this column, or as close as possible to it, after moving vertically.
当半永久性目标列生效时，这些命令始终在垂直移动后尝试移动到该列或尽可能靠近该列。
When called with a <k3>C-u</k3> prefix, all tags in the current buffer are aligned to that column, just to make things look nice.
当使用<k3>C-u</k3>前缀调用时，当前缓冲区中的所有标签都与该列对齐，这只是为了让事情看起来更好看。
When called with a universal prefix argument or with point before the first headline in a file, set the agenda scope to the entire file.
使用该命令时，如果附带了前缀参数，或是光标置于第一个标题之前，genda的范围被限制为整个这个文件。
When completing buffer names, case differences are ignored if the variable <c4>read-buffer-completion-ignore-case</c4> is non-<c5>nil</c5>; the default is <c6>nil</c6>.
补全缓冲区名称时，如果变量<c4>read-buffer-completion-ignore-case</c4>非<c5>nil</c5>，则忽略大小写差异；默认值为<c6>nil</c6>。
When completing file names, Emacs usually omits certain alternatives that are considered unlikely to be chosen, as determined by the list variable <c0>completion-ignored-extensions</c0>.
在补全文件名时，Emacs通常会省略某些被认为不太可能选择的备选方案，这由列表变量<c0>completion-ignored-extensions</c0>确定。
When completing file names, case differences are ignored if the variable <c0>read-file-name-completion-ignore-case</c0> is non-<c1>nil</c1>.
补全文件名时，如果变量<c0>read-file-name-completion-ignore-case</c0>非<c1>nil</c1>，则忽略大小写差异。

When completing remote file names (see <a0>Remote Files</a0>), a double slash behaves slightly differently: it causes Emacs to ignore only the file-name part, leaving the rest (method, host and username, etc.) intact.
在补全远程文件名(请参阅<a0>远程文件</a0>)时，双斜杠的行为略有不同：它导致Emacs仅忽略文件名部分，而保留剩余(方法、主机和用户名等)完好无损。
When completion is available, certain keys (usually <t0>TAB</t0>, <t1>RET</t1>, and <t2>SPC</t2>) are rebound in the minibuffer to special completion commands (see <a3>Completion Commands</a3>).
当补全可用时，某些键(通常为<t0>TAB</t0>、<t1>RET</t1>和<t2>SPC</t2>)在迷你缓冲区中表现为特殊的补全命令(请参阅<a3>补全命令</a3>)。
When deciding what to work on, I use either <a0>sparse trees</a0> – which makes it easy to filter the content of my GTD projects by tag, search term, etc., or I use <a1>custom agenda commands</a1>.
当决定要处理什么时，我会使用<a0>稀疏树</a0>——这使得通过标签、搜索词等过滤我的GTD项目内容变得很容易，或者我使用<a1>自定义议程命令</a1>。
状态是什么时候更改的？
When discovering Orgmode, most people think that its agenda is just a regular agenda.
在发现Orgmode时，大多数人认为它的议程只是一个常规议程。

When editing a program, if you have an Info version of the manual for the programming language, you can use <k0>C-h S</k0> (<c1>info-lookup-symbol</c1>) to find an entry for a symbol (keyword, function or variable) in the proper manual.
编辑程序时，如果您有编程语言手册的Info版本，则可以使用<k0>C-h S</k0>(<c1>info-lookup-symbol</c1>)在适当的手册中查找符号(关键字、函数或变量)的条目。
When first fired up, it should feel like a straightforward, easy to use outliner.
初次启动时，它应该看起来像一个简单易用的大纲工具。
When not active, the minibuffer is in <c0>minibuffer-inactive-mode</c0>, and clicking <k1>mouse-1</k1> there shows the <s2>*Messages*</s2> buffer.
不活动时，迷你缓冲区处于<c0>minibuffer-inactive-mode</c0>，单击<k1>鼠标</k1>会显示<s2>*Messages*</s2>缓冲区。
When on a headline, press <c0>C-c C-t</c0> to set the TODO keyword.
在标题上，按<c0>C-c C-t</c0>设置TODO关键字。
When one task needs to wait for others.
当一个任务需要等待其他任务时。
When point is in a headline, this does the same as <k0>C-c C-q</k0>.
当光标位于标题中时，其作用与<k0>C-c C-q</k0>相同。
When processing the inbox, I <a0>refile</a0> each entry that is actionable and belongs to a project using <c1>C-c C-w</c1>, moving the entry to the appropriate place.
在处理收件箱时，我把每一个可执行且属于某个项目的条目使用<c1>C-c C-w</c1><a0>转接</a0>，并将条目移动到适当的位置。
When reviewing the captured data, you may want to refile or to copy some of the entries into a different list, for example into a project.
当查看捕获的数据时，您可能需要重新归档或将某些记录复制到其他列表中，例如复制到一个项目中。
When the command you run with <k0>M-x</k0> has a key binding, Emacs mentions this in the echo area after running the command.
当您使用<k0>M-x</k0>运行的命令具有键绑定时，Emacs会在运行该命令后在回显区中提到这一点。
When the default search is not enough.
When the minibuffer is active, the echo area is treated much like an ordinary Emacs window.
当迷你缓冲区处于活动状态时，回显区的处理方式与普通Emacs窗口非常相似。
When the minibuffer is in use, it appears in the echo area, with a cursor.
当迷你缓冲区正在使用时，它会与光标一起出现在回显区中。

When the minibuffer is in use, the text displayed in the echo area begins with a <e1>prompt string</e1>, and the active cursor appears within the minibuffer, which is temporarily considered the selected window.
当迷你缓冲区正在使用时，回显区中显示的文本以<e1>提示字符串</e1>开头，活动光标出现在迷你缓冲区内，该窗口暂时被视为选中的窗口。
When the minibuffer is used to read a file name, it typically starts out with some initial text ending in a slash.
当使用迷你缓冲区读取文件名时，它通常以一些以斜杠结尾的初始文本开始。
When the variable <c4>org-log-refile</c4><a5><s6>83</s6></a5> is set, a timestamp or a note is recorded whenever an entry is refiled.
当变量<c4>org-log-refile</c4><a5><s6>83</s6></a5>被设置时，无论何时转接笔记，都会记录时间戳或注释。
When there is an active region, all entries in the region are sorted.
当存在活动区域时，将对该区域中的所有条目进行排序。
When there is an active region—i.e., when Transient Mark mode is active—promotion and demotion work on all headlines in the region.
当存在活动区域时-即，当瞬变标记模式处于活动状态时-该区域中的所有标题都会执行升级和降级。
When there is only one window, the mode line appears right above the echo area; it is the next-to-last line in the frame.
当只有一个窗口时，模式行显示在回声区域的正上方；它是窗体中倒数第二行。
When this command is used in the middle of a line, the line is split and the rest of the line becomes the new item or headline.
当在行中间使用此命令时，该行将被拆分，该行的剩余部分将成为新项或标题。
When time will come, the action will appear in your Org Agenda, reminding you of the bill you have to pay, and all you will have to do is moving it to your inbox.
当时间到来时，该操作将出现在您的Org议程中，提醒您必须支付的账单，您所要做的就是将其移动到您的收件箱中。
When used at the beginning of a regular line of text, turn that line into a heading.
在常规文本行的开头使用时，会将该行转换为标题。
When was this entry marked as done?
此条目是何时标记为完成的？
When we say that “<k0>C-n</k0> moves down vertically one line” we are glossing over a subtle distinction that is irrelevant in ordinary use, but vital for Emacs customization.
当我们说“<k0>C-n</k0>垂直下移一行”时，我们忽略了一个微妙的区别，这个区别在普通使用中并不相关，但对于Emacs定制至关重要。
When working with Speedbar, you can use the following commands in the Speedbar frame:
若你启用了speedbar,则在speedbar frame中还能使用以下命令：
When you hit the error, a ‘<s0>*Backtrace*</s0>’ buffer appears on the screen.
遇到错误时，屏幕上会显示一个<s0>*Backtrace*</s0>缓冲区。
When you mark a ‘<s0>DEADLINE</s0>’ or a ‘<s1>SCHEDULED</s1>’ with the TODO keyword ‘<s2>DONE</s2>’, it no longer produces entries in the agenda.
当你把‘<s0>DEADLINE</s0>’或‘<s1>SCHEDULED</s1>’标记为TODO关键字 ‘<s2>DONE</s2>’时，它不再在议程中生成条目。
When you specify more than one word in the apropos pattern, a name must contain at least two of the words in order to match.
当您在主题搜索模式中指定多个单词时，名称必须至少包含两个单词才能匹配。
When you start Emacs, there is normally only one window in the frame.
启动Emacs时，窗体中通常只有一个窗口。
Whenever we encounter commands that work on screen lines, such as <k7>C-n</k7> and <k8>C-p</k8>, we will point these out.
每当我们遇到在屏幕行上工作的命令时，例如<k7>C-n</k7>和<k8>C-p</k8>，我们都会指出这些命令。
Which links keep working after publishing?
哪些链接在发布后仍然有效？
While in the completion list buffer, kill it and delete the window showing it (<c0>kill-current-buffer</c0>).
在补全列表缓冲区中时，取消它并删除显示它的窗口(<c0>kill-current-buffer</c0>)。
While in the completion list buffer, these keys move point to the following completion alternative (<c0>next-completion</c0>).
在补全列表缓冲区中，这些键移动到以下补全选项(<c0>next-completion</c0>)。
While in the completion list buffer, these keys move point to the previous completion alternative (<c0>previous-completion</c0>).
在补全列表缓冲区中时，这些键移动到前一个补全选项(<c0>previous-completion</c0>)。
While in the completion list buffer, this chooses the completion at point (<c0>choose-completion</c0>).
在补全列表缓冲区中时，这将在游标处选择补全(<c0>choose-completion</c0>)。
While in the completion list buffer, this quits the window showing it and selects the window showing the minibuffer (<c0>quit-window</c0>).
在补全列表缓冲区中时，这将退出显示它的窗口，并选择显示迷你缓冲区的窗口(<c0>quit-window</c0>)。
While in the minibuffer, <k0>M-p</k0> (<c1>previous-history-element</c1>) moves through the minibuffer history list, one item at a time.
在迷你缓冲区中时，<k0>M-p</k0>(<c1>previous-history-element</c1>)在迷你缓冲区历史列表中移动，一次移动一项。
While it is possible to use the mouse to issue editing commands through the menu bar and tool bar, that is not as efficient as using the keyboard.
虽然可以使用鼠标通过菜单栏和工具栏触发编辑命令，但效率不如使用键盘。
While retracing your steps, you can go forward by using <k9>C-c C-f</k9> or <k10>r</k10> (<c11>help-go-forward</c11>).
回溯步骤时，可以使用<k9>C-c C-f</k9>或<k10>r</k10>(<c11>help-go-forward</c11>)继续。
While the minibuffer is in use, Emacs does not echo keystrokes.
当迷你缓冲区正在使用时，Emacs不会回显击键。
While you are typing the password, you may press <t0>DEL</t0> to delete backwards, removing the last character entered.
键入密码时，可以按<t0>DEL</t0>向后删除，删除最后输入的字符。
扩大缓冲区以取消聚焦。
With Size Indication mode, you can display the size of the buffer as well.
使用尺寸指示模式，您还可以显示缓冲区的尺寸。
With a <k0>C-u</k0> prefix, sorting is case-sensitive.
使用<k0>C-u</k0>前缀，排序区分大小写。
With a <k5>C-u</k5> prefix, do not remove the previously used indirect buffer.
使用<k5>C-u</k5>前缀，请勿删除以前使用的间接缓冲区。
With a double <k1>C-u C-u</k1> prefix, the new heading is created at the end of the parent subtree instead.
使用双<k1>C-u C-u</k1>前缀，将在父子树的末尾创建新标题。
With a double prefix argument, also show the entire subtree of the parent.
使用双前缀参数，还可以显示父级的整个子树。
With a numeric argument <v0>n</v0>, <k1>C-h i</k1> selects the Info buffer ‘<s2>*info*<<v3>n</v3>></s2>’.
使用数字参数<v0>n</v0>，<k1>C-h i</k1>选择Info缓冲区‘<s2>*info*<<v3>n</v3>></s2>’。
With a numeric prefix argument <v0>N</v0>, expose all children down to level <v1>N</v1>.
使用数字前缀参数<v0>N</v0>，将所有子级向下显示到<v1>N</v1>。
With a numeric prefix argument <v2>N</v2>, go up to level <v3>N</v3> and then take that tree.
使用数字前缀参数<v2>N</v2>，转到级别<v3>N</v3>，然后获取该树。
With a numeric prefix argument N, copy the N sequential subtrees.
使用数字前缀参数N复制N个连续子树。
With a numeric prefix argument N, kill N sequential subtrees.
使用数字前缀参数N，删除N个连续的子树。
With a numeric prefix argument<a0><s1>95</s1></a0>—like <k2>C-u 2 1 M-x org-agenda a</k2>—you may set the number of days to be displayed.
使用数字前缀参数<a0><s1>95</s1></a0>-就像<k2>C-u 2 1M-x org-Agenda a</k2>一样，您可以设置要显示的天数。
With a numeric prefix, the Nth keyword in <c2>org-todo-keywords</c2> is selected.
如果输入该命令时输入来一个数字前缀n，那么则会选择变量<c2>org-todo-keywords</c2>中第n个关键字进行筛选。
With a prefix argument, <k3>C-u M-=</k3>, the command displays a count for the entire buffer.
使用前缀参数<k3>C-u M-=</k3>，该命令显示整个缓冲区的计数。
With a prefix argument, file is added/moved to the end.
通过输入前缀参数，可以将所选文件添加/移动到列表尾部。
With a prefix argument, search also for functions with definitions matching the pattern, and Lisp symbols with properties matching the pattern.
使用前缀参数，还可以搜索定义与模式匹配的函数，以及属性与模式匹配的Lisp符号。
With a prefix argument, search for customizable variables only.
使用前缀参数时，仅搜索可自定义变量。
With a prefix argument, search for non-customizable variables too.
使用前缀参数，还可以搜索不可自定义的变量。
With a prefix argument, search for noninteractive functions too.
使用前缀参数，也可以搜索非交互函数。
With a prefix argument, show, on each level, all sibling headings.
使用前缀参数，在每个级别上显示所有同级标题。

With both types of yes-or-no query the minibuffer behaves as described in the previous sections; you can recenter the selected window with <k0>C-l</k0>, scroll that window (<k1>C-v</k1> or <k2>PageDown</k2> scrolls forward, <k3>M-v</k3> or <k4>PageUp</k4> scrolls backward), switch to another window with <k5>C-x o</k5>, use the history commands <k6>M-p</k6> and <k7>M-n</k7>, etc.
对于这两种类型的是或否查询，迷你缓冲区的行为如前面各节中所述；您可以使用<k0>C-l</k0>将选定窗口重新居中，滚动窗口(使用<k1>C-v</k1>或<k2>PageDown</k2>向前滚动，使用<k3>M-v</k3>或<k4>PageUp</k4>)向后滚动)，使用<k5>C-x o</k5>切换到另一个窗口，使用历史命令<k6>M-p</k6>和<k7>M-n</k7>
With no argument, it repeats the last such command.
在没有参数的情况下，它重复最后一个这样的命令。
With numeric argument <v1>n</v1>, move to <v2>n</v2>/10 of the way from the top.
使用数字参数<v1>n</v1>，从顶部移动到路径的<v2>n</v2>/10
与其他Emacs软件包一起使用。
With sticky agendas, the dispatcher only switches to the selected view, you need to update it by hand with <k1>r</k1> or <k2>g</k2>.
通过打开粘滞议程模式，议程调度程序只会在不同议程视图间切换而不会自动更新内容，你需要通过按<k1>r</k1>或<k2>g</k2>来手动更新议程视图的内容。

With the above setup, you could clear the current tags and set ‘<s0>@home</s0>’, ‘<s1>laptop</s1>’ and ‘<s2>pc</s2>’ tags with just the following keys: <k3>C-c C-c <s4>SPC</s4> h l p <s5>RET</s5></k3>.
使用上面的设置，您可以清除当前标签，并仅使用以下键设置‘<s0>@home</s0>’、‘<s1>Laptop</s1>’和‘<s2>pc</s2>’标记：<k3>C-c-c<s4>SPC</s4>h l p<s5>RET</s5></k3>。
With the default settings, no level adjustment takes place, but the yanked tree is folded unless doing so would swallow text previously visible.
使用默认设置时，不会进行任何级别调整，但会折叠粘贴的树，除非这样做会吞噬以前可见的文本。
With the ‘<s0>+1m</s0>’ cookie, the date shift is always exactly one month.
对于“<s0>+1m</s0>”，日期转换始终正好是一个月。
With these commands, no argument is equivalent to an argument of one, and negative arguments cause them to move or act in the opposite direction.
使用这些命令时，没有任何参数等同于参数1，而负参数会导致它们朝相反的方向移动或操作。

Without moving the text on the screen, reposition point on the left margin of the center-most text line of the window; on subsequent consecutive invocations, move point to the left margin of the top-most line, the bottom-most line, and so forth, in cyclic order (<c0>move-to-window-line-top-bottom</c0>).
在不移动屏幕上的文本的情况下，将指针重新定位在窗口最中间文本行的左边距上；在随后的连续调用中，按循环顺序将指针移动到最顶行、最底行的左边距，依此类推(<c0>move-to-window-line-top-bottom</c0>)。
Writing a view to a file.
Writing an extension is programming, but non-programmers can use it afterwards.
编写扩展就是编程，但非程序员可以在之后使用它。
Writing programs that use entry properties.
编写使用条目属性的程序。
从剪切板上粘贴一棵子树。
Yet another <k4><s5>TAB</s5></k4>, and you are back to the initial level.
再来一次<k4><s5>Tab</s5></k4>，您将返回到初始级别。
You answer the query by typing a single key, either ‘<s0>y</s0>’ or ‘<s1>n</s1>’, which immediately exits the minibuffer and delivers the response.
您可以通过键入单个键“<s0>y</s0>”或“<s1>n</s1>”来回答查询，这将立即退出迷你缓冲区并传递响应。
You are prompted for a keyword, and you may also specify several keywords by separating them with ‘<s1>|</s1>’ as the boolean OR operator.
在输入完M-x org-agenda T后，Org会提示你输入一个关键字，您也可以在多个关键字间加“|“来输入多个关键字。
You are prompted for the number of copies to make, and you can also specify if any timestamps in the entry should be shifted.
系统会提示您输入要制作的副本数量，您还可以指定条目中的任何时间戳是否应该移位。
You are reading about GNU Emacs, the GNU incarnation of the advanced, self-documenting, customizable, extensible editor Emacs.
您正在阅读关于GNU Emacs的文章，GNU Emacs是高级的、自文档化的、可定制的、可扩展的编辑器Emacs的GNU版本。
You can also add several tags: just separate them with a comma.
您还可以添加几个标记：只需用逗号分隔它们。
You can also change the command by editing the Lisp expression before you execute it.
您还可以通过在执行命令之前编辑Lisp表达式来更改命令。
You can also click the left mouse button to move point to the position clicked.
您也可以单击鼠标左键将游标移动到单击的位置。
You can also compile with ‘<s0>make</s0>’, generate the documentation with ‘<s1>make doc</s1>’, create a local configuration with ‘<s2>make config</s2>’ and install Org with ‘<s3>make install</s3>’.
你也可以使用'<s0>make</s0>'进行编译，使用'<s1>make doc</s1>'生成文档，使用'<s2>make config</s2>'创建本地配置，使用'<s3>make install</s3>'安装Org。
You can also define custom commands that are accessible through the dispatcher, just like the default commands.
您可以定义自己的搜索命令，并像默认命令一样，可以通过议程调度程序来执行相应命令。
You can also do this by specifying a prefix argument to <k0>t</k0>.
您也可以通过在输入M-x org-agenda t时增加一个前缀参数来达到相同的效果。该前缀参数即为您要筛选的关键字。
You can also enter remote file names in the minibuffer.
您还可以在迷你缓冲区中输入远程文件名。
You can also force Emacs to display a file or directory at startup by setting the variable <c0>initial-buffer-choice</c0> to a string naming that file or directory.
您还可以通过将变量<c0>initial-buffer-choice</c0>设置为命名文件或目录的字符串，强制Emacs在启动时显示该文件或目录。
You can also group together tags that are mutually exclusive by using braces, as in:
还可以使用大括号将互斥的标记组合在一起，如在以下内容中所示：

You can also move point using the <e5>arrow keys</e5> present on most keyboards: <t6>RIGHT</t6>, <t7>LEFT</t7>, <t8>DOWN</t8>, and <t9>UP</t9>; however, many Emacs users find that it is slower to use the arrow keys than the control keys, because you need to move your hand to the area of the keyboard where those keys are located.
您还可以使用大多数键盘上的<e5>箭头键</e5>移动游标：<t6>RIGHT</t6>、<t7>LEFT</t7>、<t8>DOWN</t8>和<t9>UP</t9>；但是，许多Emacs用户发现使用箭头键比使用控制键要慢，因为您需要将手移动到这些键所在的键盘区域。
You can also purchase a printed copy from the <a4>FSF store</a4>.
您还可以从<a4>FSF商店</a4>购买打印版。
You can also scroll the help text with <k1>M-<s2>PageUp</s2></k1> and <k3>M-<s4>PageDown</s4></k3> (or, equivalently, <k5>M-<s6>prior</s6></k5> and <k7>M-<s8>next</s8></k7>).
您还可以使用<k1>M-<s2>PageUp</s2></k1>和<k3>M-<s4>PageDown</s4></k3>(或等效的<k5>M-<s6>prior</s6></k5>和<k7>M-<s8>next</s8></k7>)滚动帮助文本。
You can also search through the history using an incremental search.
您还可以使用增量搜索来搜索历史记录。
You can also select the window in other ways (see <a4>Windows</a4>).
您也可以通过其他方式选择窗口(请参阅<a4>窗口</a4>)。
You can also set tags that all entries in a file should inherit just as if these tags were defined in a hypothetical level zero that surrounds the entire file.
您还可以设置文件中的所有条目都应该继承的标签，就像这些标签是在围绕整个文件的假设级别0中定义的一样。
You can also set the start date using a date shift: ‘<s6>(setq org-agenda-start-day "+10d")</s6>’ starts the agenda ten days from today in the future.
您还可以使用日期转换设置开始日期：‘<s6>(setq org-Agenda-start-day “+10d”)</s6>’从今天开始10天后开始将来的议程。
You can also specify <v5>n</v5> by giving <k6>M-g M-g</k6> a numeric prefix argument.
您还可以通过向<k6>M-g M-g</k6>提供数字前缀参数来指定<v5>n</v5>。
You can also supply your own function to extract the sorting key.
您还可以提供自己的函数来提取排序关键字。
You can also type <k2>C-h C-h</k2> to view a list of help commands (<c3>help-for-help</c3>).
您还可以键入<k2>C-h C-h</k2>以查看帮助命令列表(<c3>help-for-help</c3>)。
You can also type Meta characters using two-character sequences starting with <t0>ESC</t0>.
您还可以使用以<t0>ESC</t0>开头的双字符序列键入元字符。
You can always get out of the minibuffer by typing <k2>C-g</k2>.
您始终可以通过键入<k2>C-g</k2>来退出迷你缓冲区。
You can change the appearance of the mode line as well as the format of its contents.
您可以更改状态栏的外观及其内容的格式。
You can clone Org’s repository and install Org like this:
你可以克隆Org的仓库到本地，然后安装Org，像这样:
You can complete on all tags present in the buffer.
您可以补全缓冲区中存在的所有标记。
You can customize <c2>org-agenda-files</c2>, but the easiest way to maintain it is through the following commands
你可以自定义<c2>org-agenda-file</c2>变量，但是修改它最简单的方法是通过如下命令：
You can customize these keys to run any commands of your choice (see <a5>Keymaps</a5>).
您可以自定义这些键以运行您选择的任何命令(请参阅<a5>键绑定</a5>)。
You can display the same list with <k2>?</k2> (<c3>minibuffer-completion-help</c3>).
您可以使用<k2>？</k2>(<c3>minibuffer-completion-help</c3>)显示相同的列表。
You can do that by typing <k2>M-x auto-fill-mode <s3>RET</s3></k2>, but it is easier to use completion.
您可以通过键入<k2>M-x auto-fill-mode<s3>RET</s3></k2>来做到这一点，但是使用补全更容易。
You can do that with <k1>C-q C-j</k1>, which inserts a <k2>C-j</k2> control character, which is formally equivalent to a newline character (see <a3>Inserting Text</a3>).
您可以使用<k1>C-q C-j</k1>执行此操作，它插入一个<k2>C-j</k2>控制字符，在形式上相当于换行符(请参见<a3>插入文本</a3>)。
You can do this globally by configuring the variable <c1>org-tag-alist</c1> in your Emacs init file.
您可以通过在Emacs init文件中配置变量<c1>org-tag-ist</c1>来全局执行此操作。
You can download Org latest release from <a0>Org’s website</a0>.
你可以从 <a0>Org官网</a0>下载Org的最新版本。
You can enter <k4>C-M-a</k4> (holding down both <t5>Ctrl</t5> and <t6>Alt</t6>, then pressing <k7>a</k7>) by typing <k8><s9>ESC</s9> C-a</k8>.
您可以通过键入<k8><s9>ESC</s9>C-a</k8>来输入<k4>C-M-a</k4>(同时按住<t5>Ctrl</t5>和<t6>Alt</t6>，然后按<k7>a</k7>)。
You can even kill text in another window, return to the minibuffer window, and yank the text into the argument.
您甚至可以剪切另一个窗口中的文本，返回到迷你缓冲区窗口，然后将文本粘贴为参数。

You can force these commands to move according to <e7>logical lines</e7> (i.e., according to the text lines in the buffer) by setting the variable <c8>line-move-visual</c8> to <c9>nil</c9>; if a logical line occupies multiple screen lines, the cursor then skips over the additional screen lines.
通过将变量<c8>line-move-visual</c8>设置为<c9>nil</c9>，可以强制这些命令根据<e7>逻辑行</e7>(即根据缓冲区中的文本行)移动；如果一个逻辑行占据多个屏幕行，则光标将跳过附加的屏幕行。
You can get a list of subcommands for a particular prefix key by typing <k0>C-h</k0>, <k1>?</k1>, or <t2>F1</t2> (<c3>describe-prefix-bindings</c3>) after the prefix key.
您可以通过在前缀键之后键入<k0>C-h</k0>、<k1>？</k1>或<t2>F1</t2>(<c3>describe-prefix-bindings</c3>)来获取特定前缀键的子命令列表。
You can give any Emacs command a <e1>numeric argument</e1> (also called a <e2>prefix argument</e2>).
您可以为任何Emacs命令提供<e1>数字参数</e1>(也称为<e2>前缀参数</e2>)。
You can ignore the information about variables until you are interested in customizing them.
您可以忽略有关变量的信息，直到您对自定义它们感兴趣为止。
You can insert an ordinary <e0>graphic character</e0> (e.g., ‘<s1>a</s1>’, ‘<s2>B</s2>’, ‘<s3>3</s3>’, and ‘<s4>=</s4>’) by typing the associated key.
You can install Org from the “package menu”, with <k0>M-x list-packages</k0>.
输入命令 <k0>M-x list-packages</k0>，你便可以从“软件包清单”中安装Org。
You can make incremental search commands appear in the history by setting <c0>isearch-resume-in-command-history</c0> to a non-<c1>nil</c1> value.
通过将<c0>isearch-resume-in-command-history</c0>设置为非<c1>nil</c1>值，可以使增量搜索命令出现在历史记录中。
You can make several blank lines by typing <k0>C-o</k0> several times, or by giving it a numeric argument specifying how many blank lines to make.
您可以通过多次键入<k0>C-o</k0>，或者通过给它一个指定要创建多少个空行的数字参数来创建几个空行。
You can often use a feature called <e0>completion</e0> to help enter arguments.
您通常可以使用名为<e0>补全</e0>的功能来帮助输入参数。
You can override this by setting <c2>org-agenda-skip-comment-trees</c2> and <c3>org-agenda-skip-archived-trees</c3> to <c4>nil</c4>.
可以通过设置<c2>org-agenda-skip-comment-trees</c2>和<c3>org-agenda-skip-archived-trees</c3>为<c4>nil</c4>来取消忽略。
You can repeat that command (including its argument) three additional times, to delete a total of 80 characters, by typing <k1>C-x z z z</k1>.
通过键入<k1>C-x z z z</k1>，您可以额外重复该命令(包括其参数)三次，以删除总共80个字符。

You can run global cycling using <k0><s1>TAB</s1></k0> only if point is at the very beginning of the buffer, but not on a headline, and <c2>org-cycle-global-at-bob</c2> is set to a non-<c3>nil</c3> value.
您可以使用<k0><s1>TAB</s1></k0>运行全局循环，前提是光标位于缓冲区的最开始处，而不是在标题上，并且<c2>org-cycle-global-at-bob</c2>设置为非<c3>nil</c3>值。
You can run those commands by typing the keys, or run them by name.
您可以通过键入快捷键来运行这些命令，也可以按名称运行它们。
You can scroll the list with <t4>SPC</t4> and <t5>DEL</t5>, then type the help command you want.
您可以使用<t4>SPC</t4>和<t5>DEL</t5>滚动列表，然后键入所需的帮助命令。
You can separate the argument from the digit to insert with another <k0>C-u</k0>; for example, <k1><s2>C-u</s2> 6 4 <s3>C-u</s3> 1</k1>
您可以将参数与数字分隔，以便用另一个<k0>C-u</k0>插入；例如，<k1><s2>C-u</s2> 6 4 <s3>C-u</s3> 1</k1>

You can set the variable <c4>inhibit-startup-screen</c4> using the Customize facility (see <a5>Easy Customization</a5>), or by editing your initialization file (see <a6>Init File</a6>).<a7><s8>4</s8></a7>
您可以使用自定义功能(请参见<a5>轻松自定义</a5>)或通过编辑初始化文件(请参见<a6>初始化文件</a6>)来设置变量<c4>inhibit-startup-screen</c4>。<a7><s8>4</s8></a7>
You can specify a file in the parent directory with <s0>..</s0>: <s1>/a/b/../foo.el</s1> is equivalent to <s2>/a/foo.el</s2>.
您可以使用<s0>..</s0>指定父目录中的文件：<s2>/a/b/../foo.el</s2>等同于<s1>/a/foo.el</s1>。
You can start a typical minimal session with a command like the example below.
您可以使用类似以下示例的命令启动典型的最小会话。
You can subscribe to the list <a1>from this web page</a1>.
你可以从<a1>这个页面</a1>订阅此列表。
You can then go ahead and define anniversaries for a BBDB record.
然后，您可以继续为BBDB记录定义周年纪念。
You can then navigate the menus with the arrow keys or with <k2>C-b</k2>, <k3>C-f</k3> (left/right), <k4>C-p</k4>, and <k5>C-n</k5> (up/down).
然后，您可以使用箭头键或<k2>C-b</k2>、<k3>C-f</k3>(左/右)、<k4>C-p</k4>和<k5>C-n</k5>(上/下)来导航菜单。
You can think of this as moving through the “future history”.
你可以认为这是在穿越“未来的历史”。
You can toggle sticky agenda view any time with <c3>org-toggle-sticky-agenda</c3>.
通过<c3>org-toggle-stick-agenda</c3>命令，您可以随时切换粘滞议程视图。
You can turn off these messages by setting the variable <c3>suggest-key-bindings</c3> to <c4>nil</c4>.
您可以通过将变量<c3>suggest-key-bindings</c3>设置为<c4>nil</c4>来关闭这些消息。
You can tweak the confirmation behavior by customizing the variable <c0>confirm-nonexistent-file-or-buffer</c0>.
您可以通过定制变量<c0>confirm-nonexistent-file-or-buffer</c0>来调整确认行为。
You can type the item’s letter or digit to select the item.
您可以键入项目的字母或数字来选择项目。

You can use <k0>M-r</k0> (<c1>previous-matching-history-element</c1>) to search through older elements in the history list, and <k2>M-s</k2> (<c3>next-matching-history-element</c3>) to search through newer entries.
您可以使用<k0>M-r</k0>(<c1>previous-matching-history-element</c1>)搜索历史列表中较旧的元素，使用<k2>M-s</k2>(<c3>next-matching-history-element</c3>)搜索较新的条目。
You can use a numeric argument before a self-inserting character to insert multiple copies of it.
您可以在自插入字符之前使用数字参数来插入该字符的多个副本。
You can use a regular expression as <v2>topic</v2>.
您可以使用一个正则表达式用作<v2>主题</v2>。
You can use any number of octal digits; any non-digit terminates the sequence.
您可以使用任意数量的八进制数字；任何非数字都可以终止序列。
You can use completion to enter the command name.
可以使用补全功能输入命令名。
You can use different completion styles in different situations, by setting the variable <c0>completion-category-overrides</c0>.
通过设置变量<c0>completion-category-overrides</c0>，您可以在不同的情况下使用不同的补全风格。
You can use the following arguments to quickly fetch an earlier argument into the minibuffer:
您可以使用以下参数将较早的参数快速提取到迷你缓冲区中：
You can use the following commands to view these files.
您可以使用以下命令查看这些文件。
You can use the up and down arrow keys to move through the menu to different items, and then you can type <t7>RET</t7> to select the item.
您可以使用向上和向下箭头键在菜单中移动到不同的项目，然后可以键入<t7>RET</t7>选择项目。
You can use the usual Emacs editing commands in the minibuffer to edit the argument text.
您可以在迷你缓冲区中使用常用的Emacs编辑命令来编辑参数文本。
You can use yearly, monthly, weekly, daily and hourly repeat cookies by using the ‘<s2>y</s2>’, ‘<s3>w</s3>’, ‘<s4>m</s4>’, ‘<s5>d</s5>’ and ‘<s6>h</s6>’ letters.
您可以通过使用“<s2>y</s2>”、“<s3>w</s3>”、“<s4>m</s4>”、“<s5>d</s5>”和“<s6>h</s6>”字母来创建每年、每月、每周、每天和每小时间隔的复读机。
You can usually type <k5>?</k5> to see a list of completion alternatives.
您通常可以键入<k5>？</k5>来查看可供选择的补全列表。
You can visit our online store at <a1>https://shop.fsf.org/</a1>.
您可以访问我们的在线商店<a1>https://shop.fsf.org/</a1>.
You can, however, use <t6>F1</t6> to display a list of commands starting with <t7>ESC</t7>.
但是，您可以使用<t6>F1</t6>显示以<t7>ESC</t7>开头的命令列表。
You can’t add input events onto a complete key.
您不能将输入事件追加到完全键上。

You could even eliminate some of the standard ones, though this is not recommended for most users; for example, if you remove the prefix definition of <k21>C-x 4</k21>, then <k22>C-x 4 C-f</k22> becomes an invalid key sequence.
您甚至可以删除一些标准的键序列，尽管不建议大多数用户这样做；例如，如果删除<k21>C-x 4</k21>的前缀定义，则<k22>C-x 4 C-f</k22>将成为无效的键序列。
You don’t hold down <t12>ESC</t12> while typing the next character; instead, press <t13>ESC</t13> and release it, then enter the next character.
键入下一个字符时不要按住<t12>ESC</t12>；而是按<t13>ESC</t13>并松开它，然后输入下一个字符。
You may also globally specify a hard list of tags with the variable <c3>org-tag-alist</c3>.
您还可以使用变量<c3>org-tag-ist</c3>全局指定标签的硬列表。
You may also receive GNU Emacs when you buy a computer.
您还可以在购买计算机时收到GNU Emacs。
You may have both scheduling and deadline information for a specific task.
对于某些特定任务，您可能同时拥有日程安排和截止日期信息。
You may specify special faces for specific tags using the variable <c4>org-tag-faces</c4>, in much the same way as you can for TODO keywords (see <a5>Faces for TODO keywords</a5>).
您可以使用变量<c4>org-tag-faces</c4>为特定标签指定特殊的字符样式，方法与为TODO关键字指定的方式大致相同(请参阅<a5>为TODO关键字设置字符样式</a5>)。
You may turn this off on a per-file basis by adding a ‘<s2>STARTUP</s2>’ keyword to that file:
您可以通过将“<s2>STARTUP</s2>”关键字添加到该文件来逐个文件关闭此功能：
You may type either <t6>RET</t6> or <t7>ESC</t7> to submit the password.
您可以键入<t6>RET</t6>或<t7>ESC</t7>提交密码。
You might need also to enable <c2>minibuffer-depth-indicate-mode</c2> to show the current recursion depth in the minibuffer prompt on recursive use of the minibuffer.
您可能还需要启用<c2>minibuffer-depth-indicate-mode</c2>，以便在递归使用迷你缓冲区时在迷你缓冲区提示符中显示当前的递归深度。
You need not ask for our permission to do so, or tell anyone else; just copy it.
你不需要征得我们的许可，也不需要告诉任何人，只需拷贝就行了。
You need to write it down in your GTD if you don’t want to miss the deadline.
如果你不想错过截止期限，你需要把它写在你的GTD里。

<e0>TODO</e0>视图包含了所有未完成的行动事项。
a <e0>match view</e0>, showings headlines based on the tags, properties, and TODO state associated with them,
<e0>match view</e0>能够根据标签、属性和TODO状态来筛选事项。
a <e0>stuck projects view</e0> showing projects that currently do not move along, and
<e0>stuck projects view</e0>显示所有没有下一步行动的项目。
a <e0>text search view</e0> that shows all entries from multiple files that contain specified keywords,
<e0>text search view</e0>能从多个文件中查找所有包含关键字的条目。
an <e0>agenda</e0> that is like a calendar and shows information for specific dates,
<e0>agenda</e0>视图和日历类似，能在特定日期显示相关信息。

但是由于包的性质，当bug/do/出现时，它们可以

并且尽可能的把时间戳放到未来。

一些文本 *** 三级标题
the final heading has the tags ‘<s0>work</s0>’, ‘<s1>boss</s1>’, ‘<s2>notes</s2>’, and ‘<s3>action</s3>’ even though the final heading is not explicitly marked with those tags.
最后一个标题将具有标签“<s0>work</s0>”、“<s1>boss</s1>”、“<s2>notes</s2>”和“<s3>action</s3>”，即使最后一个标题没有用这些标签显式标签。
the ‘<s0>+1m</s0>’ is a repeater; the intended interpretation is that the task has a deadline on ‘<s1><2005-10-01></s1>’ and repeats itself every (one) month starting from that time.
“<s0>+1m</s0>”是一个复读机；预期的解释是任务的截止日期为“<s1><2005-10-01></s1>”，并从该时间开始每(一个)月重复一次。
to do so; it won't interpose itself in other MUA operations.
这样做；它不会介入其他MUA操作。
where the two extra numbers give the smallest and largest character position that point is allowed to assume.
其中两个额外的数字给出了该游标被允许的最小和最大字符位置。
which puts all this information into an Emacs mail buffer so that you only need to add your description.
它将所有这些信息放入Emacs邮件缓冲区中，因此你只需要添加你的描述即可。
which selects Org mode for this buffer no matter what the file’s name is.
不管文件名是什么，都会为该缓冲区选择组织模式。

— 详细的节点列表 —
介绍
‘<s0>Narrow</s0>’ means that the buffer being displayed has editing restricted to only a portion of its text (see <a1>Narrowing</a1>).
‘<s0>Narrow</s0>’表示正在显示的缓冲区的编辑仅限于其文本的一部分(请参阅<a1>聚焦</a1>)。
‘<s2>Def</s2>’ means that a keyboard macro is currently being defined (see <a3>Keyboard Macros</a3>).
“<s2>Def</s2>”表示当前正在定义键盘宏(请参阅<a3>键盘宏</a3>)。
‘<s3>=</s3>’ means no conversion whatsoever, and is usually used for files containing non-textual data.
“<s3>=</s3>”表示不进行任何转换，通常用于包含非文本数据的文件。
